data.translation: "Yanzu muna da berayen watanni 4 wadanda ba su da ciwon sukari, wadanda suka kasance masu ciwon sukari," ya kara da cewa.
data.original_reference: “Yanzu muna bera mai watanni 4 wadanda ba su da ciwon sukari ba wadanda ke da suke fama da ciwon sukari,” in ji shi.
data.corrected_reference: “Yanzu muna bera mai watanni 4 wadanda ba su da ciwon sukari ba wadanda ke da suke fama da ciwon sukari,” in ji shi.

data.translation: Dokta Ehud Ur, farfesa a jami'ar Dalhousie da ke Halifax, Nova Scotia kuma shugaban sashen asibiti da kimiyya na kungiyar masu ciwon sukari ta Kanada ya yi gargadin cewa binciken yana cikin farkon kwanaki.
data.original_reference: Dokta Ehud Ur, farfesan magani a Jami’ar Dalhousie da ke Halifax, Nova Scotia kuma shugaban sashen likitanci da bangaren kimiyya na kungiyar masu ciwon sikari ta Kanada ya yi gargadin cewa har yanzu binciken yana kan farkonsa.
data.corrected_reference: Dokta Ehud Ur, farfesan magani a Jami’ar Dalhousie da ke Halifax, Nova Scotia kuma shugaban sashen likitanci da bangaren kimiyya na kungiyar masu ciwon sikari ta Kanada ya yi gargadin cewa har yanzu binciken yana kan farkonsa.

data.translation: Kamar wasu masana, yana shakkar ko za a iya warkar da ciwon sukari, yana mai cewa wadannan binciken ba su da mahimmanci ga mutanen da suke da ciwon sukari na 1.
data.original_reference: Kamar wasu ƙwararrun, yana da shakkun cewa ko za a iya warkar da ciwon sukari, inda ya bayyana cewa sakamakon bincike ba shi da alaƙa da mutanen da tuni su ke da nau’in ciwon sukari na 1.
data.corrected_reference: Kamar wasu ƙwararrun, yana da shakkun cewa ko za a iya warkar da ciwon sukari, inda ya bayyana cewa sakamakon bincike ba shi da alaƙa da mutanen da tuni su ke da nau’in ciwon sukari na 1.

data.translation: A ranar Litinin, Sara Danius, sakataren kwamitin Nobel na wallafe-wallafe a makarantar kimiyya ta Sweden, ta sanar a fili a lokacin wani shiri na rediyo a Sveriges Radio a Sweden kwamitin, ba zai iya kai tsaye zuwa ga Bob Dylan game da lashe kyautar Nobel na wallafe-wallafe ta 2016 ba, ya yi watsi da kokarinsa na isa gare shi.
data.original_reference: A ranar Litinin, Sara Danius, sakatariyar dindindin ta Kwamitin Adabi na kungiyar nagartattu a Kwalejin Nazarin Sweden, ta sanar a bainar jama'a yayin wani shirin rediyo a Sveriges Radio a Sweden kwamitin, ba zai iya kaiwa ga Bob Dylan kai tsaye ba game da lashe kyautar Nobel ta 2016 a Adabi, ta yi watsi da ita kokarinta na isa gare shi.
data.corrected_reference: A ranar Litinin, Sara Danius, sakatariyar dindindin ta Kwamitin Adabi na kungiyar nagartattu a Kwalejin Nazarin Sweden, ta sanar a bainar jama'a yayin wani shirin rediyo a Sveriges Radio a Sweden kwamitin, ba zai iya kaiwa ga Bob Dylan kai tsaye ba game da lashe kyautar Nobel ta 2016 a Adabi, ta yi watsi da ita kokarinta na isa gare shi.

data.translation: Danius ya ce, "A yanzu haka ba mu yi komai ba. Na kira na aika imel zuwa ga abokin aikinsa mafi kusa kuma na karɓi amsoshi masu kyau. A yanzu, wannan ya isa."
data.original_reference: Danius ya ce, “Yanzu haka ba mwa yin komi. Na kira na kuma aika emails zuwa abokan aikinsa na kusa na kuma anshi amsoshi masu kyau. A yanzu haka, wannan bai isa ba.”
data.corrected_reference: Danius ya ce, “Yanzu haka ba mwa yin komi. Na kira na kuma aika emails zuwa abokan aikinsa na kusa na kuma anshi amsoshi masu kyau. A yanzu haka, wannan bai isa ba.”

data.translation: A baya, Shugaba na Ring, Jamie Siminoff, ya lura da kamfanin ya fara ne lokacin da aka kasa jin kararrawar kofarsa daga shagonsa a gararsa.
data.original_reference: A baya, Shugaban kamfanin Ring, Jamie Siminoff, ya bayyana cewa kamfanin ya fara lokacin da ba a jiyo sauti kararrawar jikin ƙofar sa daga shagonsa a cikin garejinsa.

data.translation: Ya ce ya gina ƙofar ƙofar WiFi.

data.corrected_reference: Ya ce, ya gina ƙararrawar ƙofa ta WiFi.

data.translation: Siminoff ya ce tallace-tallace sun karu bayan fitowarsa a 2013 a wani labari na Shark Tank inda kwamitin wasan kwaikwayon ya ki bayar da kudaden farawa.
data.original_reference: Siminoff ya ce tallace-tallace sun bunkasa bayan bayyanarsa a 2013 a cikin wani taron fim na Shark Tank inda taron kwamitin ya nuna ba da tallafin farawa.
data.corrected_reference: Siminoff yace ciniki ya karu baya futuwar sa ta 2013 a shinrin wasan kwaikwayin Shark Tank inda masu shirin suka ki biyan kudin sabuwar sana'ar.

data.translation: A karshen shekarar 2017, Siminoff ya fito a tashar talabijin ta QVC.
data.original_reference: A ƙarshen 2017, Siminoff ya bayyana a tashar telebijin mai sayarwa ta QVC.
data.corrected_reference: A ƙarshen 2017, Siminoff ya bayyana a tashar telebijin mai sayarwa ta QVC.

data.translation: Ring ya kuma sasanta karar da wani kamfani mai tsaro, ADT Corporation.

data.translation: Ko da yake ana ganin cewa allurar rigakafi guda ɗaya za ta iya rage yawan mutuwar mutane daga cutar Ebola, har zuwa yanzu ba a tabbatar da cewa akwai magani da zai iya magance cutar da ta riga ta kamu ba.
data.original_reference: Yayinda allurar gwaji rigakafi guda daya ta bayyana tana iya rage mutuwar cutar ta Ebola, har zuwa yanzu, babu wasu kwayoyi da aka nuna da suka dace da maganin cututtukan da suke kamuwa da su.
data.corrected_reference: Yayinda allurar gwaji rigakafi guda daya ta bayyana tana iya rage mutuwar cutar ta Ebola, har zuwa yanzu, babu wasu kwayoyi da aka nuna da suka dace da maganin cututtukan da suke kamuwa da su.

data.original_reference: Masu wasan tsalle tsalle na Amurka sun goyi bayan wasikar kwamitin gasar olympic tare da yarda da cikakkiyar bukatar duk masu wasan olympic da su yada maganar samar da yanayi mara hadari ga dukkan yan wasanmu.
data.corrected_reference: Masu wasan tsalle tsalle na Amurka sun goyi bayan wasikar kwamitin gasar olympic tare da yarda da cikakkiyar bukatar duk masu wasan olympic da su yada maganar samar da yanayi mara hadari ga dukkan yan wasanmu.

data.translation: Mun yarda da kalaman hukumar ta Amurka cewa za a iya yin amfani da bukatun 'yan wasanmu da kungiyoyinmu da kuma wasanninsu ta hanyar ci gaba da canji mai ma'ana a cikin kungiyarmu, maimakon a soke takardar shaidar.
data.original_reference: Mun yarda da bayanin USOC cewa bukatun 'yan wasanmu da kungiyar mu, da wasanninsu, na iya zama mafi alheri ta ci gaba tare da canji mai ma'ana a cikin ƙungiyarmu, maimakon ƙaddamar da doka.
data.corrected_reference: Mun yarda da bayanin USOC cewa bukatun ƴan wasanmu da kungiyar mu, da wasanninsu, na iya zama mafi alheri ta ci gaba tare da canji mai ma'ana a cikin ƙungiyarmu, maimakon ƙaddamar da doka.

data.translation: Hukumar ta USA Gymnastics ta goyi bayan wani bincike mai zaman kanta wanda zai iya haskaka yadda cin zarafin da aka kwatanta da ƙarfin hali ta hanyar 'yan gudun hijirar Larry Nassar ya kasance ba a gano shi ba har tsawon lokaci kuma ya hada da duk wani canji da ya dace.
data.original_reference: Kungiyan daki motsa jiki na USA na goyon bayan bincike mai zaman kanta wadda take zaton zata kara haske kan cin zarafi wadda wadanda suka tsira daga Larry Nassar suka bayana wadda ba a gano ba na tsawon lokaci kuma ke rungume da duk wani canji mai muhimmanci.
data.corrected_reference: Kungiyan daki motsa jiki na USA na goyon bayan bincike mai zaman kanta wadda take zaton zata kara haske kan cin zarafi wadda wadanda suka tsira daga Larry Nassar suka bayana wadda ba a gano ba na tsawon lokaci kuma ke rungume da duk wani canji mai muhimmanci.

data.translation: Kungiyar wasan motsa jiki ta Amurka da Kungiyar wasan motsa jiki ta Amurka suna da manufa guda ta sa wasan motsa jiki, da sauran, su kasance masu aminci kamar yadda ya kamata ga 'yan wasa su bi burinsu a cikin yanayi mai aminci, mai kyau da kuma karfafawa.
data.original_reference: Gidan motsa jiki na Amurka da USOC suna da manufa ɗaya - sa wasan motsa jiki, da sauransu, ya zama mai aminci yadda zai yiwu 'yan wasa su bi mafarkinsu cikin aminci, tabbatacce kuma mai ba da ƙarfi.
data.corrected_reference: Gidan motsa jiki na Amurka da USOC suna da manufa ɗaya - sa wasan motsa jiki, da sauransu, ya zama mai aminci yadda zai yiwu ƴan wasa su bi mafarkinsu cikin aminci, tabbatacce kuma mai ba da ƙarfi.

data.translation: A cikin shekarun 1960, Brzezinski ya yi aiki ga John F. Kennedy a matsayin mai ba da shawara sannan kuma gwamnatin Lyndon B. Johnson.

data.translation: A lokacin zaben 1976 ya shawarci Carter kan harkokin wajen, sannan ya yi aiki a matsayin mai ba da shawara kan tsaron kasa (NSA) daga 1977 zuwa 1981, ya gaji Henry Kissinger.
data.original_reference: A yayin zabukan 1976 ya shawarci Carter kan manufofin kasashen waje, sannan ya zama mai ba da shawara kan Tsaro na kasa (NSA) daga 1977 zuwa 1981, ya gaji Henry Kissinger.
data.corrected_reference: A yayin zabukan 1976 ya shawarci Carter kan manufofin kasashen waje, sannan ya zama mai ba da shawara kan Tsaro na kasa (NSA) daga 1977 zuwa 1981, ya gaji Henry Kissinger.

data.translation: A matsayinsa na NSA, ya taimaka wa Carter wajen gudanar da harkokin duniya a diplomasiyya, kamar Yarjejeniyar Camp David, 1978; daidaita dangantakar Amurka da China da aka yi a ƙarshen shekarun 1970; juyin juya halin Iran, wanda ya haifar da rikicin 'yan gungun Iran, 1979; da kuma mamayewar Soviet a Afghanistan, 1979.
data.original_reference: kasancewarsa dan NSA, ya taimaka wa Carter a harkokin dokokin kasashen waje wajen kula da lamuran duniya, kamar Yarjejeniyar Camp David, 1978; daidaita alaƙar Amurka da China tana tunanin ƙarshen shekarun 1970; juyin juya halin Iran, wanda ya haifar da rikicin garkuwar da Iran, 1979; da mamayar Soviet a Afghanistan, 1979.
data.corrected_reference: kasancewarsa dan NSA, ya taimaka wa Carter a harkokin dokokin kasashen waje wajen kula da lamuran duniya, kamar Yarjejeniyar Camp David, 1978; daidaita alaƙar Amurka da China tana tunanin ƙarshen shekarun 1970; juyin juya halin Iran, wanda ya haifar da rikicin garkuwar da Iran, 1979; da mamayar Soviet a Afghanistan, 1979.

data.translation: Waƙoƙi biyu daga fim din, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) da City of Stars, sun sami takara don mafi kyawun waƙar asali. Lionsgate studio ya sami takara 26 fiye da kowane ɗayan studio.

data.translation: A daren Lahadi, Shugaban Amurka Donald Trump, a cikin wata sanarwa da ya gabatar ta bakin sakataren yada labarai, ya sanar da cewa sojojin Amurka za su bar Syria.

data.original_reference: Domin gashin fuka-fukin dinosaur bashi da isasshen tsari, wanda ake kira kara, amma suna da sauran sifofin gashin fuka-fukan — tsandar gashi da kananan — masu binciken sun kammala cewa wata kila karan wani cigaba ne na juyin halittan wadannan sauran sifofin.

data.translation: Tsarin gashin ya nuna cewa ba a yi amfani da su a cikin jirgin ba amma don daidaita zafin jiki ko nunawa. Masu binciken sun ba da shawarar cewa, ko da yake wannan ita ce wutsiya ta wani matashi mai suna dinosaur, samfurin ya nuna gashin gashin datti ba na wata yarinya ba.
data.original_reference: Tsarin gashin fuka-fukan ya nuna cewa ba ana amfani da su ba ne domin tashi sama, sai dai domin samar da tsarin daidaiton dumin jiki da kuma motsawa. Binciken ya nuna cewa duk da cewa jelar ta wani karamin kakan kadangare ce, abin na nuna cewa gashin balagagge ne ba na dan tsako ba.
data.corrected_reference: Tsarin gashin fuka-fukan ya nuna cewa ba ana amfani da su ba ne domin tashi sama, sai dai domin samar da tsarin daidaiton dumin jiki da kuma motsawa. Binciken ya nuna cewa duk da cewa jelar ta wani karamin kakan kadangare ce, abin na nuna cewa gashin balagagge ne ba na dan tsako ba.

data.translation: Masu binciken sun ce, ko da yake wannan ita ce wutsiya ta wani matashi mai suna dinosaur, samfurin ya nuna gashin gashin wani mutum, ba na wata yarinya ba.
data.original_reference: Masu binciken sun nuna cewa, duk da cewa sun gamsu jelar ta kakannin kadangare ce, ta kuma nuna cewa ta balagagge ce ba jariri ba.

data.translation: Na farko daga cikin shawarwarin da ta bayar 78 shi ne cewa a kawo sabon shiri na diplomasiyya kafin karshen wannan shekara domin kare iyakar Iraki daga tsangwama na magabtani da kuma sake kafa alakar diplomasiyya da makwabta.

data.translation: Sanata da kuma uwargidan kasar Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner sun sanar da takararsu a matsayin shugaban kasa a jiya da yamma a birnin La Plata, da ke da nisan kilomita 50 daga birnin Buenos Aires.
data.original_reference: Majalisar dattijai da matar shugaban kasar Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner ta sanar da fitowar takarar shugaban kasa a yammacin jiya a La Plata, gari dake kilomita 50 (Mil 31) daga Buenos Aires.
data.corrected_reference: Majalisar dattijai da matar shugaban kasar Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner ta sanar da fitowar takarar shugaban kasa a yammacin jiya a La Plata, gari dake kilomita 50 (Mil 31) daga Buenos Aires.

data.translation: Mrs. Kirchner ta sanar da niyyar ta ta tsaya takarar shugaban kasa a gidan wasan kwaikwayo na Argentina, wuri guda da ta fara yakin neman zaben ta a shekarar 2005 a majalisar dattijai a matsayin mamba na tawagar lardin Buenos Aires.
data.original_reference: Mrs. Kirchner ta bayyana ra’niyyarta ta tsayawa takarar shugabanci a Gidan wasannin Argentina, wurin da ta yi amfani da shi domin fara kanfen ɗinta na takarar Majalisar Dattawa a shekarar 2005 a matsayinta na wakiliyar Buenos Aires.
data.corrected_reference: Mrs. Kirchner ta bayyana ra’niyyarta ta tsayawa takarar shugabanci a Gidan wasannin Argentina, wurin da ta yi amfani da shi domin fara kanfen ɗinta na takarar Majalisar Dattawa a shekarar 2005 a matsayinta na wakiliyar Buenos Aires.

data.translation: Wannan muhawara ta taso ne sakamakon jayayya game da kashe kudi a kan ayyukan agaji da sake gina bayan guguwar Katrina; wanda wasu masu ra'ayin mazan jiya suka yi ta da murmushi suna cewa "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
data.original_reference: Muhawarar ta samo asali sakamakon rudani game da kashe kudi wajen bada tallafi da sake gine-gine bayan faruwar guguwar katrina, abinda masu ra’ayin mazan jiya su ke tsokana da cewa “Cuwa-cuwar Bush ta New Orleans”
data.corrected_reference: Muhawarar ta samo asali sakamakon rudani game da kashe kudi wajen bada tallafi da sake gine-gine bayan faruwar guguwar katrina, abinda masu ra’ayin mazan jiya su ke tsokana da cewa “Cuwa-cuwar Bush ta New Orleans”

data.translation: Masu sukar aikin sake gina gida sun mayar da hankali ne ga ba da kwangila ga mutanen da suka yi tunanin cewa suna cikin birnin Washington.

data.translation: Firayim Minista Stephen Harper ya amince da aika da dokar gwamnati ta "Clean Air Act" ga kwamitin jam'iyyun don bita, kafin karatun ta biyu, bayan ganawar minti 25 da shugaban jam'iyyar NDP Jack Layton a PMO a ranar Talata.
data.original_reference: Firayi Minista Stephen Harper, ya amince da aika kudurin ‘Dokar “Tsarkakakkiyar Iska’ zuwa ga kwamitin gamayyar jam’iyyu don sake dubawa, kafin ayi mata karatu na biyu, bayan taron mintuna 25 na ranar Talata tare da shugaban jam’iyyar NDP Jack Layton a PMO.
data.corrected_reference: Firayi Minista Stephen Harper, ya amince da aika kudurin ‘Dokar “Tsarkakakkiyar Iska’ zuwa ga kwamitin gamayyar jam’iyyu don sake dubawa, kafin ayi mata karatu na biyu, bayan taron mintuna 25 na ranar Talata tare da shugaban jam’iyyar NDP Jack Layton a PMO.

data.translation: Layton ya nemi sauya dokokin muhalli na'yan adawa a lokacin ganawar da ya yi da Firayim Minista, yana neman "sake rubuta dokokin muhalli na'yan adawa gaba daya."
data.original_reference: Layton ya nemi canje-canje ga dokar ra’ayin mazan jiya yanayi lokacin haduwa da Firayim Ministan, yana tambaya don “cikakken sake rubutawar” dokan Jam'iyyar ra’ayin mazan jiya.
data.corrected_reference: Layton ya nemi canje-canje ga dokar ra’ayin mazan jiya yanayi lokacin haduwa da Firayim Ministan, yana tambaya don “cikakken sake rubutawar” dokan Jam'iyyar ra’ayin mazan jiya.

data.translation: Tun lokacin da gwamnatin tarayya ta shiga don karbar kudaden asibitin Mersey a Devonport, Tasmania, gwamnatin jihar da wasu 'yan majalisa na tarayya sun soki wannan aikin a matsayin wani abin da ya faru kafin zaben tarayya da za a yi a watan Nuwamba.
data.original_reference: Tun daga lokacin da Gwamnatin Tarayya ta shiga daukar nauyin asibitin Mersey da ke Devonport, Tasmania, gwamnatin jihar da wasu ‘yan majalisar tarayya sun soki wannan aikin a matsayin ci gaban shirin zaben tarayya da za a kira a watan Nuwamba.
data.corrected_reference: Tun daga lokacin da Gwamnatin Tarayya ta shiga daukar nauyin asibitin Mersey da ke Devonport, Tasmania, gwamnatin jihar da wasu ‘yan majalisar tarayya sun soki wannan aikin a matsayin ci gaban shirin zaben tarayya da za a kira a watan Nuwamba.

data.translation: Amma Firayim Minista John Howard ya ce wannan doka ta kare asibitin ne kawai daga gwamnatin Tasmania ta rage shi, ta hanyar ba da karin AUD miliyan 45.

data.translation: A cewar sabon rahoton, ƙididdigar matakin teku ta nuna cewa tsunami ya taso.
data.original_reference: Labari na baya bayan nan ya nuna cewa, nazarin motsin teku na nuna alamun wata tsunami ta taso. Hakika an tabbatar da alamun tsunami a kusa da Pago da Niue.
data.corrected_reference: Labari na baya bayan nan ya nuna cewa, nazarin motsin teku na nuna alamun wata tsunami ta taso. Hakika an tabbatar da alamun tsunami a kusa da Pago da Niue.

data.translation: Babu wani mummunan lalacewa ko raunin da aka samu a Tonga, amma an rasa wutar lantarki na dan lokaci, wanda ya hana hukumomin Tonga karbar gargadin tsunami da PTWC ta bayar.
data.original_reference: Ba a sami wata mummunar barna ko jin ciwo a rahoton da ke fitowa daga Tonga ba, amma kuma wutar lantarki ta katse, abinda ya hana hukumomi samun sanarwar gargadin tsunami wanda hukumar PTWC ta bayar.
data.corrected_reference: Ba a sami wata mummunar barna ko jin ciwo a rahoton da ke fitowa daga Tonga ba, amma kuma wutar lantarki ta katse, abinda ya hana hukumomi samun sanarwar gargadin tsunami wanda hukumar PTWC ta bayar.

data.translation: Kakakin shugaban kasar Bush Gordon Johndroe ya kira alkawarin Koriya ta Arewa "babban mataki ne na cimma burin tabbatar da hana makaman nukiliya a yankin Koriya."
data.original_reference: Mai magana da yawun Bush Gordon Johndroe ya kira alwashin da Koriya ta Arewa ta yi “babban mataki ne ga burin cimma nasarar narkar da makaman nukiliya na zirin Koriya.”
data.corrected_reference: Mai magana da yawun Bush Gordon Johndroe ya kira alwashin da Koriya ta Arewa ta yi “babban mataki ne ga burin cimma nasarar narkar da makaman nukiliya na zirin Koriya.”

data.translation: Guguwar goma ta Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, ta samu karbuwa a tekun Atlantic a yau.

data.corrected_reference: Guguwar teku ta goma da aka sakawa suna Jerry a kakar guguwar tekun Atalantika ta fara a yau.

data.translation: Cibiyar Hurricane ta Kasa ta ce a wannan lokacin Jerry ba ya kawo barazana ga sauka.

data.translation: Gundumar ta tara, wadda ta yi ambaliyar sama da mita 20 a lokacin guguwar Katrina, a halin yanzu tana cikin ruwa mai tsayi kamar yadda ake rufe dam a kusa da ita.

data.translation: Mai kula da majalisar Adam Cuerden ya nuna takaici game da sharewar lokacin da ya yi magana da Wikinews a watan jiya.

data.translation: "Ya yi mana ƙarya tun farko. Na farko, ta hanyar yin kamar yana yin hakan ne saboda dalilai na doka. Na biyu, ta hanyar yin kamar yana sauraronmu, har sai da ya share fasaharsa."
data.original_reference: “Tun daga farko [Wales] ta yi mana karya. Na farko, ta hanyar yin kamar wannan saboda dalilai ne na doka. Na biyu, ta hanyar yin kamar yana sauraron mu, har zuwa goge fasaharsa.”
data.corrected_reference: “Tun daga farko [Wales] ta yi mana karya. Na farko, ta hanyar yin kamar wannan saboda dalilai ne na doka. Na biyu, ta hanyar yin kamar yana sauraron mu, har zuwa goge fasaharsa.”

data.translation: Wannan rashin jin daɗi na al'umma ya haifar da kokarin da ake yi na tsara manufofin da suka shafi jima'i ga shafin da ke da miliyoyin kafofin watsa labarai da aka ba da lasisi a fili.
data.original_reference: Fushin al’ummar ya kai ga ƙoƙarin da ake yi na samar da tsari dangane da al’amuran da suka jibanci jima’i a shafin da ke daukar miliyoyin kafafen yada labarai da ke da lasisi.

data.translation: An yi nazari ne game da wannan, amma an rubuta shirin ne don yin koyi da abubuwan da aka yi game da tauraron Sagittarius.
data.original_reference: Mafi yawancin aiki da aka yi a rubuce ne, amma an tsara tsarin ne domin bunkasa lura da ake wa taurarin Sagittarius.
data.corrected_reference: Mafi yawancin aiki da aka yi a rubuce ne, amma an tsara tsarin ne domin bunkasa lura da ake wa taurarin Sagittarius.

data.translation: Sakamakon da kungiyar ke nema zai kasance sakamakon karfin ruwa tsakanin duhu na galaxy da kuma duhu na Milky Way.
data.original_reference: Tasirin da ƙungiyar ke nema zai haifar ne ta hanyar karfi tsakanin igiyar ruwa tsakanin galaxy da Milky Way mai duhu.
data.corrected_reference: Tasirin da ƙungiyar ke nema zai haifar ne ta hanyar ƙarfi tsakanin igiyar ruwa tsakanin galaxy da Milky Way mai duhu.

data.translation: Kamar yadda wata yake jawo duniya ta jawo ruwa mai yawa, haka ma Milky Way take amfani da ƙarfinta a cikin tauraron Sagittarius.
data.original_reference: Kamar yadda maganadisun wata ya ke jan duniya, inda hakan ke haddasa murɗawar igiyar ruwa, haka dabakar milky way ke tasiri kan dabakar saggitarius.
data.corrected_reference: Kamar yadda maganadisun wata ya ke jan duniya, inda hakan ke haddasa murɗawar igiyar ruwa, haka dabakar milky way ke tasiri kan dabakar saggitarius.

data.translation: Masana kimiyya sun kammala cewa duhu yana shafar sauran duhu kamar yadda yake shafar na yau da kullum.
data.original_reference: Masana kimiyyar sun sami damar karkare bayani cewa lamarin baki zai iya shafar waninsa daidai da yadda lamarin da aka saba yake yi.
data.corrected_reference: Masana kimiyya sun yanke kan cewa dark matter tana yin tasirin akan wasu dark matter a yanayi iri daya da yadda sauran regular matter yakeyi.

data.translation: Wannan ka'idar ta ce mafi yawan abubuwa masu duhu a cikin galaxy suna cikin wani nau 'i na halo, kuma an yi su ne da ƙananan ƙwayoyin cuta.
data.original_reference: Wannan ka'idar tana cewa mafi akasarin duhun da ke kusa da galaxy ana samun shi ne a kusa da galaxy a wani nau'in halo, kuma an yi shi da kananan kananan kwayoyi.
data.corrected_reference: Wannan ka'idar tana cewa mafi akasarin duhun da ke kusa da galaxy ana samun shi ne a kusa da galaxy a wani nau'in halo, kuma an yi shi da kananan kananan kwayoyi.

data.translation: A cikin shekara guda, mutum mai kamuwa da cutar zai iya kamuwa da mutane 10 zuwa 15 da suka yi kusa da shi.

data.translation: Duk da haka, kashi na XDR-TB a cikin dukan rukunin mutanen da ke fama da tarin fuka har yanzu yana da ƙananan; 6,000 daga cikin jimlar mutane 330,000 da aka kamu da su a kowane lokaci a Afirka ta Kudu.
data.original_reference: Sai dai, kashin XDR-TB da ke jikin duk rukunin mutane da ke da tarin fuka har yanzu da alamar yana ƙasa; 6,000 daga cikin jimillar mutane 330,000 da suka kamu a kowane lokaci a Afirka ta Kudu.

data.translation: Wadannan tauraron dan adam, duka biyu sun yi nauyi fiye da fam 1,000, kuma suna tafiya da kimanin mil mil mil a awa daya, sun yi karo mil mil mil 491 a sama da duniya.

data.translation: Wani likita da ya yi aiki a asibitin yara na Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania za a tuhume shi da kisan kai bayan an gano mahaifiyarsa ta mutu a cikin akwatin motar ta a ranar Laraba, hukumomin Ohio sun ce.

data.translation: An samu Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, a Blue Ash, Ohio, wani gari mai nisa da ke da nisan mil 15 arewacin Cincinnati, yana kwance a kasa a gefen hanya a cikin T-shirt da tufafi na ciki a cikin wata jiha da ake ganin an yi amfani da kwayoyi sosai.

data.translation: Cutar ta sa gwamnatin Indiya ta dauki irin wadannan matakan kamar tura masu kama alade a yankunan da cutar ta shafa, rarraba dubban labule na kwan fuka da kuma yayyafa magungunan kashe ƙwayoyi.

data.translation: Gwamnatin kasar ta kuma yi alkawarin yin allurar rigakafin cutar kwakwalwa miliyan daya, wanda zai taimaka wajen shirya hukumomin lafiya a shekara mai zuwa.

data.translation: An kwashe motar daga wurin hatsarin ne da misalin karfe 1200 na ranar.

data.translation: Wani mutum da ke aiki a wani garage kusa da inda hatsarin ya faru ya ce: "Akwai yara suna jiran su tsallake hanya kuma duk suna ihu da kuka."

data.translation: Sauran batutuwan da ke kan ajanda a Bali sun hada da ceton gandun daji da suka rage a duniya, da kuma raba fasahohi don taimakawa kasashe masu tasowa su bunkasa cikin hanyoyi masu rage gurbatawa.
data.original_reference: Cikin abubuwan da za’a tattauna a Bali sun hada da yadda za’a ceci ragowar dazukan duniya, musanyar fasaha da yadda za’a taimakawa kasashe masu tasowa su rage gurbata muhalli.
data.corrected_reference: Cikin abubuwan da za’a tattauna a Bali sun hada da yadda za’a ceci ragowar dazukan duniya, musanyar fasaha da yadda za’a taimakawa kasashe masu tasowa su rage gurbata muhalli.

data.translation: Majalisar Dinkin Duniya na fatan kuma ta kammala wani asusu don taimakawa kasashen da zafin duniya ya shafa wajen magance tasirinsa.

data.translation: Za a iya ba da kuɗin zuwa gidajen da ba su da ambaliyar ruwa, da kuma inganta tsarin sarrafa ruwa da kuma rarraba amfanin gona.

data.translation: Ta kammala hakan ne saboda yawan maganganu masu kyau da kuma ƙarfafawa da mata da maza suka aiko mata da ke ƙarfafa ta ta cewa a dauki maganin rigakafi a matsayin bukata ta likita.

data.translation: Babu wani gargadi na tsunami da aka bayar, kuma a cewar hukumar ilimin lissafi ta Jakarta, ba za a bayar da gargadi na tsunami ba domin girgizar kasa ta kasa cika bukatar magnitude 6.5.

data.translation: Kungiyar kiwon lafiya ta Mangola, Médecins Sans Frontières da kuma Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya sun ce wannan ne mafi muni da aka samu a kasar.

data.translation: Kakakin kungiyar likitocin marasa iyaka, Richard Veerman ya ce: "Angola na fuskantar mafi munin annobar da ta taba barkewa kuma halin da ake ciki a Angola ya ci gaba da zama mara kyau," in ji shi.

data.translation: Wasan ya fara ne da karfe 10 na safe, tare da yanayi mai kyau, kuma ban da ruwan sama na tsakar safiya wanda ya sauƙaƙe da sauri, rana ce mai kyau don wasan kwallon kafa na 7.

data.translation: 'Yan wasan Afirka ta Kudu sun fara wasa da kyau a gasar, inda suka yi nasara da kashi 26 cikin 100 a kan Zambiya da ta kai matsayi na biyar.

data.translation: Tsaron da suka yi da horo, da kuma yadda suke kula da kwallon da kuma aikin da suka yi a matsayin ƙungiya sun sa su fice kuma ya bayyana sarai cewa wannan ita ce ƙungiyar da za a doke.

data.translation: Jami'an birnin Amsterdam da gidan kayan gargajiya na Anne Frank sun ce itacen yana dauke da naman kaza kuma yana da haɗari ga lafiyar jama'a yayin da suke jayayya cewa yana cikin hatsarin fadawa.

data.translation: Halin su na thermal ba shi da daidaito kamar manyan kogwanni a duniya waɗanda galibi suna riƙe da zafin jiki mai daidaitawa, amma yana da daidaito tare da waɗannan su ne zurfin ramuka a ƙasa, "in ji Glen Cushing na ƙungiyar Astrogeology na United States Geological Survey (USGS) da na Jami'ar Arewacin Arizona da ke cikin Flagstaff, Arizona.
data.original_reference: Halayyar ɗumi ba tsayayye ba ce kamar manyan koguna a cikin ƙasa waɗanda galibi su ke riƙe zafin jiki na yau da kullun, amma ya yi daidai da waɗannan kasancewarsu ramuka masu zurfi a cikin ƙasa,” in ji Glen Cushing na kungiyar Nazarin Albarkatun Ƙasa ta Amurka (USGS) Ƙungiyar Nazarin Taurari da kuma na Jami’ar Arewacin Arizona da ke a Flagstaff, Arizona.
data.corrected_reference: Halayyar ɗumi ba tsayayye ba ce kamar manyan koguna a cikin ƙasa waɗanda galibi su ke riƙe zafin jiki na yau da kullun, amma ya yi daidai da waɗannan kasancewarsu ramuka masu zurfi a cikin ƙasa,” in ji Glen Cushing na kungiyar Nazarin Albarkatun Ƙasa ta Amurka (USGS) Ƙungiyar Nazarin Taurari da kuma na Jami’ar Arewacin Arizona da ke a Flagstaff, Arizona.

data.translation: A Faransa, yin zabe ya kasance al'ada ta fasaha mai ƙarancin ƙarfi: masu jefa kuri'a suna ware kansu a cikin wani ɗaki, suna saka takarda da aka buga a gaba da ke nuna ɗan takarar da suka zaɓa a cikin ambulaf.
data.original_reference: A Faransa, zaɓe ya kasanace wani abu mai ƙarancin fasahar zamani: masu zaɓe na keɓe kansu a cikin wani akwati, suna saka wata bugaggiyar takarda da ke nuna ɗan takararsu a cikin wata ambulan.
data.corrected_reference: A Faransa, zaɓe ya kasanace wani abu mai ƙarancin fasahar zamani: masu zaɓe na keɓe kansu a cikin wani akwati, suna saka wata bugaggiyar takarda da ke nuna ɗan takararsu a cikin wata ambulan.

data.translation: Bayan jami'ai sun tabbatar da asalin mai jefa kuri'a, mai jefa kuri'a ya jefa kwandon a akwatin zabe ya kuma sanya hannu kan takardar zabe.

data.translation: Dokar zabe ta Faransa ta tsara tsarin da ya dace.
data.original_reference: Dokar zaɓen Faransa ta tsara yadda ake gudanar da zaɓe bisa matuƙar bin ƙa’ida.
data.corrected_reference: Dokar zaɓen Faransa ta tsara yadda ake gudanar da zaɓe bisa matuƙar bin ƙa’ida.

data.translation: Tun daga shekarar 1988, akwatunan zabe dole ne su kasance masu gaskiya domin masu jefa kuri'a da masu lura su shaida cewa babu wasu kwantena a lokacin da aka fara zabe kuma ba a ƙara wasu kwantena ba sai wadanda aka ƙidaya da kuma masu ba da izini su yi zabe.
data.original_reference: Tun daga 1988, dole ne akwatunan zabe su kasance ana ganin abin da ke cikinsu domin masu jefa ƙuri'a da masu sa ido su iya shaidar cewa babu wasu ambulan a ciki a farkon kada kuri'un da kuma cewa ba a kara wasu ambulan ba sai dai wadanda aka kidaya kuma daga masu zaɓe da aka tantance.
data.corrected_reference: Tun daga 1988, dole ne akwatunan zabe su kasance ana ganin abin da ke cikinsu domin masu jefa ƙuri'a da masu sa ido su iya shaidar cewa babu wasu ambulan a ciki a farkon kada kuri'un da kuma cewa ba a kara wasu ambulan ba sai dai wadanda aka kidaya kuma daga masu zaɓe da aka tantance.

data.translation: 'Yan takara za su iya aika da wakilai su shaida kowane bangare na aikin, kuma a maraice masu sa kai za su yi lissafin kuri 'u a karkashin kulawar da ta dace.
data.original_reference: 'Yan takarar na iya aika wakilai don su shaida kowane bangare na aikin. Da yamma, masu aikin sa kai suna kidaya kuri'u a karkashin kula mai karfi, suna bin takamaiman hanyoyin.
data.corrected_reference: Ƴan takarar na iya aika wakilai don su shaida kowane bangare na aikin. Da yamma, masu aikin sa kai suna kidaya kuri'u a karkashin kula mai ƙarfi, suna bin takamaiman hanyoyin.

data.translation: ASUS Eee PC, wanda aka fara fitarwa a duniya don rage farashin da kuma abubuwan aiki, ya zama babban batun a watan IT na Taipei na 2007.

data.translation: Amma kasuwar masu amfani da kwamfutar tafi-da-gidanka za ta kasance mai ban mamaki da kuma canzawa bayan ASUS ta sami lambar yabo ta 2007 ta Taiwan Sustainable Award ta Shugaba Yuan na Jamhuriyar China.

data.translation: Shafin yanar gizon tashar ya bayyana wasan kwaikwayon a matsayin "tsohuwar gidan wasan kwaikwayo na rediyo tare da sabon juzu'i da ban mamaki!"

data.translation: A farkon kwanakin, an nuna wasan kwaikwayon ne kawai a shafin rediyo na Intanet mai suna TogiNet Radio, wani shafin da ya mai da hankali kan rediyo na magana.

data.translation: An ce an ci gaba da yin fashi da yawa a daren jiya, saboda babu jami'an tsaro a titunan birnin.

data.translation: An tabbatar da cewa cutar ta cutar tsuntsaye mai cutar H5N1 ta kamu da wata mace da aka samu a ranar Litinin a wani wuri kusa da Lyon a gabashin Faransa.

data.translation: Faransa ita ce kasa ta bakwai a cikin Tarayyar Turai da ta kamu da cutar; bayan Austria, Jamus, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Girka da Italiya.

data.translation: A sakamakon haka, masu yin wasan kwaikwayon suna shan tabar wiwi a kan mataki, kuma gidan wasan kwaikwayon da kansa yana ƙarfafa masu sauraro su shiga.

data.translation: Tsohon shugaban majalisar wakilai Newt Gingrich, gwamnan Texas Rick Perry, da 'yar majalisa Michele Bachmann sun kammala a matsayi na hudu, na biyar, da na shida, bi da bi.
data.original_reference: Tsohon kakakin majalisar Newt Gingrich, gwamnan Texas Rick Perry, da uwargidan majalisar wakilai, Michele Bachmann sun gama a mataki na hudu, na biyar, da na shida, bi da bi.
data.corrected_reference: Tsohon kakakin majalisar Newt Gingrich, gwamnan Texas Rick Perry, da uwargidan majalisar wakilai, Michele Bachmann sun gama a mataki na hudu, na biyar, da na shida, bi da bi.

data.translation: Bayan sakamakon ya zo, Gingrich ya yaba wa Santorum, amma ya yi wa Romney magana mai tsanani, wanda a madadinsa aka yi tallan da ba su dace ba a yakin neman zabe a Iowa game da Gingrich.
data.original_reference: Bayan sakamakon ya shigo, Gingrich ya yaba wa Santorum, amma yana da kalmomi masu wuya ga Romney, wanda a madadinsa aka gabatar da tallan kamfe mara kyau a Iowa da Gingrich.
data.corrected_reference: Bayan sakamakon ya shigo, Gingrich ya yaba wa Santorum, amma yana da kalmomi masu wuya ga Romney, wanda a madadinsa aka gabatar da tallan kamfe mara kyau a Iowa da Gingrich.

data.translation: Perry ya bayyana cewa zai "koma Texas don kimanta sakamakon taron da za a yi a yau, don sanin ko akwai wata hanyar da zan samu a wannan tseren", amma daga baya ya ce zai ci gaba da tseren kuma ya yi takara a zaben farko na 21 ga watan Janairu a South Carolina.
data.original_reference: Perry ya fadi cewa zai “dawo Texas domin tantance sakamakon caucus na daren nan, in tantance ko akwai ko akwai alaman ci gaba man a wannan tsere”, amma daga baya ya ce zai ci gaba da tseren sannan ya yi gasan fid da gwani ran 21 ga Janairu a South Carolina.
data.corrected_reference: Perry ya fadi cewa zai “dawo Texas domin tantance sakamakon caucus na daren nan, in tantance ko akwai ko akwai alaman ci gaba man a wannan tsere”, amma daga baya ya ce zai ci gaba da tseren sannan ya yi gasan fid da gwani ran 21 ga Janairu a South Carolina.

data.translation: A wata sanarwa, Bieber ya ce "ban kasance a wurin ba kuma ba na da hannu kai tsaye a wannan mummunan hatsarin, tunanina da addu'ata suna tare da iyalan wanda aka kashe."
data.original_reference: An ruwaito cewa yana cikin shekaran sa na 20 ne. A cikin wata sanarwa, Bieber ya ce “duk da ya ke ba na wurin kuma ba ni da hannu kai tsaye cikin wannan mummunan hadarin, tunani da addu'o’ina suna tare da dangin waɗanda abin ya rutsa da su.”

data.translation: Shafin labarai na nishaɗi na TMZ ya fahimci cewa mai daukar hoto ya dakatar da motarsa a wancan gefen Sepulveda Boulevard kuma yayi kokarin daukar hotuna na tashar 'yan sanda kafin ya tsallake hanya sannan ya ci gaba, wanda ya sa jami'in' yan sanda na California Highway Patrol ya gudanar da tashar mota ya umarce shi ya koma fadin, sau biyu.
data.original_reference: Shagin yanar-gizo na labarun nishaɗi na TMZ ya fahimta cewa mai ɗaukar hoto ɗin ya tsayar da motsarsa a tsallaken titin Sepulveda Boulevard kuma ya yi ƙoƙarin ɗaukar hotuna na tsayawar 'yan sanda kafin ya tsallaka titin kuma ya ci gaba, wanda ya sa ɗan sanda na Sintirin Babbar Hanya ta California wanda yake ba da hannu ya umarce shi ya koma a ƙetare, sau biyu.
data.corrected_reference: Shagin yanar-gizo na labarun nishaɗi na TMZ ya fahimta cewa mai ɗaukar hoto ɗin ya tsayar da motsarsa a tsallaken titin Sepulveda Boulevard kuma ya yi ƙoƙarin ɗaukar hotuna na tsayawar ƴan sanda kafin ya tsallaka titin kuma ya ci gaba, wanda ya sa ɗan sanda na Sintirin Babbar Hanya ta California wanda yake ba da hannu ya umarce shi ya koma a ƙetare, sau biyu.

data.translation: Sun hada da Netherlands, inda Anna Jochemsen ta kammala ta tara a cikin rukunin mata a Super-G a jiya, da kuma Finland tare da Katja Saarinen ta kammala ta goma a wannan taron.

data.translation: Mitchell Gourley na Australia ya kammala matsayi na 11 a gasar Super-G na maza. Oldrich Jelinek dan wasan Czech ya kammala matsayi na 16 a gasar Super-G na maza.
data.original_reference: Mitchell Gourley na Ostiraliya ya gama na goma sha ɗaya a cikin tsayuwar Super-G na maza. Ɗan gasar Czech Oldrich Jelinek ya gama na goma sha shida a cikin Super-G na zaunen maza.

data.translation: Arly Velasquez na Mexico ya kammala matsayi na 15 a gasar maza ta Super-G. Adam Hall na New Zealand ya kammala matsayi na 9 a gasar maza ta Super-G.
data.original_reference: Arly Velasquez na kasar Mexico ya ƙare a matsayin na goma sha biyar a jerin Super-G na maza na zaune. Adam Hall na New Zealand ya ƙare a matsayin na tara a Suƙer-G na maza na tsaye.

data.translation: 'Yan wasan Poland masu fama da matsalar gani Maciej Krezel da kuma mai ba da shawara Anna Ogarzynska sun kammala a matsayi na 13 a Super-G. Jong Seork Park na Koriya ta Kudu ya kammala a matsayi na 24 a Super-G na maza.
data.original_reference: Mazaje na Poland masu fama da rashin gani a wasan ƙwallon ƙafa Maciej Krezel da jagorar Anna Ogarzynska sun gama na goma sha uku a gasar Super-G. Jong Seork Park na Koriya ta Kudu ya kammala na ashirin da huɗu a gasar maza ta Super-G.
data.corrected_reference: Mazaje na Poland masu fama da rashin gani a wasan ƙwallon ƙafa Maciej Krezel da jagorar Anna Ogarzynska sun gama na goma sha uku a gasar Super-G. Jong Seork Park na Koriya ta Kudu ya kammala na ashirin da huɗu a gasar maza ta Super-G.

data.translation: Ma'aikatan kiyaye zaman lafiya na Majalisar Dinkin Duniya, wadanda suka isa Haiti bayan girgizar kasa ta 2010, ana zargin su da yada cutar da ta fara kusa da sansanin sojojin.
data.original_reference: Rundunar samar da zaman lafiya na UN wadanda suka shiga kasar Haiti bayan girgizan kasa a shekarar 2010 na da alhakin yaduwar cutar wanda ya fara a gari kusa da masaukin rundunar.
data.corrected_reference: Ana tuhumar ma'aikatun majalisar dinkin duniya da suka zo Haiti bayan girgizar kasar shekarar2010 da yada cutuka wayenda suka fara ne daga kusa da mazaunar su.

data.translation: A cewar karar, ba a tsabtace shara daga sansanin Majalisar Dinkin Duniya yadda ya kamata ba, wanda ya sa kwayoyin suka shiga kogin Artibonite, daya daga cikin manyan kogin Haiti.
data.original_reference: A cewar karar, ba a tsaftace bata daga zangon UN kamar yadda ya kamata ba, ya haddasa kwayoyin cuta shigan ruwa wadda yake kwarara cikin Rafin Artibonite, daya daga ciki babba a Haiti.
data.corrected_reference: A cewar karar, ba a tsaftace bata daga zangon UN kamar yadda ya kamata ba, ya haddasa kwayoyin cuta shigan ruwa wadda yake kwarara cikin Rafin Artibonite, daya daga ciki babba a Haiti.

data.translation: Kafin isowar sojojin, Haiti ba ta fuskanci matsaloli da suka shafi cutar ba tun daga shekarun 1800.
data.original_reference: Kafin isowar sojoji, Haiti bata taba fuskantar matsalolin da suka shafi cutar ba tun a shekarun 1800s.
data.corrected_reference: Kafin isowar sojoji, Haiti bata taba fuskantar matsalolin da suka shafi cutar ba tun a shekarun 1800s.

data.translation: Cibiyar Adalci da Dimokradiyya ta Haiti ta yi nuni ga binciken da aka yi da kansa wanda ya nuna cewa rundunar sojojin kasar Nepal ta Majalisar Dinkin Duniya ta kai cutar Haiti ba tare da sanin ta ba.
data.original_reference: Cibiyar Tabbatar da Adalci da Demokradiyya ta ƙasar Haiti ta nakalto waɗansu ayyukan nazari masu zaman kansu waɗanda ke tsammanin bataliyar kiyaye zaman lafiya ta Majalisar Ɗinkin Duniya da ke Nepal ce ta kawo cutar Haiti bisa rashin sani.
data.corrected_reference: Cibiyar Tabbatar da Adalci da Demokradiyya ta ƙasar Haiti ta nakalto waɗansu ayyukan nazari masu zaman kansu waɗanda ke tsammanin bataliyar kiyaye zaman lafiya ta Majalisar Ɗinkin Duniya da ke Nepal ce ta kawo cutar Haiti bisa rashin sani.

data.translation: Danielle Lantagne, gwani a Majalisar Dinkin Duniya kan cutar, ta ce, ana iya ganin sojojin da ke tabbatar da zaman lafiya ne suka haddasa cutar.
data.original_reference: Danielle Lantagne, ƙwararriyar masaniyar Majalisar Dinkin Duniya kan cutar, ta bayyana cewa mai yiyuwa ne sojojin kiyaye zaman lafiya suka haifar da cutar.
data.corrected_reference: Danielle Lantagne, ƙwararriyar masaniyar Majalisar Dinkin Duniya kan cutar, ta bayyana cewa mai yiyuwa ne sojojin kiyaye zaman lafiya suka haifar da cutar.

data.translation: Asibitin ya bi ka'idodin da ake bi don hana kamuwa da cuta, ciki har da ware mai haƙuri daga wasu don hana yiwuwar kamuwa da wasu.

data.translation: Bayan haka, rahotanni sun bayyana cewa an yi wa jirgin barazanar yin amfani da bam kuma an koma Afghanistan, inda ya sauka a Kandahar.

data.translation: Rashin hatsarin sama na kowa ne a Iran, wadda ke da jirgin sama mai tsufa wanda ba a kula da shi sosai ba a ayyukan farar hula da na soja.

data.translation: Sanctions na kasa da kasa sun sa ba za a iya sayen sababbin jiragen sama ba.

data.translation: A farkon wannan makon, hatsarin jirgin saman 'yan sanda ya kashe mutane uku kuma ya jikkata wasu uku.
data.original_reference: A farkon makon nan ne, wani jirgi mai saukar ungulu na yan sanda ya yi hadari inda mutane uku suka rasa rayukansu yayinda wasu ukun su ka jikkata.

data.translation: A watan jiya ne Iran ta fuskanci mummunar bala'in da ta yi a saman sama a cikin shekaru da yawa, lokacin da wani jirgin sama da ke zuwa Armenia ya fadi, ya kashe mutane 168 da ke cikin jirgin.
data.original_reference: Watan da ta gabata Iran ta fuskanci bala’i mafi tsanani a shekaru da wata jirgin sama da ke hanyar zuwa Armenia ta fadi, ta kashe duka mutane 168 da ke ciki.
data.corrected_reference: Watan da ta gabata Iran ta fuskanci bala’i mafi tsanani a shekaru da wata jirgin sama da ke hanyar zuwa Armenia ta fadi, ta kashe duka mutane 168 da ke ciki.

data.translation: A wannan watan ne wani jirgin sama ya mamaye wani titin tashi a Mashhad ya kai hari kan bango, ya kashe mutane 17.

data.corrected_reference: A dai wannan watan ne wani jirgin saman ya kauce daga kan titin da jirgi yake tafiya a kai kafin tsahinsa a Mashad inda ya bugi wata katanga, tare da kashe mutum sha bakwai.

data.translation: A bikin baje kolin wasan Tokyo da aka yi a ranar Alhamis, shugaban kamfanin Nintendo Satoru Iwata ya gabatar da tsarin sarrafawa na sabon kwamfutar Nintendo Revolution.

data.corrected_reference: A lokacin gabatar da babban bayani na ranar Alhamis a Nunin Wasan Tokyo, shugaban Nintendo Satoru Iwata ya kaddamar da tsarin sarrafawa na sabuwar na’urar Nintendo Re volution.

data.translation: Kamar na'urar talabijin mai nesa, mai sarrafawa yana amfani da na'urori masu auna sigina biyu da aka sanya kusa da talabijin na mai amfani don gano matsayinta a sararin samaniya.
data.original_reference: Kamar da abun kuna talabijin daga nesa wato remote, mai sarrafawa yana amfani da na’urorin sunsuna guda biyu da aka sanya kusa da talabijin ɗin mai amfani don daidaita matsayinta a cikin sarari mai fuska uku.
data.corrected_reference: Kamar makunnin talabijin, makunnin abun yana amfani da sanser biyu da aka jona kusa da talabijin din don a iya gane inta take.

data.translation: Wannan zai ba 'yan wasa damar sarrafa ayyuka da motsi a cikin wasannin bidiyo ta hanyar motsa na'urar ta cikin iska.

data.translation: Giancarlo Fisichella ya rasa ikon mallakar motarsa kuma ya gama tseren jim kadan bayan farawar.

data.translation: Abokin aikinsa Fernando Alonso ya jagoranci mafi yawan tseren, amma ya gama shi bayan ya tsaya a cikin rami, wataƙila saboda an saka ƙafafun gaba na dama da kyau.
data.original_reference: Abokin wasansa Fernando Alonso shi ne kan gaba a mafi wasane, amma ya tsaya bayan dakatawar zango, watakila saboda lanƙwashewar wilin tayar gaba na ɓangaren dama ne.
data.corrected_reference: Abokin wasansa Fernando Alonso shi ne kan gaba a mafi wasane, amma ya tsaya bayan dakatawar zango, watakila saboda lanƙwashewar wilin tayar gaba na ɓangaren dama ne.

data.translation: Michael Schumacher ya kawo karshen tserensa ba da daɗewa ba bayan Alonso, saboda lalacewar dakatarwar a cikin yaƙe-yaƙe da yawa a lokacin tseren.
data.original_reference: Michael Schumacher ya gama tserensa ba da daɗewa ba bayan Alonso, saboda lalacewar dakatarwa a yaƙe-yaƙe da yawa yayin tseren.

data.translation: Bayan minti biyar a cikin nuni iska ta fara juyawa, kimanin minti daya daga baya, iska ta kai 70km / h... sannan ruwan sama ya zo, amma da karfi da kuma haka babba cewa ta buga fata kamar allura, sa 'nan da halicci ya fadi daga sama, mutane suna firgita da ihu da kuma gudu a kan juna.
data.original_reference: Mintuna biyar da fara nunin wata iska ya fara shigowa ciki, kusan minti daya daga baya, iskar ta doshi 70km/h... daga baya ruwan sama yazo, amma da yawa da karfinsa ya sauko yadda zai bugi fatarka kamar allura, saannan wani kankara ya fado daga sama, mutane suna firgita suna kururuwa suna tattake juna.
data.corrected_reference: Mintuna biyar da fara nunin wata iska ya fara shigowa ciki, kusan minti daya daga baya, iskar ta doshi 70km/h... daga baya ruwan sama yazo, amma da yawa da ƙarfinsa ya sauko yadda zai bugi fatarka kamar allura, saannan wani kankara ya fado daga sama, mutane suna firgita suna kururuwa suna tattake juna.

data.translation: Abubuwan da ke cikin waɗannan lu'ulu'u sun yi daidai da waɗanda aka samu a cikin fitsarin dabbobi masu cutar idan aka kwatanta da su ta hanyar infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

data.translation: Gwamnan California Arnold Schwarzenegger ya sanya hannu kan dokar da ta hana sayar da ko hayar wasannin bidiyo masu tashin hankali ga 'yan kasa.
data.original_reference: Gwamnan California Arnold Schwarzenegger ya sanya hannu a cikin wata doka da ta hana sayarwa ko hayar wasannin bidiyo mai tashin hankali ga ƙananan yara.
data.corrected_reference: Gwamnan California Arnold Schwarzenegger ya sanya hannu a cikin wata doka da ta hana sayarwa ko hayar wasannin bidiyo mai tashin hankali ga ƙananan yara.

data.translation: Dokar ta bukaci a sanya alamar wasan bidiyo masu tashin hankali da ake sayar da su a jihar California da cewa "18" kuma ta sanya sayar da su ga wani karamin yaro da za a yi masa hukunci da tarar dala 1000 a kowace laifi.
data.original_reference: Dokar na bukatar a sanya wa wasannin bidiyo na tashin hankali da ake sayarwa a jihar California alama da ke nuna “18” inda ya zamo sayar da su ga kananan yara laifi ne mai jawo hukuncin tarar $1000 a kowane laifi.
data.corrected_reference: Dokar na bukatar a sanya wa wasannin bidiyo na tashin hankali da ake sayarwa a jihar California alama da ke nuna “18” inda ya zamo sayar da su ga kananan yara laifi ne mai jawo hukuncin tarar $1000 a kowane laifi.

data.translation: Daraktan Harkokin Shari'a, Kier Starmer QC, ya ba da wata sanarwa a safiyar yau inda ya sanar da tuhumar Huhne da Pryce.

data.corrected_reference: Darektan gabatar da kara na hukumar, Kier Starmer QC, a safiyar yau ya sanar da gurfanar da mutanen biyu, Huhne da Pryce, a gaban shari’a.

data.translation: Huhne ya yi murabus kuma za a maye gurbinsa a majalisar ta Ed Davey dan majalisar dokoki Norman Lamb dan majalisar dokoki ne ake sa ran zai karbi mukamin ministan harkokin kasuwanci da Davey ke barin.
data.original_reference: Huhne ya yi murabus kuma za a maye gurbinsa a Majalisar da Dan Majalisa Ed Davey. Ana tsammanin Dan Majalisa Norman Lamb zai zama Ministan Kasuwanci aikin da Job Davey zai ajiye.
data.corrected_reference: Huhne ya yi murabus kuma za a maye gurbinsa a Majalisar da Dan Majalisa Ed Davey. Ana tsammanin Dan Majalisa Norman Lamb zai zama Ministan Kasuwanci aikin da Job Davey zai ajiye.

data.corrected_reference: Huhne da Pryce an shirya za su bayyana a Kotun Majistare ta Westminster a ranar 16 ga Fabrairu.

data.translation: Edgar Veguilla ya samu raunuka a hannu da baki yayin da Kristoffer Schneider ya bar yana bukatar tiyata don gyara fuskarsa.

data.corrected_reference: Edgar Veguilla ya sami raunuka a hannusa da muƙamuƙi yayin da aka bar Kristoffer Schneider yana buƙatar tiyata ta gyaran fuskar sa.

data.translation: Makamin Uka ya gaza yayin da yake nuna kai ga mutum na biyar. Schneider yana ci gaba da ciwo, makanta a ido daya, wani ɓangaren da ya ɓace na kwakwalwa da kuma fuskar da aka sake gina daga titanium.
data.original_reference: Makamin Uka ya kasa yayin da yake auna kan mutum na biyar. Schneider na da raɗaɗi da ke gudana, makanta a ido daya, wani bangaren ƙoƙon kai da ya ɓata da fuska da aka sake ginawa daga titanium.
data.corrected_reference: Makamin Uka ya kasa yayin da yake auna kan mutum na biyar. Schneider na da raɗaɗi da ke gudana, makanta a ido daya, wani bangaren ƙoƙon kai da ya ɓata da fuska da aka sake ginawa daga titanium.

data.translation: Schneider ya shaida ta hanyar bidiyo daga sansanin sojin Amurka a kasarsa.
data.original_reference: Schneider ya ba da shaida ta wurin video link daga tashar USAF a kasarsa na haihuwa.
data.corrected_reference: Schneider ya ba da shaida ta wurin video link daga tashar USAF a kasarsa na haihuwa.

data.translation: Tana tsare a tsare har sai an shigar da ita a gaban kotu, amma duk wata shaida ta gani za ta iya zama ta lalace saboda an wallafa hotonta sosai.

data.translation: Wannan al'ada ce da aka saba yi a wasu wurare a Birtaniya amma shari'ar Scotland ta yi aiki daban kuma kotuna sun dauki wallafa hotuna a matsayin abin da zai iya cutar da mutane.
data.original_reference: Wannan shi ne abin gama gari a wasu wurare a cikin Ingila amma adalci na Scottish yana aiki daban kuma kotunan suna kallon wallafa hotunan a matsayin mai yuwuwar wariya.

data.translation: Farfesa Pamela Ferguson daga Jami'ar Dundee ta lura "'yan jarida suna tafiya a cikin layi mai hatsari idan sun buga hotuna da sauransu na wadanda ake zargi."

data.translation: Ofishin Gwamnati, wanda ke da alhakin tuhumar, ya sanar da 'yan jarida cewa ba za a sake yin tsokaci ba, a kalla har sai an shigar da kara.

data.translation: A cewar rahoton, takardar za ta yi magana ne game da rikici na kan iyaka, wanda Palestine ke so bisa kan iyakokin da suka gabata kafin yakin Gabas ta Tsakiya na 1967.

data.corrected_reference: Takardar, gwargwadon fallasar, za ta yi magana ne kan rikicin iyakoki, wanda Falasɗinawa ke son ya ɗora shi kan iyakokin kafin Yaƙin Gabas ta Tsakiya na 1967.

data.translation: Masu harbi a cikin gwajin kari na hana kwayar cuta za su yi wa masu kula da gidan wuta ido sosai, yayin da ake sa ido kan gwajin kuma ana tantance tasirinsa.

data.translation: A cikin haɗin gwiwar NPWS da Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, an karɓi ƙwararrun masu sa kai, a ƙarƙashin shirin farautar Sporting Shooters Association.
data.original_reference: A cikin haɗin gwiwar NPWS da Sportungiyar Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, an ɗauki ƙwararrun masu sa kai, a ƙarƙashin shirin wasannin kungiyar maharba.

data.translation: A cewar Mick O 'Flynn, Darakta mai aiki na Conservation Park da Heritage tare da NPWS,' yan bindiga hudu da aka zaba don aikin harbi na farko sun sami cikakkiyar koyarwar tsaro da horo.
data.original_reference: A cewar Mick O'Flynn, na'ibin Daraktan na Park Conservation da Heritage tare da NPWS, maharban guda hudu da aka zaba don aikin harbi na farko sun sami cikakken tsaro da horo.
data.corrected_reference: A cewar Mick O'Flynn, na'ibin Daraktan na Park Conservation da Heritage tare da NPWS, maharban guda hudu da aka zaba don aikin harbi na farko sun sami cikakken tsaro da horo.

data.translation: Martelly ya rantsar da sabon majalisar zabe ta wucin gadi (CEP) ta mambobi tara a jiya.

data.corrected_reference: Martelly ya rantsar da sabuwar Kwamitin Zabe na Wucin-gadi (CEP) mai membobi guda tara.

data.translation: Wannan shi ne shugaban kasa na biyar na Martelly a cikin shekaru hudu.
data.original_reference: Shi ne CEP Matelly na biyar cikin shekara hudu.
data.corrected_reference: Shi ne CEP Matelly na biyar cikin shekara hudu.

data.translation: A watan jiya, wani kwamiti na shugaban kasa ya bada shawarar cewa shugaban kasar ya yi murabus a matsayin wani bangare na matakan da za su sa kasar ta koma ga sabon zabe.
data.original_reference: A watan da ya gabata ne wani kwamiti na shugaban kasa ya ba da shawarar murabus din CEP tun gabani a matsayin bangare na kunshin daukar matakan ciyar da kasar gaba zuwa sabon zabe.
data.corrected_reference: A watan da ya gabata ne wani kwamiti na shugaban kasa ya ba da shawarar murabus din CEP tun gabani a matsayin bangare na kunshin daukar matakan ciyar da kasar gaba zuwa sabon zabe.

data.translation: Hukumar ta kasance martani ga Martelly ga zanga-zangar adawa da mulkin da ta fara a watan Oktoba.

data.translation: Tommy Dreamer ya ce "Luna ita ce Sarauniyar Extreme ta farko, kociyata ta farko, Luna ta rasu a daren wata biyu, ta kasance ta musamman kamar ita, mace mai karfi."

data.translation: Dustin "Goldust" Runnels ya ce "Luna ta kasance mai ban mamaki kamar ni... watakila ma fiye da haka... son ta kuma za ta rasa ta... fatan ta kasance a wuri mafi kyau."
