data.translation: Ana nuna matakin pH ta yawan Hydrogen (H a pH) ions a cikin sinadarin da aka gwada.
data.original_reference: Ana nuna matakin pH ta hanyar yawan sinadarin Hydrogen (na H a cikin pH) kwayoyin dake cikin sunadaran da aka gwada.
data.corrected_reference: Ana nuna matakin pH ta hanyar yawan sinadarin Hydrogen (na H a cikin pH) kwayoyin dake cikin sunadaran da aka gwada.

data.translation: Ions na hydrogen sune protons waɗanda aka cire su daga electrons (tunda atoms na hydrogen sun ƙunshi proton daya da electron daya).
data.original_reference: Sinadiran Hydrogen sune proton wadanda suka cire wa Electrons (tunda sunadaran Hydrogen sun kunshi proton daya da electron daya).
data.corrected_reference: Sinadiran Hydrogen sune proton wadanda suka cire wa Electrons (tunda sunadaran Hydrogen sun kunshi proton daya da electron daya).

data.translation: Ka haɗa foda biyu masu bushewa tare, sa 'nan kuma, da hannayensu masu tsabta, ka matsa su cikin kwalliya.
data.original_reference: Cakuda busassun garin filawar guda biyu sannan yin amfani da wankakken hannu mara laima, sai ka dunkule su waje guda.
data.corrected_reference: A juya hodojin tare, sannan a sa hannu mai dan danshi a cura su zuwa dan kwallo.

data.translation: Ruwa a hannayenka zai yi tasiri a kan yadudduka na waje, wanda zai zama abin ban dariya kuma ya zama wani nau'i na kwalliya.
data.original_reference: Laimar da ke hannayenka za ta haɗe da fatar waje, inda zai zama abin nishaɗi kuma zai haifar da wani rin kwanso.
data.corrected_reference: Laimar da ke hannayenka za ta haɗe da fatar waje, inda zai zama abin nishaɗi kuma zai haifar da wani rin kwanso.

data.translation: A birnin Harappa da Mohenjo-daro, akwai gidan wanka a kusan kowane gida, wanda aka haɗa da tsarin ruwa mai zurfi.
data.original_reference: Biranen Harappa da Mohenjo-daro suna da banɗaki mai ruwa a kusan kowane gida, wanda su ke haɗe wani kyakkyawa tsarin magudanar najasa.
data.corrected_reference: Biranen Harappa da Mohenjo-daro suna da banɗaki mai ruwa a kusan kowane gida, wanda su ke haɗe wani kyakkyawa tsarin magudanar najasa.

data.translation: An gano ragowar hanyoyin ruwa a gidajen biranen Minoan na Crete da Santorini a Girka.
data.original_reference: An samo ragowar tsarin shara a gidajen biranen Minoan na Crete da Santorini da ke Girka.
data.corrected_reference: An samo ragowar tsarin shara a gidajen biranen Minoan na Crete da Santorini da ke Girka.

data.translation: A zamanin dā, a Masar da Farisa da kuma China, ana yin amfani da wanka a gidajen wanka inda maza da mata suke tare a cikin jama'a.
data.original_reference: Hakanan akwai bandakuna a zamanin d Misira, Farisa da China. A cikin wayewar Roman, wasu lokuta bayan gida wani bangare ne na gidajen wanka na jama'a inda maza da mata suke tare a cikin haɗin gwiwa.
data.corrected_reference: Hakanan akwai bandakuna a zamanin d Misira, Farisa da China. A cikin wayewar Roman, wasu lokuta bayan gida wani bangare ne na gidajen wanka na jama'a inda maza da mata suke tare a cikin haɗin gwiwa.

data.translation: Idan ka kira wani da ke nesa da ka, kana amfani da tauraron dan adam.
data.original_reference: Lokacin da kuka kira wanda yake da nisan duban mil kuna amfani da tauraron dan adam.
data.corrected_reference: Lokacin da kuka kira wanda yake da nisan duban mil kuna amfani da tauraron dan adam.

data.translation: Wata tauraron dan adam a sararin samaniya ta karɓi kira sannan ta sake mayar da shi, kusan nan take.
data.original_reference: Tauraron dan adam a sararin samaniya yana samun kira sannan yana nuna shi baya ƙasa, kusan nan take.
data.corrected_reference: Tauraron dan adam a sararin samaniya yana samun kira sannan yana nuna shi baya ƙasa, kusan nan take.

data.translation: An tura tauraron dan adam zuwa sararin samaniya ta hanyar roka. Masana kimiyya suna amfani da masu kallo a sararin samaniya domin yanayin duniya yana karkatar da wasu daga cikin haskenmu da kuma hangen nesa.
data.original_reference: An aika tauraron dan adam zuwa sararin samaniya ta hanyar roka. Masana kimiyya suna amfani da madubin hangen nesa a sararin samaniya saboda yanayin duniya yana gurbata wasu haskenmu da kallo.
data.corrected_reference: An aika tauraron dan adam zuwa sararin samaniya ta hanyar roka. Masana kimiyya suna amfani da madubin hangen nesa a sararin samaniya saboda yanayin duniya yana gurbata wasu haskenmu da kallo.

data.translation: Ana bukatar babbar roka mai tsayi fiye da mita 100 don shigar da tauraron dan adam ko kuma telescope a sararin samaniya.
data.original_reference: Yana daukan katon kunbo fiye da tsawon kafa 100 domin sanya tauraron dan adam ko abin kawo nesa kusa a sararin sama.
data.corrected_reference: Yana daukan katon kunbo fiye da tsawon kafa 100 domin sanya tauraron dan adam ko abin kawo nesa kusa a sararin sama.

data.translation: Daura ta sauya duniya ta hanyoyi masu ban mamaki, kuma mafi girma da ke cikin abin da ta yi mana shine ta ba mu sauƙin sufuri da sauri.
data.original_reference: Gare garen ta canza duniyan a hanyoyi na ban mamaki. Abu mafi girma da gare garen ta yi mana shine ta bamu hanyoyi masu sauki na sufuri.
data.corrected_reference: Gare garen ta canza duniyan a hanyoyi na ban mamaki. Abu mafi girma da gare garen ta yi mana shine ta bamu hanyoyi masu sauki na sufuri.

data.translation: Ya kawo mana jirgin kasa, mota, da kuma wasu na'urori masu yawa na sufuri.
data.original_reference: Lamarin ne ya kawo mana jirgin kasa, mota da hanyoyin sufuri da dama.
data.corrected_reference: Lamarin ne ya kawo mana jirgin kasa, mota da hanyoyin sufuri da dama.

data.translation: A karkashin su akwai wasu cats masu matsakaicin girma wadanda suke cin ganima mai matsakaicin girma daga zomo zuwa antelope da deer.
data.original_reference: Karkashin su akwai wasu maguna masu matsakaicin yanayi wadanda ke cin abinci mai madaidaicin yanayi wanda ya fara daga zomaye zuwa barewa da barewan daji.
data.corrected_reference: Karkashin su akwai wasu maguna masu matsakaicin yanayi wadanda ke cin abinci mai madaidaicin yanayi wanda ya fara daga zomaye zuwa barewa da barewan daji.

data.translation: A ƙarshe, akwai ƙananan cats (har da ƙananan gidaje masu haɗari) da yawa waɗanda suke cin ƙananan ganima kamar kwari, tsatsa, lizards, da tsuntsaye.
data.original_reference: Da karshe, akwai kananan kyanwoyi (da suka haɗa da kyanwoyin gida da suka gudu) da suke cin kananan naman da suka kama kamar kwari, ɓeraye, kadangaru, da tsuntsaye.
data.corrected_reference: Da karshe, akwai kananan kyanwoyi (da suka haɗa da kyanwoyin gida da suka gudu) da suke cin kananan naman da suka kama kamar kwari, ɓeraye, kadangaru, da tsuntsaye.

data.translation: Sirrin nasararsu shi ne ra'ayin da ake kira niche, wani aiki na musamman da kowane cat yake da shi wanda ke hana shi yin gasa da wasu.
data.original_reference: Sirrin nasararsu ita ce tsarinsu na samun hutu, aiki na musamman da kowace kyanwa ke riko da shi domin kaucewa yin gasa da sauran.
data.corrected_reference: Sirrin nasararsu ita ce tsarinsu na samun hutu, aiki na musamman da kowace kyanwa ke riko da shi domin kaucewa yin gasa da sauran.

data.translation: Zaki ne mafi yawan cats zamantakewa, zaune a cikin manyan kungiyoyin kira Prides.
data.original_reference: Zakuna ne dangin mage da suka fi daɗin ma’amala, suna taruwa wuri ɗaya abin da ake kira iko.
data.corrected_reference: Zakuna ne dangin mage da suka fi daɗin ma’amala, suna taruwa wuri ɗaya abin da ake kira iko.

data.translation: Ƙananan 'yan mata suna da mazaje guda uku da suka kai mazaje uku, da kuma' yan mata da 'ya'ya'ya maza talatin.
data.original_reference: Garken zaki sun kunshi maza manya daya zuwa uku masu dangantaka, tare da mata da dama har zuwa talatin tare da ‘ya’ya.
data.corrected_reference: Garken zaki sun kunshi maza manya daya zuwa uku masu dangantaka, tare da mata da dama har zuwa talatin tare da ‘ya’ya.

data.translation: A yawancin lokaci, 'yan mata suna da nasaba da juna, kuma suna da' yan'uwa mata da mata.
data.original_reference: Mata yawanci suna da kusanci da juna, kasancewa babban dangi na yan uwa da 'ya'ya mata.
data.corrected_reference: Mata yawanci suna da kusanci da juna, kasancewa babban dangi na yan uwa da ƴaƴa mata.

data.translation: Zaki masu girman kai suna yin kama da garken zaki ko karnuka, dabbobi masu kama da zakoki (amma ba sauran manyan kuliyoyi ba) a cikin hali, kuma suna da matukar kisa ga ganimar su.
data.original_reference: Taruwar zakuna suna kamar rukunin kyar ko karnuka, dabbobi wanda suka yi kamar da zaki (amma ba sauran manyan kuliyoyi ba) a cikin hali, kuma suna da matukar cutarwa ga abincin su.
data.corrected_reference: Taruwar zakuna suna kamar rukunin kyar ko karnuka, dabbobi wanda suka yi kamar da zaki (amma ba sauran manyan kuliyoyi ba) a cikin hali, kuma suna da matukar cutarwa ga abincin su.

data.translation: A matsayin ɗan wasa mai kyau, tiger zai iya hawa (ko da yake ba shi da kyau), yin iyo, tsalle nisa da kuma jan da karfi sau biyar na mutum mai karfi.
data.original_reference: Mai gudu sosai, damisa zai iya hawa (amma ba maikyau ba) yi iwo, tsalen nesa sosai da kuma ja so biya kamar kafin mutum.
data.corrected_reference: Mai gudu sosai, damisa zai iya hawa (amma ba maikyau ba) yi iwo, tsalen nesa sosai da kuma ja so biya kamar kafin mutum.

data.translation: Tigers suna cikin rukuni ɗaya (Jin Panthera) da zakoki, leopards, da jaguars.
data.original_reference: Damisar Tiger tana cikin rukuni guda (Genus Panthera) kamar zakuna, damisar leopards, da jaguars. Wadannan dangin kyanwar guda huɗu sune kaɗai su ke iya ruri.
data.corrected_reference: Damisar Tiger tana cikin rukuni guda (Genus Panthera) kamar zakuna, damisar leopards, da jaguars. Wadannan dangin kyanwar guda huɗu sune kaɗai su ke iya ruri.

data.translation: Muryar zaki ba kamar muryar zaki ba ce, amma kamar magana ce ta murya mai ƙarfi.
data.original_reference: Rurin damisa bai yi kama da cikeke ƙarfin murya zaki ba, amma ya fi kama da gurnani na jimlar kalmomin da aka faɗa da ƙarfi.
data.corrected_reference: Rurin damisa bai yi kama da cikeke ƙarfin murya zaki ba, amma ya fi kama da gurnani na jimlar kalmomin da aka faɗa da ƙarfi.

data.translation: Ocelots suna son cin kananan dabbobi. Za su kama dawakai, macizai, rodents da tsuntsaye idan za su iya.
data.original_reference: 'Yan wasa suna son cin kananan dabbobi. Za su kama birai, macizai, zazzage da tsuntsaye in sun iya. Kusan dukkan dabbobin da dutsen ya farauto suna ƙasa da shi.
data.corrected_reference: Ƴan wasa suna son cin kananan dabbobi. Za su kama birai, macizai, zazzage da tsuntsaye in sun iya. Kusan dukkan dabbobin da dutsen ya farauto suna ƙasa da shi.

data.translation: Masana kimiyya sun yi imanin cewa ocelots suna bin su kuma suna samun dabbobi da za su ci (ƙara) ta hanyar wari, suna hango inda suka kasance a ƙasa.
data.original_reference: Masana ilimin kimiyya suna tunanin cewa ocelots na bin dabbobi da kama su ta hanyar sansanar sawun inda su ka bi su ka wuce.
data.corrected_reference: Masana ilimin kimiyya suna tunanin cewa ocelots na bin dabbobi da kama su ta hanyar sansanar sawun inda su ka bi su ka wuce.

data.translation: Suna iya gani sosai a cikin duhu da hangen nesa na dare, kuma suna motsawa sosai a ɓoye, kuma Ocelots suna farautar ganimarsu ta hanyar haɗuwa da abubuwan da ke kewaye da su sannan su yi tsalle a kan ganimarsu.
data.original_reference: Suna iya gani sosai cikin duhu tare da ganin na dare, kuma suna tafiya cikin sanɗa. Kyanwar daji na farautar abin farautar su ta hanyar sajewa da wurin da su ke sannan su dirar wa abin farautar su.
data.corrected_reference: Suna iya gani sosai cikin duhu tare da ganin na dare, kuma suna tafiya cikin sanɗa. Kyanwar daji na farautar abin farautar su ta hanyar sajewa da wurin da su ke sannan su dirar wa abin farautar su.

data.translation: Lokacin da wani karamin rukuni na halittu masu rai (ƙaramin yawan) ya rabu da babban yawan da suka fito daga (kamar idan sun motsa ta hanyar dutse ko kogin, ko kuma idan sun koma wani sabon tsibiri don haka ba za su iya komawa baya ba) sau da yawa za su sami kansu a cikin yanayi daban-daban fiye da yadda suke a baya.
data.original_reference: Yayin da wani karamin gungun dabbobi (jama’a kadan) su ka kasance sun rabu da babban gungun da su ke ciki (misali idan su ka koma kan wasu jerin tsaunuka, ko wani kogi ko kuma su ka koma wani sabon tsibirin yadda ba zasu iya komowa ba) akasari su kan sami kansu a muhalli na daban da inda su ka fito.
data.corrected_reference: Yayin da wani karamin gungun dabbobi (jama’a kadan) su ka kasance sun rabu da babban gungun da su ke ciki (misali idan su ka koma kan wasu jerin tsaunuka, ko wani kogi ko kuma su ka koma wani sabon tsibirin yadda ba zasu iya komowa ba) akasari su kan sami kansu a muhalli na daban da inda su ka fito.

data.translation: Wannan sabon yanayi yana da albarkatu daban-daban da kuma masu fafatawa daban-daban, don haka sabon al'umma zai buƙaci siffofi daban-daban ko kuma daidaitawa don zama mai fafatawa mai ƙarfi fiye da yadda suke bukata a baya.
data.original_reference: Wannan sabon muhallin yana da albarkatu daban da kuma masu gasa daban, don haka sabuwar al’umma za ta buƙaci mabambantan fasali ko karɓuwa don zama ƙaƙƙarfar mai gasafiye da abin da su ka buƙata a baya.
data.corrected_reference: Wannan sabon muhallin yana da albarkatu daban da kuma masu gasa daban, don haka sabuwar al’umma za ta buƙaci mabambantan fasali ko karɓuwa don zama ƙaƙƙarfar mai gasafiye da abin da su ka buƙata a baya.

data.translation: Yawan mutanen da suka fito daga baya ba su canza ba, har yanzu suna bukatar daidaitawa kamar yadda suke a dā.
data.original_reference: Asalin al’umman basu canza ba ko kadan, suna bukatan karbuwa kamar da.
data.corrected_reference: Asalin al’umman basu canza ba ko kadan, suna bukatan karbuwa kamar da.

data.translation: Bayan lokaci, yayin da sabon al'umma ke soma daidaitawa da sabon muhallin, sai su zama kamar sauran al'umma.
data.original_reference: A kan lokaci, yayin da sabbin yawan jama’a suka fara daidaita da sabon yanayin su, sai su fara dawo kadan da kadan kamar waɗancan yawan jama'a.
data.corrected_reference: A kan lokaci, yayin da sabbin yawan jama’a suka fara daidaita da sabon yanayin su, sai su fara dawo kadan da kadan kamar waɗancan yawan jama'a.

data.translation: Daga karshe, bayan dubban ko ma miliyoyin shekaru, wadannan al'ummomin biyu za su yi kama da juna sosai da ba za a iya kiran su iri daya ba.
data.original_reference: A ƙarshe, bayan dubun dubbai ko ma shekaru miliyoyi, yawar jama’a biyu za su zauna da banbancin da ba za a kira su da wannan jinsin ba.
data.corrected_reference: A ƙarshe, bayan dubun dubbai ko ma shekaru miliyoyi, yawar jama’a biyu za su zauna da banbancin da ba za a kira su da wannan jinsin ba.

data.translation: Muna kiran wannan tsari nau'ikan jinsuna, wanda ke nufin samar da sababbin jinsuna.
data.original_reference: Samar da sabon jinsi, hanya ce mai mahimmanci wadda ba za’a iya kauce mata ba a cikin tsarin asalin halittu.
data.corrected_reference: Samar da sabon jinsi, hanya ce mai mahimmanci wadda ba za’a iya kauce mata ba a cikin tsarin asalin halittu.

data.translation: Shuke - shuke suna samar da iskar oxygen da mutane suke numfashi, kuma suna shan carbon dioxide da mutane suke numfashi (watau numfashi).
data.original_reference: Shuke-shuke suna sanya iskar oxygen wanda mutane ke shaka, kuma suna shan iskar carbon-dioxide wanda mutane ke fitarwa (ma'ana fitar da iska).
data.corrected_reference: Shuke-shuke suna sanya iskar oxygen wanda mutane ke shaka, kuma suna shan iskar carbon-dioxide wanda mutane ke fitarwa (ma'ana fitar da iska).

data.translation: A cikin rana, tsire-tsire suna yin abinci ta hanyar hasken rana.
data.original_reference: Tsire-tsire suna yin abincinsu daga rana ta hanyar hotuna. Suna kuma bayar da inuwa.
data.corrected_reference: Tsire-tsire suna yin abincinsu daga rana ta hanyar hotuna. Suna kuma bayar da inuwa.

data.translation: Muna yin gidaje da tsire-tsire, muna yin tufafi da tsire-tsire. Abincin da muke ci da yawa tsire-tsire ne.
data.original_reference: Muna gina gidajenmu ne daga itatuwa kuma muna yin sitirunmu daga itatuwa. Mafi yawan abincin da muke ci daga tsirrai ne. Idan babu tsirrai, mutane da dabbobi ba za su rayu ba.
data.corrected_reference: Muna gina gidajenmu ne daga itatuwa kuma muna yin sitirunmu daga itatuwa. Mafi yawan abincin da muke ci daga tsirrai ne. Idan babu tsirrai, mutane da dabbobi ba za su rayu ba.

data.translation: Mosasaurus shi ne mafi girman mai cin amanar lokacinsa, don haka bai ji tsoron komai ba, sai dai sauran mosasaurs.
data.original_reference: Mosasaurus ita ce babbar dabbar da ke farautar dabbobi a zamaninta, don haka bata fargabar komi ba, in ban da dabbobin Mosasaurs.
data.corrected_reference: Mosasaurus ita ce babbar dabbar da ke farautar dabbobi a zamaninta, don haka bata fargabar komi ba, in ban da dabbobin Mosasaurs.

data.translation: Ƙafafunsa masu tsawo sun cika da haƙoransa masu kaifi kamar na gogewa fiye da 70, da kuma ƙarin haƙoransa a saman bakinsa, wanda ke nufin cewa babu wani abin da zai tsere daga hanyarsa.
data.original_reference: Dogon haban sa sun cika da hakora masu ci kamar reza sama da 70, tare da ƙarin saiti a cikin rufin bakinsa, ma'ana babu mafaka ga wani abu wanda ya ketare hanyar sa.
data.corrected_reference: Dogon haban sa sun cika da hakora masu ci kamar reza sama da 70, tare da ƙarin saiti a cikin rufin bakinsa, ma'ana babu mafaka ga wani abu wanda ya ketare hanyar sa.

data.translation: Ba mu san tabbas ba, amma yana iya samun harshe mai banƙyama. Abincinsa ya hada da turtles, manyan kifi, sauran mosasaur, kuma yana iya zama ɗan adam.
data.original_reference: Tabbas bamu sani ba, amma yana iya kasancewa yana da harshe mai reshe. Abincinta ya haɗa da kunkuru, babban kifi, sauran mosasaurs, kuma yana iya kasancewa mai cin mutane ne.
data.corrected_reference: Bamuda tabbaci amma watakila yana da harshe me cokali me yatsu. abincin shi ya hada dodon kodi, manyan kifaye, da wasu masosaurs kuma zai iya akwai mai cin nama.

data.translation: Har ila yau, ya kai hari ga duk abin da ya shiga cikin ruwa; har ma da wani babban dinosaur kamar T. rex ba zai iya yin daidai da shi ba.
data.original_reference: Ta na kai wa duk wani abu farmaki da ya shiga ruwan, ko da kuwa gabjejen kakan kadangare mai suna T.Rex ba zai iya ja da shi ba.
data.corrected_reference: Ta na kai wa duk wani abu farmaki da ya shiga ruwan, ko da kuwa gabjejen kakan kadangare mai suna T.Rex ba zai iya ja da shi ba.

data.translation: Ko da yake yawancin abincin da suke ci ya saba mana, Romawa suna da abinci mai ban mamaki da ba a saba ba, kamar su alade, fage, ƙuda, da kuma wani nau'in dabbar da ake kira ƙugiya
data.original_reference: Duk da yake yawancin abincinsu zai zama sananne gare mu, Romawa suna da nasu yankin na baƙin bukukuwa ko abubuwan biki da ba a saba da su ba, da suka haɗa da akuyar daji, dawisu, dodon-koɗi, da kuma wani nau’in ɓera da ake kira dormousee
data.corrected_reference: Duk da yake yawancin abincinsu zai zama sananne gare mu, Romawa suna da nasu yankin na baƙin bukukuwa ko abubuwan biki da ba a saba da su ba, da suka haɗa da akuyar daji, dawisu, dodon-koɗi, da kuma wani nau’in ɓera da ake kira dormousee

data.translation: Wani bambanci kuma shi ne, matalauta da matalauta suna cin abinci suna zaune a kujeru, amma masu arziki suna jin daɗin cin abinci tare inda suke kwanciya a gefen gefen gefen su yayin da suke cin abinci.
data.original_reference: Wani banbamcin kuma shi ne talakawa da kuma mata sun cinye abincinsu yayin da suke zaune a kan kujeru, masu hannu da shuni kuma suna son cin abinci tare a inda suke zama a manya-manyan dakunan shakatawa domin cin abincin.
data.corrected_reference: Wani banbamcin kuma shi ne talakawa da kuma mata sun cinye abincinsu yayin da suke zaune a kan kujeru, masu hannu da shuni kuma suna son cin abinci tare a inda suke zama a manya-manyan dakunan shakatawa domin cin abincin.

data.translation: Abincin tsohuwar Romawa ba zai iya kasancewa da abinci da ya zo Turai daga Amurka ko daga Asiya a ƙarni na gaba ba.
data.original_reference: Cikin abubuwan da ake ci a tsohuwar daular Rum, ba zai kasance abincin da ya zo Turai daga Amurka ba ko kuma daga Asia a karnonin da su ka zo daga baya.
data.corrected_reference: Cikin abubuwan da ake ci a tsohuwar daular Rum, ba zai kasance abincin da ya zo Turai daga Amurka ba ko kuma daga Asia a karnonin da su ka zo daga baya.

data.translation: Misali, ba su da masara, ba tumatir, ba dankali, ba cacao, kuma babu wani tsohuwar Roman da ya taɓa ɗanɗano turkey.
data.original_reference: Alal misali, ba su da masara, babu tumatur, babu dankali. babu koko, kuma babu mutumin tsohuwar Rum da ya taɓa ɗanɗana talotalo.
data.corrected_reference: Alal misali, ba su da masara, babu tumatur, babu dankali. babu koko, kuma babu mutumin tsohuwar Rum da ya taɓa ɗanɗana talotalo.

data.translation: Babilawa sun gina haikalin da ake kira gidan allahnsu.
data.original_reference: Yan Babylon sun gina wa kowanne allansu haikali da ya zama matsayin gidan allan.
data.corrected_reference: Yan Babylon sun gina wa kowanne allansu haikali da ya zama matsayin gidan allan.

data.translation: Mutane suna miƙa hadayu ga alloli kuma firistoci suna ƙoƙarin biyan bukatun alloli ta hanyar bukukuwa da bukukuwa.
data.original_reference: Mutane za su kawo hadaya ga abubuwan bauta yayin da malaman bautar za su yi ƙoƙarin biyan buƙatun abubuwan bautar ta hanyar bukukuwa da shagulgula.
data.corrected_reference: Mutane za su kawo hadaya ga abubuwan bauta yayin da malaman bautar za su yi ƙoƙarin biyan buƙatun abubuwan bautar ta hanyar bukukuwa da shagulgula.

data.translation: Kowane haikali yana da farfajiyar haikali da ke buɗe kuma bayan haka akwai wuri mai tsarki na ciki inda firistoci ne kaɗai za su iya shiga.
data.original_reference: Kowane wajen bauta tana da budaden haraba tare da kebantaccen mihrabi wanda limamai kadai ke shiga.
data.corrected_reference: Kowane wajen bauta tana da budaden haraba tare da kebantaccen mihrabi wanda limamai kadai ke shiga.

data.translation: A wasu lokatai, ana gina hasumiyoyi masu siffar dala, da ake kira ziggurats, don su kasance wani ɓangare na haikalin.
data.original_reference: Wasu lokuta an gina hasumiya na musamman mai siffar dala, wanda ake kira ziggurats, domin su zama sashi na haikali.
data.corrected_reference: Wasu lokuta an gina hasumiya na musamman mai siffar dala, wanda ake kira ziggurats, domin su zama sashi na haikali.

data.translation: A saman hasumiyar, akwai wuri mai tsarki na musamman ga allah.
data.original_reference: Saman hasumiyar wuri ne na musamman na abun bautan.
data.corrected_reference: Saman hasumiyar wuri ne na musamman na abun bautan.

data.translation: A yankin Gabas ta Tsakiya, gidan ba shi da muhimmanci sosai.
data.original_reference: A cikin yanayi mai zafi na Gabas ta tsakiya, gida ba shi da matuƙar mahimmanci.
data.corrected_reference: A cikin yanayi mai zafi na Gabas ta tsakiya, gida ba shi da matuƙar mahimmanci.

data.translation: Yawancin rayuwar iyalin Ibraniyawa ta faru ne a waje.
data.original_reference: Yawancin rayuwar dangin Ibrananci sun faru ne a sararin sama.
data.corrected_reference: Yawancin rayuwar dangin Ibrananci sun faru ne a sararin sama.

data.translation: Mata suna dafa abinci a cikin gida, shaguna suna buɗewa suna kallon titi.
data.original_reference: Mata sun yi girki a farfajiyar; shagunan buɗe ido ne kawai suna kallon titi. An yi amfani da dutse don gina gidaje.
data.corrected_reference: Mata sun yi girki a farfajiyar; shagunan buɗe ido ne kawai suna kallon titi. An yi amfani da dutse don gina gidaje.

data.translation: Ba a samun gandun daji a ƙasar Kan'ana sosai, saboda haka itace yana da tsada sosai.
data.original_reference: Babu wani daji mai girma a ƙasar Kan'ana, saboda haka katako yana da tsada.
data.corrected_reference: Babu wani daji mai girma a ƙasar Kan'ana, saboda haka katako yana da tsada.

data.translation: A cikin tarihin Norse sai aka ce an kori Erik Red daga Iceland saboda kisan kai, kuma a lokacin da ya yi tafiya zuwa yamma, ya gano Greenland ya sa masa suna Greenland.
data.original_reference: An zauna a Greenland a warwatse. A cikin yankin Norse sun ce an kori Erik the Red daga Iceland saboda kisan kai, kuma lokacin da ya kaɗa ya yi yamma, sai ya gano Greenland kuma ya ba ta suna Greenland.
data.corrected_reference: An zauna a Greenland a warwatse. A cikin yankin Norse sun ce an kori Erik the Red daga Iceland saboda kisan kai, kuma lokacin da ya kaɗa ya yi yamma, sai ya gano Greenland kuma ya ba ta suna Greenland.

data.translation: Amma ko da yake ya gano shi, ƙabilu Eskimo sun riga sun zauna a wurin a lokacin.
data.original_reference: Amma duk da ganowar sa, dama tuni ƙabilun Eskimo suna zaune a wurin a lokacin.
data.corrected_reference: Amma duk da ganowar sa, dama tuni ƙabilun Eskimo suna zaune a wurin a lokacin.

data.translation: Ko da yake kowace ƙasa "Scandinavian" ce, akwai bambance-bambance da yawa tsakanin mutane, sarakuna, al'adu da tarihin Denmark, Sweden, Norway da Iceland.
data.original_reference: Kodayake kowace ƙasa ta kasance 'Scandinavia', akwai bambance-bambance masu yawa tsakanin mutane, sarakuna, al'adu da tarihin Denmark, Sweden, Norway da Iceland.
data.corrected_reference: Kodayake kowace ƙasa ta kasance 'Scandinavia', akwai bambance-bambance masu yawa tsakanin mutane, sarakuna, al'adu da tarihin Denmark, Sweden, Norway da Iceland.

data.translation: Idan ka kalli fim din "National Treasure", za ka iya tunanin cewa an rubuta taswirar taskar a bayan Sanarwar 'Yancin kai.
data.original_reference: Idan ka kalli majigi mai suna National Treasure, za ka yi tsamanin an rubuta taswirar taska a bayan takardan Ƙudurin ‘Yancin Kai.
data.corrected_reference: Idan ka kalli majigi mai suna National Treasure, za ka yi tsamanin an rubuta taswirar taska a bayan takardan Ƙudurin ‘Yancin Kai.

data.translation: Ko da yake an rubuta wani abu a bayan takardar, ba taswirar dukiya ba ce.
data.original_reference: Sai dai kuma, wannan ba gaskiya ba ne. Duk da cewa akwai wani abu da aka rubuta a bayan daftarin, ba taswirar taskar arziki ba ce.
data.corrected_reference: Sai dai kuma, wannan ba gaskiya ba ne. Duk da cewa akwai wani abu da aka rubuta a bayan daftarin, ba taswirar taskar arziki ba ce.

data.translation: An rubuta a baya na Sanarwar 'Yancin kai kalmomin "Sanarwar' Yancin kai ta asali da aka yi ranar 4 ga Yuli, 1776".
data.original_reference: An rubuta a bayan Bayanin Samun 'Yancin kai kalmomin “Asalin Sanarwar Samun' Yanci ne a ranar 4 ga Yuli 1776”. Rubutun ya bayyana a ƙasan takardar, juye.
data.corrected_reference: An rubuta a bayan Bayanin Samun Ƴancin kai kalmomin “Asalin Sanarwar Samun' Yanci ne a ranar 4 ga Yuli 1776”. Rubutun ya bayyana a ƙasan takardar, juye.

data.translation: Ko da yake ba a san wanda ya rubuta shi ba, an san cewa a farkon rayuwarsa, an mirgine babban takarda (yana da girma na inci 29 3⁄4 da inci 24 1⁄2) don adanawa.
data.original_reference: A yayin da babu takamaiman wanda ya rubuta shi, an sani cewa a farkon rayuwar shi, babban takardan (yana daukar ma'aunin inci 29¾ zuwa inci 24½) an nada shi don ajiya.
data.corrected_reference: A yayin da babu takamaiman wanda ya rubuta shi, an sani cewa a farkon rayuwar shi, babban takardan (yana daukar ma'aunin inci 29¾ zuwa inci 24½) an nada shi don ajiya.

data.translation: Saboda haka, yana yiwuwa an ƙara bayanin a matsayin lakabi kawai.
data.original_reference: Don haka, da alama an ƙara tsarin rubutun ne kawai a matsayin laƙabi.
data.corrected_reference: Don haka, da alama an ƙara tsarin rubutun ne kawai a matsayin laƙabi.

data.translation: Kasashen da suka sauka a ranar D da kuma yakin da suka biyo baya sun 'yantar da arewacin Faransa, amma har yanzu kudancin ba shi da' yanci.
data.original_reference: Saukar D-Day da yaƙe-yaƙe masu zuwa sun 'yantar da arewacin Faransa, amma har yanzu kudanci bai sami yanci ba.
data.corrected_reference: Saukar D-Day da yaƙe-yaƙe masu zuwa sun ƴantar da arewacin Faransa, amma har yanzu kudanci bai sami yanci ba.

data.translation: Faransawan da suka yi zaman lafiya da Jamus a shekara ta 1940 sun yi aiki tare da masu mamayewa maimakon su yi yaƙi da su.
data.original_reference: Faransawa '' Vichy '' suka mallake shi. Waɗannan mutanen Faransa ne waɗanda suka yi sulhu da Jamusawa a 1940 kuma suka yi aiki tare da masu mamaye maimakon yaƙar su.
data.corrected_reference: Faransawa '' Vichy '' suka mallake shi. Waɗannan mutanen Faransa ne waɗanda suka yi sulhu da Jamusawa a 1940 kuma suka yi aiki tare da masu mamaye maimakon yaƙar su.

data.translation: Ranar 15 ga watan Agustan 1940, Allies sun mamaye kudancin Faransa, an kira wannan mamayewar "Operation Dragoon".
data.original_reference: A ranar 15 ga watan Agusta 1940, Kawayen sun mamaye kudancin Faransa, mamayar da aka yi wa lakabi da sunan “Operation Dragoon”.
data.corrected_reference: A ranar 15 ga watan Agusta 1940, Kawayen sun mamaye kudancin Faransa, mamayar da aka yi wa lakabi da sunan “Operation Dragoon”.

data.translation: A cikin makonni biyu ne sojojin Amurka da na Faransa suka 'yantar da kudancin Faransa kuma suka juya zuwa Jamus.
data.original_reference: A cikin makonni biyu kawai Amurkawa da Sojojin Faransa na 'yancin faransa suka 'yantar da kudancin Faransa kuma suka juya zuwa Jamus.
data.corrected_reference: A cikin makonni biyu kawai Amurkawa da Sojojin Faransa na ƴancin faransa suka ƴantar da kudancin Faransa kuma suka juya zuwa Jamus.

data.translation: Al'adu al'ada ce ta musamman da ke tattare da wani babban rukuni na mutane da ke rayuwa da aiki tare, al'umma.
data.original_reference: Wayewa al’ada ce guda wadda mutane da dama da ke zama da aiki tare na daukan nasu ce, al’umma.
data.corrected_reference: Wayewa al’ada ce guda wadda mutane da dama da ke zama da aiki tare na daukan nasu ce, al’umma.

data.translation: Kalmar wayewa ta fito ne daga Latin civilis, wanda ke nufin farar hula, wanda ke da alaƙa da Latin civis, wanda ke nufin dan kasa, da civitas, wanda ke nufin birni ko birni-jiha, kuma wannan ma ta wata hanya ya bayyana girman al'umma.
data.original_reference: Kalmar civilization ta zo ne daga kalmar latin civilis, ma’ana farar hula, mai dangantaka da civis na Latin, ma’ana yan kasa, da cavitas, ma’ana birni ko birnin-jiha, kuma yana ba da adadin yawan jama’a.
data.corrected_reference: Kalmar civilization ta zo ne daga kalmar latin civilis, ma’ana farar hula, mai dangantaka da civis na Latin, ma’ana yan kasa, da cavitas, ma’ana birni ko birnin-jiha, kuma yana ba da adadin yawan jama’a.

data.translation: Al'adun wayewa na nufin watsa ilimi a cikin tsararraki da yawa, da kuma yada ilimi a hanyar gaskiya.
data.original_reference: Biranen gari sune kashin bayan al'ummomi. Al'adar wayewar tana nuna wucewar ilimi a cikin tsararraki da yawa, rabe-raben al'adu da rarraba gaskiya.
data.corrected_reference: Biranen gari sune kashin bayan al'ummomi. Al'adar wayewar tana nuna wucewar ilimi a cikin tsararraki da yawa, rabe-raben al'adu da rarraba gaskiya.

data.translation: Ƙananan al'adu sukan ɓace ba tare da barin hujjoji na tarihi ba kuma ba a gane su a matsayin al'adu na gaskiya ba.
data.original_reference: kananun al’adu galibi su kan shuɗe ba tare da barin tabbatattun shaidu na tarihi ba kuma ba a saka su cikin jerin manyan zamunna.
data.corrected_reference: kananun al’adu galibi su kan shuɗe ba tare da barin tabbatattun shaidu na tarihi ba kuma ba a saka su cikin jerin manyan zamunna.

data.translation: A lokacin yakin juyin juya hali, jihohi goma sha uku sun fara kafa gwamnatin tsakiya mai rauni tare da majalisa ta zama bangarenta kawai a karkashin Dokokin Tarayya.
data.original_reference: A lokacin Yaƙin Juyin Juya Hali, jihohi goma sha ukun sun kafa gwamnatin tsakiya mai rauni - wadda ta kunshi Majalisa kawai - a ƙarƙashin dokar gwamnatin hadin gwiwa.
data.corrected_reference: A lokacin Yaƙin Juyin Juya Hali, jihohi goma sha ukun sun kafa gwamnatin tsakiya mai rauni - wadda ta kunshi Majalisa kawai - a ƙarƙashin dokar gwamnatin hadin gwiwa.

data.translation: Majalisa ba ta da iko ta ɗora haraji, kuma, saboda babu gwamnatin ƙasa ko hukuma, ta dogara ga hukumomin jihohi, waɗanda ba sa haɗin kai, don aiwatar da duk ayyukanta.
data.original_reference: Majalisa ba ta da wani iko na kakaba haraji, sannan kuma, kasancewar babu ɓangarorin zartaswa da na shari’a na ƙasar, ta dogara ne kan hukumomin jihohi, waɗanda mafi yawanci ba sa bayar da haɗin kai, wajen ganin an tilasta aiki da dokokin.
data.corrected_reference: Majalisa ba ta da wani iko na kakaba haraji, sannan kuma, kasancewar babu ɓangarorin zartaswa da na shari’a na ƙasar, ta dogara ne kan hukumomin jihohi, waɗanda mafi yawanci ba sa bayar da haɗin kai, wajen ganin an tilasta aiki da dokokin.

data.translation: Ba ta da ikon hana dokokin haraji da haraji tsakanin jihohi.
data.original_reference: Hakanan ba ta da ikon yin watsi da dokokin haraji da haraji tsakanin jihohi.
data.corrected_reference: Hakanan ba ta da ikon yin watsi da dokokin haraji da haraji tsakanin jihohi.

data.translation: Kalaman sun bukaci amincewar dukkan jihohi kafin a gyara su kuma jihohi sun dauki gwamnatin tsakiya da sauki har wakilai na su sukan kasance ba su da wuri.
data.original_reference: Labaran sun buƙaci yarjejeniya baki ɗaya daga dukkan jihohin kafin a iya gyara su kuma jihohi sun ɗauki gwamnatin tarraya a sauƙaƙe cewa wakilansu ba su nan.
data.corrected_reference: Labaran sun buƙaci yarjejeniya baki ɗaya daga dukkan jihohin kafin a iya gyara su kuma jihohi sun ɗauki gwamnatin tarraya a sauƙaƙe cewa wakilansu ba su nan.

data.translation: Kwallon kafa na Italiya, tare da tawagar kwallon kafa ta Jamus ita ce tawagar biyu mafi nasara a duniya kuma sun kasance'yan wasan gasar cin kofin duniya ta FIFA a 2006.
data.original_reference: Masu kwallon ƙafa ta ƙasar Italiya, tare da ƙungiyar ƙwallon ƙafa ta ƙasar Jamus ita ce ta biyu mafi nasara a duniya kuma sun kasance zakarun ƙwallon ƙafa na FIFA a 2006.
data.corrected_reference: Masu kwallon ƙafa ta ƙasar Italiya, tare da ƙungiyar ƙwallon ƙafa ta ƙasar Jamus ita ce ta biyu mafi nasara a duniya kuma sun kasance zakarun ƙwallon ƙafa na FIFA a 2006.

data.translation: Wasanni masu shahara sun hada da kwallon kafa, kwando, volleyball, water polo, fencing, rugby, keke, ice hockey, roller hockey da kuma F1 motor racing.
data.original_reference: Shahararrun wasanni sun hada da kwallon kafa, kwallon kwando, wasan kwallon raga, wasan ruwa, wasan takobi, wasan kwallon rugby, tseren kekuna, kwallon gora, wasan kwallon gorar kankara da na tseren motoci na F1.
data.corrected_reference: Shahararrun wasanni sun hada da kwallon kafa, kwallon kwando, wasan kwallon raga, wasan ruwa, wasan takobi, wasan kwallon rugby, tseren kekuna, kwallon gora, wasan kwallon gorar kankara da na tseren motoci na F1.

data.translation: Wasanni na hunturu sun fi shahara a yankunan Arewa, tare da Italiyanci suna yin gasa a wasannin duniya da gasar Olympics.
data.original_reference: Wasannin hunturu sun shahara a yankuna na Arewa, inda da Italiyawa su ke fafatawa a wasannin kasa da kasa da wasannin Olympic.
data.corrected_reference: Wasannin hunturu sun shahara a yankuna na Arewa, inda da Italiyawa su ke fafatawa a wasannin kasa da kasa da wasannin Olympic.

data.translation: Japan tana da tsibiri kusan 7,000 (babban shi ne Honshu), kuma wannan ya sa Japan ta zama tsibiri na 7 mafi girma a duniya!
data.original_reference: Japans suna riƙe da kusan tsibirai 7,000 (babba shine Honshu), yana mai sanya Japan tsibiri na 7 mafi girma a duniya!
data.corrected_reference: Japans suna riƙe da kusan tsibirai 7,000 (babba shine Honshu), yana mai sanya Japan tsibiri na 7 mafi girma a duniya!

data.translation: Saboda tarin tsibirai da Japan ke da su, ana kiran Japan sau da yawa, a matsayin "tsibiri"
data.original_reference: Saboda tari/rukunin tsibirai da Japan ke da su, sau da yawa akan kira Japan, a matsayin yanki, da suna “tarin tsibirai”.
data.corrected_reference: Saboda tari/rukunin tsibirai da Japan ke da su, sau da yawa akan kira Japan, a matsayin yanki, da suna “tarin tsibirai”.

data.translation: An fara amfani da Taiwan tun a ƙarni na 15 inda 'yan tekun Turai da suka wuce suka rubuta sunan tsibirin a matsayin Ilha Formosa, ko kuma tsibiri mai kyau.
data.original_reference: Farkon Taiwan ya faro tun baya cikin karni na 15 inda Turawa matukan jirgin ruwa da ke wucewa suka ɗauki sunan tsibirin a matsayin IIha Formosa, ko kyakyawan tsibiri.
data.corrected_reference: Farkon Taiwan ya faro tun baya cikin karni na 15 inda Turawa matukan jirgin ruwa da ke wucewa suka ɗauki sunan tsibirin a matsayin IIha Formosa, ko kyakyawan tsibiri.

data.translation: A shekara ta 1624, Kamfanin Dutch East India Company ya kafa wani sansani a kudu maso yammacin Taiwan, ya fara sauya tsarin samar da hatsi na 'yan asalin kasar kuma ya yi amfani da ma'aikatan kasar Sin don yin aiki a gonakin shinkafa da sukari.
data.original_reference: A cikin 1624, Kamfanin Dutch East India Company ya kafa tushe a kudu maso yammacin Taiwan, yana ƙaddamar da canji a cikin ayyukan noman hatsi na asali da ɗaukar ma'aikata na China don yin aiki a gonakin shinkafa da sukari.
data.corrected_reference: A cikin 1624, Kamfanin Dutch East India Company ya kafa tushe a kudu maso yammacin Taiwan, yana ƙaddamar da canji a cikin ayyukan noman hatsi na asali da ɗaukar ma'aikata na China don yin aiki a gonakin shinkafa da sukari.

data.translation: A shekara ta 1683, sojojin daular Qing (daga 1644 zuwa 1912) sun karɓi iko a yankin yammacin Taiwan da arewacin tekun Taiwan kuma sun ayyana Taiwan a matsayin lardin daular Qing a shekara ta 1885.
data.original_reference: A shekarar 1683, sojojin daular Qing (1644-1912) sun kwace ikon lardin Taiwan na yammacin da arewacin gabar teku, suka ayyana Taiwan a matsayin lardin daular Qing a shekarar 1885.
data.corrected_reference: A shekarar 1683, sojojin daular Qing (1644-1912) sun kwace ikon lardin Taiwan na yammacin da arewacin gabar teku, suka ayyana Taiwan a matsayin lardin daular Qing a shekarar 1885.

data.translation: A shekara ta 1895, bayan da aka yi nasara a yakin Sin da Japan na farko (1894-1895), gwamnatin Qing ta rattaba hannu kan Yarjejeniyar Shimonoseki, wadda ta ba da ikon mallakar Taiwan ga Japan, wadda ta yi mulki a tsibirin har zuwa 1945.
data.original_reference: A shekarar 1895, bayan kayarwa a cikin Farkon Yaƙin Sino-Japanese (1894-1895), gwamnatin Qing su sa-hannu a Yarjejeniyar Shimonoseki, ta wanda ta bayar da mulkin kan Taiwan zuwa ga Japan, wanda ya yi mulkin tsibirin har 1945.
data.corrected_reference: A shekarar 1895, bayan kayarwa a cikin Farkon Yaƙin Sino-Japanese (1894-1895), gwamnatin Qing su sa-hannu a Yarjejeniyar Shimonoseki, ta wanda ta bayar da mulkin kan Taiwan zuwa ga Japan, wanda ya yi mulkin tsibirin har 1945.

data.translation: Machu Picchu ya kunshi manyan gine-gine guda uku, wato Intihuatana, Haikalin Rana, da kuma dakin windows uku.
data.original_reference: Machu Picchu ya hada da tsari uku, masu suna Intihuatana, Temple of the Sun, da Room of the Three Windows.
data.corrected_reference: Machu Picchu ya hada da tsari uku, masu suna Intihuatana, Temple of the Sun, da Room of the Three Windows.

data.translation: An sake gina yawancin gine-ginen da ke gefen ginin don ya ba masu yawon bude ido damar fahimtar yadda suka fara.
data.original_reference: An sake gina mafi yawan gine-ginen da ke gefen rukunin ginin domin ƴan yawon buɗe ido su fahimci yadda asalin siffarsu ta ke.
data.corrected_reference: An sake gina mafi yawan gine-ginen da ke gefen rukunin ginin domin ƴan yawon buɗe ido su fahimci yadda asalin siffarsu ta ke.

data.translation: A shekara ta 1976, an sake gina kashi 30 cikin 100 na Machu Picchu kuma ana ci gaba da yin hakan har zuwa yau.
data.original_reference: Zuwa shekarar 1976, an farfado da kashi talatin na gine ginen Machu Picchu kuma har yanzu ana ci gaba da aikin.
data.corrected_reference: Zuwa shekarar 1976, an farfado da kashi talatin na gine ginen Machu Picchu kuma har yanzu ana ci gaba da aikin.

data.translation: Alal misali, tsarin daukar hoto na yau da kullum a duniya shine 35mm, wanda shine girman fim mai rinjaye a ƙarshen zamanin fim na analog.
data.original_reference: A misali, nau’in hoto marar motsi da aka fi sani a duniya shi ne 35mm, wanda shi ne girman fim na hoto da aka fi amfani da shi a ƙarshen zamanin fim ɗin hannu.
data.corrected_reference: A misali, nau’in hoto marar motsi da aka fi sani a duniya shi ne 35mm, wanda shi ne girman fim na hoto da aka fi amfani da shi a ƙarshen zamanin fim ɗin hannu.

data.translation: Har yanzu ana samar da shi a yau, amma mafi mahimmanci, an gaji nauyinsa ta hanyar tsarin na'urar daukar hoto ta kyamarar dijital.
data.original_reference: Har yau din nan ana sarrafa shi, amma muhimmin abu a nan kyamarar komi da ruwanka ce ta gaje shi da ke sunsuno hotuna.
data.corrected_reference: Har yau din nan ana sarrafa shi, amma muhimmin abu a nan kyamarar komi da ruwanka ce ta gaje shi da ke sunsuno hotuna.

data.translation: A gaskiya, tsarin 35mm, yana da ɗan rikicewa, 36mm a fadi da 24mm a tsawo.
data.original_reference: Abin mamaki shine zubin 35mm a haƙiƙa fadin 36mm ya ke da shi da kuma tsawon 24mm.
data.corrected_reference: Abin mamaki shine zubin 35mm a haƙiƙa fadin 36mm ya ke da shi da kuma tsawon 24mm.

data.translation: Saboda haka, ana cewa rabo na wannan tsari (raba ta goma sha biyu don samun mafi sauki rabo na lambobi masu yawa) shi ne 3: 2.
data.original_reference: A lissafin wannan tsarin (idan aka raba sha biyu domin samun adadi mafi karancin lamba) zai kasance a daidaiton 3:2.
data.corrected_reference: A lissafin wannan tsarin (idan aka raba sha biyu domin samun adadi mafi karancin lamba) zai kasance a daidaiton 3:2.

data.translation: Yawancin siffofi na yau da kullum (misali APS iyali na siffofi) sun yi daidai da wannan rabo ko kuma sun yi kusa da wannan rabo.
data.original_reference: Yawancin hanyoyin gama gari na yau da kullun (misali tsarin APS na iyali) ya kusa da wannan tsari.
data.corrected_reference: Yawancin hanyoyin gama gari na yau da kullun (misali tsarin APS na iyali) ya kusa da wannan tsari.

data.translation: Dokar uku da ake amfani da ita sosai da kuma yawanci ana yi mata ba'a ita ce wata hanya mai sauƙi da ke haifar da karfin hali yayin da ake kiyaye tsari a cikin hoto.
data.original_reference: Dokar na uku ɗin da aka fi saɓa ko wulaƙantar da ita wani ja-gora mai sauƙi ne da yake ƙirƙira canji yayin riƙewa wani aunin tsari a cikin wani hoto.
data.corrected_reference: Dokar da aka fi rainawa itace dokar gina dynamism tare da tabbatar da tsarin a hoto.

data.translation: Ya ce wuri mafi inganci ga babban batun shi ne a wurin da layin ke raba hoton zuwa kashi uku a tsaye da kuma a kwance (duba misali).
data.original_reference: Ya bayyana cewa wuri mafi mahimmanci a darasin shine mahadar layuka wanda ya raba hoton a tsaye da kuma a kwance (duba misali).
data.corrected_reference: Ya bayyana cewa wuri mafi mahimmanci a darasin shine mahadar layuka wanda ya raba hoton a tsaye da kuma a kwance (duba misali).

data.translation: A wannan lokacin da Turai ta soma zama mai arziki da iko, an yi wa cocin Katolika tawaye.
data.original_reference: A wannan lokaci na tarihin Tarayyan Turai, cocin Katolika, wadda ta yi karfi da arziki, ta fuskanci bincike.
data.corrected_reference: A wannan lokaci na tarihin Tarayyan Turai, cocin Katolika, wadda ta yi ƙarfi da arziki, ta fuskanci bincike.

data.translation: Fiye da shekara dubu, addinin Kirista ya haɗa kan ƙasashen Turai duk da bambancin yare da al'adu.
data.original_reference: Sama da shekara dubu addinin Kirista ya haɗe kasashen Turai waje guda duk da banbance banbance na harsuna da ala’adu.
data.corrected_reference: Sama da shekara dubu addinin Kirista ya haɗe kasashen Turai waje guda duk da banbance banbance na harsuna da ala’adu.

data.translation: Ƙarfinsa mai iko ya shafi kowa, daga sarki zuwa talakawa.
data.original_reference: Karfin barnansa ta shafe kowa daga sarki har na gama-gari.
data.corrected_reference: Ƙarfin barnansa ta shafe kowa daga sarki har na gama-gari.

data.translation: Ɗaya daga cikin manyan koyarwar Kirista shi ne cewa dole ne a yi amfani da dukiya don kawar da wahala da talauci kuma cewa kuɗin kuɗi na coci yana wurin musamman don wannan dalili.
data.original_reference: Daya daga cikin shishikan addinin krista shine yin amfani da arziki wajen magance matsaloli da kuma yakar talauci sannan kuma jami’in kudi na cocin suna can musamman saboda wannan dalilin.
data.corrected_reference: Daya daga cikin shishikan addinin krista shine yin amfani da arziki wajen magance matsaloli da kuma yakar talauci sannan kuma jami’in kudi na cocin suna can musamman saboda wannan dalilin.

data.translation: Ikilisiyar ta yi mulki a Roma fiye da shekara dubu kuma wannan taro na iko da kuɗi ya sa mutane da yawa suka yi tambaya ko ana bin wannan ka'idar.
data.original_reference: Babban cibiyar shugabancin coci ta kasance a Roma sama da dubban shekaru kuma mayar da arziki da mulki can ya jawo cece-kuce game da ko ana bin wannan shikashikin.
data.corrected_reference: Babban cibiyar shugabancin coci ta kasance a Roma sama da dubban shekaru kuma mayar da arziki da mulki can ya jawo cece-kuce game da ko ana bin wannan shikashikin.

data.translation: Ba da daɗewa ba bayan da aka soma yaƙi, Birtaniya ta soma ƙuntata Jamus ta ruwa.
data.original_reference: Jim kaɗan bayan ɓarkewar tashin hankalin, Birtaniya ta fara toshe mashigan ruwa na Jamus.
data.corrected_reference: Jim kaɗan bayan ɓarkewar tashin hankalin, Birtaniya ta fara toshe mashigan ruwa na Jamus.

data.translation: Wannan dabarar ta kasance da tasiri, ta hana sojoji da fararen hula wadata mai muhimmanci, ko da yake wannan takunkumi ya keta dokar kasa da kasa da aka amince da ita da yarjejeniyoyi da dama na duniya suka kafa a ƙarni biyu da suka gabata.
data.original_reference: Dabarun sun yi tasiri, hana shigar da muhimman kayayyakin soja da na farar hulla, ko da yake wannan toshewa ta sabawa dokoki na ƙasa da ƙasa waɗanda yarjejeniyoyin ƙasa da ƙasa da dama na ƙarnoni biyu da suka wuce suka tsara.
data.corrected_reference: Dabarun sun yi tasiri, hana shigar da muhimman kayayyakin soja da na farar hulla, ko da yake wannan toshewa ta sabawa dokoki na ƙasa da ƙasa waɗanda yarjejeniyoyin ƙasa da ƙasa da dama na ƙarnoni biyu da suka wuce suka tsara.

data.translation: Birtaniya ta yi amfani da ruwan da ke cikin ruwa na duniya don hana jiragen ruwa shiga cikin tekun, kuma hakan ya sa jiragen ruwa da ba su da ruwa ba su da haɗari.
data.original_reference: Birtaniya ta dasa bama bamai a teku domin hana jiragen ruwa shiga wannan yanki na teku, abinda ke da hadari ga jiragen yan baruwanmu.
data.corrected_reference: Birtaniya ta dasa bama bamai a teku domin hana jiragen ruwa shiga wannan yanki na teku, abinda ke da hadari ga jiragen yan baruwanmu.

data.translation: Tun da yake an yi iyakacin amsa ga wannan dabarar, Jamus ta yi tsammanin irin wannan amsa ga yakin basasa marar iyaka.
data.original_reference: Da shike akwai iyakacin amsa kan wannan dabara, Germany ta yi tsamanin irin wannan amsa ga yakinta na karkashin ruwa mara kima.
data.corrected_reference: Tunda aka samu karancin sakamako ga wannan dabarun, Jamus tayi tsammanin sakamako irin haka zuwa ga yakin kasan tekun da bashi da kayyadewa.

data.translation: A shekarun 1920, halin da ya fi rinjaye a yawancin 'yan ƙasa da al'ummai shi ne na zaman lafiya da warewa.
data.original_reference: A lokacin 1920s, halaye mafi rinjaye na yawancin 'yan ƙasa da ƙasashe shine na zaman lafiya da keɓewa.
data.corrected_reference: A lokacin 1920s, halaye mafi rinjaye na yawancin ƴan ƙasa da ƙasashe shine na zaman lafiya da keɓewa.

data.translation: Bayan da al'ummai suka ga munanan abubuwa da kuma zalunci da yaƙin ya yi a lokacin Yaƙin Duniya na Ɗaya, sun so su guji irin wannan yanayin a nan gaba.
data.original_reference: Bayan ganin munanan abubuwa da munanan yaƙe-yaƙe yayin Yaƙin Duniya na ɗaya, al'ummomi sun so su guje wa irin wannan yanayin a nan gaba.
data.corrected_reference: Bayan ganin munanan abubuwa da munanan yaƙe-yaƙe yayin Yaƙin Duniya na ɗaya, al'ummomi sun so su guje wa irin wannan yanayin a nan gaba.

data.translation: A shekara ta 1884, Tesla ya koma Amurka don ya karɓi aiki a kamfanin Edison a birnin New York.
data.original_reference: A cikin 1884, Tesla ya koma Amurka don karɓar aiki tare da Kamfanin Edison a cikin New York City.
data.corrected_reference: A cikin 1884, Tesla ya koma Amurka don karɓar aiki tare da Kamfanin Edison a cikin New York City.

data.translation: Ya isa Amurka da 4 cents a kan sunansa, wani littafi na shayari, da kuma wasika na shawarwari daga Charles Batchelor (manajansa a cikin aikinsa na baya) zuwa Thomas Edison.
data.original_reference: Ya iso Amurka da sulai 4 kacal, da wani littafin wakoki, da wasikar gabatarwa daga Charles Batchelor (manajansa a aikin da ya bari) zuwa ga Thomas Edison.
data.corrected_reference: Ya iso Amurka da sulai 4 kacal, da wani littafin wakoki, da wasikar gabatarwa daga Charles Batchelor (manajansa a aikin da ya bari) zuwa ga Thomas Edison.

data.translation: Tsohon kasar Sin tana da hanyar nuna lokatai daban-daban; kowane mataki na kasar Sin ko kowane iyali da ke mulki wani sarauta ne na musamman.
data.original_reference: Ƙasar China ta zamanin da tana da wata hanyar musamman ta nuna lokutan yanayi daban-daban; kowane mataki na China ko kowane iyali da ya hau karagar mulki to shi ma daula ce ta daban.
data.corrected_reference: Ƙasar China ta zamanin da tana da wata hanyar musamman ta nuna lokutan yanayi daban-daban; kowane mataki na China ko kowane iyali da ya hau karagar mulki to shi ma daula ce ta daban.

data.translation: Har ila yau, tsakanin kowace daular akwai wani zamani na yankuna masu rarrabuwa. Mafi sananne daga cikin waɗannan lokutan shine zamanin Three Kingdoms wanda ya faru na shekaru 60 tsakanin Han da Jin Dynasty.
data.original_reference: Haka nan tsakanin kowace daula a kan sami lokaci na rashin zaman lafiya tsakanin larduna. Fitacce daga waɗannan zamuna shi ne zamanin Masarautu Uku da ya faru tsawon shekaru 60 tsakanin Daular Han da ta Jin.
data.corrected_reference: Haka nan tsakanin kowace daula a kan sami lokaci na rashin zaman lafiya tsakanin larduna. Fitacce daga waɗannan zamuna shi ne zamanin Masarautu Uku da ya faru tsawon shekaru 60 tsakanin Daular Han da ta Jin.

data.translation: A waɗannan lokatai, an yi yaƙi mai tsanani tsakanin manyan mutane da yawa da suke neman sarauta.
data.original_reference: A wancan lokaci yaki ya barke tsakanin mafi yawan gidajen sarauta da ke hankoron kujerar sarki.
data.corrected_reference: A wancan lokaci yaki ya barke tsakanin mafi yawan gidajen sarauta da ke hankoron kujerar sarki.

data.translation: Da farko, an yi ta yin tawaye da mutane da yawa a birnin Xi 'an.
data.original_reference: Masarauta Uku ya kasance daya daga cikin zamunan da aka fi zub da jini a tarihin Tsohuwar China dubban mutane sun mutu suna gwagwarmaya don zama a kan madaukakiyar kujera a babbar fada a Xi’an.
data.corrected_reference: Masarauta Uku ya kasance daya daga cikin zamunan da aka fi zub da jini a tarihin Tsohuwar China dubban mutane sun mutu suna gwagwarmaya don zama a kan madaukakiyar kujera a babbar fada a Xi’an.

data.translation: Akwai tasirin zamantakewa da siyasa da yawa kamar amfani da tsarin metric, sauyawa daga mulkin kama karya zuwa na jamhuriyar, kishin kasa da kuma imani da cewa kasar ta mallaki mutane ba ga mai mulki daya ba.
data.original_reference: Akwai tasiri na zamantakewa da siyasa masu yawa kamar amfani da tsarin awo cikakke, barin kama-karya zuwa jamhuriyya, kishin ƙasa tare da imanin cewa ƙasar ta mutanen ƙasa ce ba mutum ɗaya mai mulki ba.
data.corrected_reference: Akwai tasiri na zamantakewa da siyasa masu yawa kamar amfani da tsarin awo cikakke, barin kama-karya zuwa jamhuriyya, kishin ƙasa tare da imanin cewa ƙasar ta mutanen ƙasa ce ba mutum ɗaya mai mulki ba.

data.translation: Har ila yau, bayan juyin juya halin, an bude ayyukan ga dukkan maza masu neman takardun da suka ba da damar mafi girman kai da nasara su yi nasara.
data.original_reference: Hakanan bayan juyin halin an bude ayyuka ga duk maza masu neman aiki inda hakan ya bada dama ga masu buri da kokari su sami cigaba.
data.corrected_reference: Hakanan bayan juyin halin an bude ayyuka ga duk maza masu neman aiki inda hakan ya bada dama ga masu buri da kokari su sami cigaba.

data.translation: Haka yake ga sojoji domin maimakon a yi amfani da rukuni a matsayin rukuni, an yi amfani da shi a matsayin rukuni.

data.translation: Juyin juya halin Faransa ya kuma yi wa mutane da yawa da aka yi wa aiki da su a wasu ƙasashe wahayi zuwa ga fara juyin juya halin kansu.
data.original_reference: Juyin Juya Hali na Faransa ya kuma ba sauran wasu mutane masu tsananin karfi na wata ƙasa damar fara nasu juyin juya halin.

data.translation: Muhammad yana da sha'awar abubuwa da suka wuce rayuwar yau da kullun. Ya saba zuwa wani kogo wanda aka sani da Hira a kan Dutsen Noor (haske) don tunani.
data.original_reference: Muhammadu yana matukar sha'awar al'amuran da suka wuce rayuwar wannan duniya. Ya na yawan ziyarar kogon da a ka fi sani da na “Hira” a tsaunin “Noor” (wato haske) domin kadaicewa yayi tunani.
data.corrected_reference: Muhammadu yana matukar sha'awar al'amuran da suka wuce rayuwar wannan duniya. Ya na yawan ziyarar kogon da a ka fi sani da na “Hira” a tsaunin “Noor” (wato haske) domin kadaicewa yayi tunani.

data.translation: kogon kansa, wanda ya tsira daga lokacin, ya ba da hoto mai kyau na tunanin ruhaniya na Muhammad.
data.original_reference: ya ɓoye kansa, wanda ya rayu a lokacin, yana ba da hoton karkatawar ruhaniyar Muhammad a tsarari.
data.corrected_reference: ya ɓoye kansa, wanda ya rayu a lokacin, yana ba da hoton karkatawar ruhaniyar Muhammad a tsarari.

data.translation: A saman wani dutse a arewacin Makka, kogon yana da cikakken keɓewa daga sauran duniya.

data.translation: A gaskiya ma, ba shi da sauƙi a samu ko da mutum ya san cewa ya wanzu.

data.translation: Masarawa ne suka gina babban dala a ƙarni na uku kafin haihuwar Yesu.

data.translation: Filin Giza, ko "Giza Necropolis" a kwarin matattu na Masar ya ƙunshi manyan dala da yawa (wanda babban dala shine mafi girma daga cikinsu), ƙananan kaburbura da yawa, haikalin da yawa, da kuma babban Sphinx.
data.original_reference: Giza Plateau, ko “Giza Necropolls” a Kwarin Massar na matattu yana kunshe da dala iri-iri ( wanda babban dala shine mafi girma), yawancin kananan kaburbura, gidajen bauta, da babban gunkin Sphinx.
data.corrected_reference: Giza Plateau, ko “Giza Necropolls” a Kwarin Massar na matattu yana kunshe da dala iri-iri ( wanda babban dala shine mafi girma), yawancin kananan kaburbura, gidajen bauta, da babban gunkin Sphinx.

data.translation: An gina babban dala don girmama Fir'auna Khufu, kuma an gina ƙananan dala da kaburbura da haikalin don girmama matan Khufu da 'yan gidansa.
data.original_reference: Babbar dalar an kafa ta ne domin girmama Fir’auna Khufu, kuma da daman cikinsu da kushewu da wuraren ibada an gina su ne domin matan Khufu tare da iyalan gidansa.
data.corrected_reference: Babbar dalar an kafa ta ne domin girmama Fir’auna Khufu, kuma da daman cikinsu da kushewu da wuraren ibada an gina su ne domin matan Khufu tare da iyalan gidansa.

data.translation: An tilasta musu biyan haraji ga mulkin mallaka na Amurka don biyan babban ɓangare na kashe-kashe da kuma amfani da asusun da ke gudana a cikin sunan gwamnatin Philippines ta hanyar bankuna na Wall Street.

data.translation: Hakika, riba mai yawa da aka samu daga cin zarafin 'yan Filipin zai zama tushen nasarar mulkin mallaka na Amurka.

data.translation: An kira shekarun da abubuwan suka faru da Babban tsakiyar zamanai, lokacin tarihin Turai a ƙarni na 11, 12, da 13 (AD 1000 1300).
data.original_reference: Zamanin da al'amuran suka faru galibi ana masu lakabi da Mafi girmn Shekarun Tsakiya lokacin tarihin Turai a ƙarni na 11, 12, da 13th (AD 1000 - 1300).
data.corrected_reference: Zamanin da al'amuran suka faru galibi ana masu lakabi da Mafi girmn Shekarun Tsakiya lokacin tarihin Turai a ƙarni na 11, 12, da 13th (AD 1000 - 1300).

data.translation: Babban tsakiyar zamanai ya riga farkon tsakiyar zamanai ya biyo baya daga ƙarshen tsakiyar zamanai, wanda a cikin al'ada ya ƙare a kusa da 1500.
data.original_reference: Babban Shekaru ta Tsakiya ya gabace Shakarun Tsakiyar Farko wanda Shakaru Tsakiyar Da Sun Gabata su ka bi, wanda a cikin babban taron ya gama kusan shekaru 1500.
data.corrected_reference: Lokacin karni na tsakiya na sama yana rigaye ne lokacin karni na tsakiya da ya zo kafin shi sannan yana tafe ne lokacin karni na tsakiya da yazo daga can gaba, wanda ya kamata ace ya kare a  daidai shekarar1500.

data.translation: Tabbatarwar fasaha kalma ce da ta ƙunshi ra'ayoyi da yawa a aikace, daga turawa ta fasaha ko buƙatar fasaha zuwa ga ma'anar cewa ƙaddarar ɗan adam tana motsawa ta hanyar ma'ana ta asali da ke da alaƙa da dokokin kimiyya da bayyanarsu a cikin fasaha.
data.original_reference: Wanzuwar Fasahar Ƙere-ƙere al’amari ne da ya haɗo wani faffaɗan fage na ra’ayoyi a aikace, daga bunƙasar fasaha ko muhimmancin fasahar ƙere-ƙere zuwa ga haƙiƙanin sanin cewa makomar dan adam tana tafiya ne bisa tabbatacciyar hikima wadda ke da alaƙa da dokokin kimiyya da kuma bayyanar su a cikin fasahar ƙere-ƙere.
data.corrected_reference: Wanzuwar Fasahar Ƙere-ƙere al’amari ne da ya haɗo wani faffaɗan fage na ra’ayoyi a aikace, daga bunƙasar fasaha ko muhimmancin fasahar ƙere-ƙere zuwa ga haƙiƙanin sanin cewa makomar dan adam tana tafiya ne bisa tabbatacciyar hikima wadda ke da alaƙa da dokokin kimiyya da kuma bayyanar su a cikin fasahar ƙere-ƙere.

data.translation: Yawancin fassarar ƙaddarar fasaha suna da ra'ayoyi guda biyu: cewa ci gaban fasaha kanta yana tafiya ne a hanya mai yawa fiye da tasirin al'adu ko siyasa, kuma cewa fasaha a gefe guda tana da "sakamako" a kan al'ummomi waɗanda ke da nasaba, maimakon yanayin zamantakewa.
data.original_reference: Yawancin fassarar tabbatuwar fasahar zamani sun kunshi ra’ayi mafiya yaduwa guda biyu: cewa na fasaha ita kanta na bin tafarki wacce ta sha bamban da tasirin al’ada ko siyasa da kuma cewa fasaha nada “tasiri” ga al’umma masu asali, fiye da na tsarin yanayin zamantakewa.
data.corrected_reference: Yawancin fassarar tabbatuwar fasahar zamani sun kunshi ra’ayi mafiya yaduwa guda biyu: cewa na fasaha ita kanta na bin tafarki wacce ta sha bamban da tasirin al’ada ko siyasa da kuma cewa fasaha nada “tasiri” ga al’umma masu asali, fiye da na tsarin yanayin zamantakewa.

data.translation: Duk da haka, hanyar sadarwa ta kasa da kasa ba ta da inganci ga 'yan motoci kaɗan, saboda haka ana samar da sababbin hanyoyin samarwa don rage farashin mallakar mota.
data.original_reference: Koyaya, hanyar sadarwa ta ƙasa gabaɗaya ba ta da tasirin tattalin arziƙi don ƙarancin motoci, saboda haka ana ƙirƙirar sabbin hanyoyin samarwa don rage farashin mallakar mota.

data.translation: Yawan mallakar motoci yana haifar da karuwar haɗarin mota a kan hanyoyi, wanda ke haifar da kirkiro sabbin fasahohi a fannin kiwon lafiya don gyara gawawwakin da suka lalace.
data.original_reference: Hakanan mallakar motoci da yawa yana haifar da yawan hadari a kan hanyoyi, wanda ke haifar da kirkirar sabbin dabaru a fannin kiwon lafiya don gyaran jikin da ya lalace.

data.translation: Romanticism yana da babban ɓangare na ƙaddarar al'adu, wanda ya samo asali daga marubuta kamar Goethe, Fichte, da Schlegel.
data.original_reference: Tsarin fasaha da adabi samar da al’adu, wanda marubuta irinsu Gothe, Fichte da Schlegel su ka samar.
data.corrected_reference: Tsarin fasaha da adabi samar da al’adu, wanda marubuta irinsu Gothe, Fichte da Schlegel su ka samar.

data.translation: A cikin yanayin Romanticism, yanayin ƙasa ya tsara mutane, kuma a tsawon lokaci al'adu da al'adu da suka danganci wannan yanayin sun taso, kuma waɗannan, suna cikin jituwa da wurin al'umma, sun fi kyau fiye da dokokin da aka ɗora da gangan.
data.original_reference: A cikin siyakin romanci, yanayin kasa ya canza mutane, kuma lokaci da yawa sai al'adu da al'adu masu alaƙa da wannan yanayin suka taso, kuma waɗannan, kasancewar suna jituwa da matsayin jama'a, sun fi ƙa'idodi da aka kafa bisa doka da oda.
data.corrected_reference: A cikin siyakin romanci, yanayin kasa ya canza mutane, kuma lokaci da yawa sai al'adu da al'adu masu alaƙa da wannan yanayin suka taso, kuma waɗannan, kasancewar suna jituwa da matsayin jama'a, sun fi ƙa'idodi da aka kafa bisa doka da oda.

data.translation: Halayen da ke sa al'ada ta bambanta na iya kasancewa harshe, na ɗabi'a, addini, siyasa, jima'i, yanki, ko kuma haɗuwa da dalilai.
data.original_reference: Kyawawan siffofin da suke tabbatar da wata ƙaramar al’ada a matsayin wadda ta fita daban kan iya kasancewa na yare, kyau, addini, siyasa, jinsi, na yanki, ko hadin abubuwa.

data.translation: Membobi na al'ada sau da yawa suna nuna membobinsu ta hanyar amfani da salo na musamman da alama, wanda ya hada da salo, dabi'u, da kuma magana.
data.original_reference: Membobin masana'antar sau da yawa suna nuna alamar kasancewa memba ta hanyar rarrabe mai amfani da alama ta salon, wanda ya haɗa da salon, halayen kirki, da ɗaukar hoto.

data.translation: Ɗaya daga cikin hanyoyin da aka fi amfani da su wajen nuna muhimmancin zamantakewa shi ne yin amfani da wasu 'yan lokuta na rashin alheri na yara waɗanda, saboda watsi da su, rashin alheri, ko kuma cin zarafi da gangan, manya ba su zamantake da su ba yayin da suke girma.
data.original_reference: Daya daga cikin matakan da ake amfani dashi domin nuna muhimmacin zamantakewa shine nuna kadan daga cikin hali na takaici wanda yara suka fuskanta, ta hanyar sakaci, masifa, ko cin zarafi, kuma basu zamantakewa da manya ba yayin da suke girma.
data.corrected_reference: Daya daga cikin matakan da ake amfani dashi domin nuna muhimmacin zamantakewa shine nuna kadan daga cikin hali na takaici wanda yara suka fuskanta, ta hanyar sakaci, masifa, ko cin zarafi, kuma basu zamantakewa da manya ba yayin da suke girma.

data.translation: Wasu yara na daji sun kasance a cikin gidajen mutane (yawanci iyayensu); a wasu lokuta wannan yarinyar ta bar saboda iyayen sun ƙi yaro mai rauni ko kuma rashin lafiya.
data.original_reference: Ana kiran irin waɗannan yaran “sakakku” ko masu wuyar juyawa. Mutane sun sha kulle waɗansu sakakkun yara (yawanci iyayensu ne); a wasu al’amuran kuma barin yaran na da alaƙa da ƙin amincewar iyaye da naƙasar basira ko ta jikin yaro.
data.corrected_reference: Ana kiran irin waɗannan yaran “sakakku” ko masu wuyar juyawa. Mutane sun sha kulle waɗansu sakakkun yara (yawanci iyayensu ne); a wasu al’amuran kuma barin yaran na da alaƙa da ƙin amincewar iyaye da naƙasar basira ko ta jikin yaro.

data.translation: Yara da ke cikin daji sun sha wahala a cikin mummunan cin zarafin yara ko kuma sun ji rauni kafin a bar su ko su gudu.
data.original_reference: Yaran mara zuciya masu jin tsoro na iya fuskantar mummunan cin zarafin yara ko rauni kafin a watsar da su ko su gudu.
data.corrected_reference: Yaran mara zuciya masu jin tsoro na iya fuskantar mummunan cin zarafin yara ko rauni kafin a watsar da su ko su gudu.

data.translation: Wasu kuma dabbobi ne suka yi renonsu; wasu kuma sun yi rayuwa a daji da kansu.
data.original_reference: Wasu ana zargin dabbobi ne suka yi rainon su; an ce wasu sun yi rayuwa a daji da kansu.
data.corrected_reference: Wasu ana zargin dabbobi ne suka yi rainon su; an ce wasu sun yi rayuwa a daji da kansu.

data.translation: Idan dabbobi ba mutane ba ne suka yi renonsa, yaron daji yana nuna hali (a cikin iyakar jiki) kusan kamar na dabba mai kulawa, kamar tsoronsa ko rashin kula da mutane.
data.original_reference: Lokacin da ba dabba ba ta dabbaro gabaɗaya, yaro mai ɗaukar hoto yana nuna halayensa (a cikin iyakokin zahiri) kusan gaba daya kamar na kulawar-dabbobi, kamar tsoron sa ko rashin kulawa ga mutane.
data.corrected_reference: Idan ya kasance dabbar da ba mutum bace ta raini yaro gaba daya, zai kasance yaro zai taso da (na zihiri) kusan duka irin suffar dabi'un dabbar da ta kula dashi,misali irin yadda yake tsoro da rashin ko-in kula ga sauran mutane.

data.translation: Ko da yake koyon da aka yi bisa aikin ya kamata ya sa koyo ya fi sauƙi kuma ya fi ban sha'awa, yin shimfidawa ya wuce hakan.
data.original_reference: Duk da yake tushen koyo game da aiki yakamata ya sauƙaƙa ilmantarwa kuma ya zama mai ban sha'awa, ƙwanƙwasa aiki ya wuce mataki.
data.corrected_reference: Duk da yake tushen koyo game da aiki yakamata ya sauƙaƙa ilmantarwa kuma ya zama mai ban sha'awa, ƙwanƙwasa aiki ya wuce mataki.

data.translation: Scaffolding ba hanyar koyo ba ce amma taimako ne da ke ba da tallafi ga mutane da suke fuskantar sabon kwarewa na koyo kamar amfani da sabon shirin kwamfuta ko fara sabon aiki.
data.original_reference: Nannadewa ba hanya ce ta ilmantarwa ba amma taimako ne wanda ke bayar da tallafi ga mutanen da ke fuskantar sabon ƙwarewar ilmantarwa kamar amfani da sabon shirin komputa ko fara sabon aiki.

data.translation: Scaffolds na iya zama na zahiri da na gaske, a wasu kalmomi, malami wani nau'i ne na shimfidawa amma haka ma ɗan ƙaramin mai karɓar takarda a Microsoft Office.
data.original_reference: Wuraren zartar da hukuncin na iya zama na gaske ko kuma holoko, ko kuma a wani kaulin, malami ka iya zama hakan, sai dai wani dan kankanin abu manhajar Microsoft Office.
data.corrected_reference: Scafflods zasu iya zama na gaske da kuma virtual, a wasu kalaman, malami wani bangare ne na scafflod amma hakanan ma dan karamin abun makale takarda a microsoft office.

data.translation: An saka Scaffolds na Virtual a cikin software kuma ana nufin su yi tambaya, su yi kira, su bayyana hanyoyin da za su iya zama da wuya ga ɗalibin ya bi da shi shi shi kaɗai.
data.original_reference: Ana saka kariya cikin manhajojin domin su yi tambaya, su yi nuni da bada bayanai wadanda dalibai su kadai ba za su iya fuskanta ba.
data.corrected_reference: Ana saka kariya cikin manhajojin domin su yi tambaya, su yi nuni da bada bayanai wadanda dalibai su kadai ba za su iya fuskanta ba.

data.translation: Ana kula da yara a wurin da ake kula da su don dalilai da yawa, daga watsi da su, da cin zarafi, har ma da neman kuɗi.

data.translation: Bai kamata yara su yi girma a wurin da ba a kula da su ba, ba a kula da su ba kuma ba a koyar da su ba.
data.original_reference: Bai kamata a ce akwai yaron da zai girma a cikin muhallin da babu reno, kulawa da kuma almantarwa, amma suna yi.
data.corrected_reference: Bai kamata a ce akwai yaron da zai girma a cikin muhallin da babu reno, kulawa da kuma almantarwa, amma suna yi.

data.translation: Muna ganin cewa tsarin kula da yara a cikin gida yana da aminci ga waɗannan yara.
data.original_reference: Mun fahimci Tsarin Kulawa na jarirai ya zama yankin aminci ga waɗannan yara.
data.corrected_reference: Mun fahimci Tsarin Kulawa na jarirai ya zama yankin aminci ga waɗannan yara.

data.translation: An ce tsarin kula da yara na gida zai samar da gidaje masu aminci, masu kula da su da ƙauna, ilimi mai kyau, da kuma ingantaccen kiwon lafiya.
data.original_reference: Ya kamata tsarinmu na karɓar riko ya samar da gidaje masu aminci, masu reno da ke nuna soyayya, ingantaccen ilimi, da tabbataccen tsarin kulawa da lafiya.
data.corrected_reference: Ya kamata tsarinmu na karɓar riko ya samar da gidaje masu aminci, masu reno da ke nuna soyayya, ingantaccen ilimi, da tabbataccen tsarin kulawa da lafiya.

data.translation: Ana ganin cewa kulawar 'yan yara za ta ba da dukan abubuwan da ake bukata da suka rasa a gidan da aka ɗauke su.
data.original_reference: Yakamata renon yara ya samar da dukkan bukatu wadanda su ke da bukatu a gidan da aka dauko su.
data.corrected_reference: Yakamata renon yara ya samar da dukkan bukatu wadanda su ke da bukatu a gidan da aka dauko su.

data.translation: Intanet tana haɗa abubuwa biyu na sadarwa ta dimbin yawa da kuma na mutane.
data.original_reference: Yanar gizo ta hada abubuwa biyu na sadarwar tsakanin al’umma da daidaikun mutane.
data.corrected_reference: Yanar gizo ta hada abubuwa biyu na sadarwar tsakanin al’umma da daidaikun mutane.

data.translation: Abubuwan da ke nuna bambanci na Intanet sun haifar da ƙarin girma dangane da amfani da kuma amfani da tsarin.
data.original_reference: Kyakyawan halaye na intanet suna haifar da karin girma dangane da matakan gamsarwa.
data.corrected_reference: Kyakyawan halaye na intanet suna haifar da karin girma dangane da matakan gamsarwa.

data.translation: Alal misali, ana ba da shawarar ilmantarwa da zamantakewa a matsayin muhimman dalilai na amfani da Intanet (James da sauransu, 1995).
data.original_reference: Alal misali, “koyo” da “cudanya” ana kallonsu a matsayin muhimman hanyoyin ƙarfafa yin amfani da yanar gizo (James et al., 1995).
data.corrected_reference: Alal misali, “koyo” da “cudanya” ana kallonsu a matsayin muhimman hanyoyin ƙarfafa yin amfani da yanar gizo (James et al., 1995).

data.translation: Haɗin kai na mutum da kuma ci gaba da dangantaka sun kuma gano su a matsayin sababbin abubuwan motsawa ta hanyar Eighmey da McCord (1998) lokacin da suka bincika yadda masu sauraro ke amsawa ga shafukan yanar gizo.
data.original_reference: “Shiga cikin mutum” da “ci gaba da dangantaka” na cikin sabbin fannonin kwarin gwiwa ta Eighmey da McCord (1998) yayinda suka bincika daukin masu sauraro a gidajen yanar gizo.
data.corrected_reference: “Shiga cikin mutum” da “ci gaba da dangantaka” na cikin sabbin fannonin kwarin gwiwa ta Eighmey da McCord (1998) yayinda suka bincika daukin masu sauraro a gidajen yanar gizo.

data.translation: Yin amfani da bidiyo ya haifar da muhimman abubuwan da aka gano a fassarar micro-bayani, motsin fuska wanda ke da tsawon miliseconds.
data.original_reference: Amfani da rikodin bidiyo ya haifar da bincike mai mahimmanci a cikin fassara bayanan fuska, motsin fuska waɗanda ba sa wuce lokaci ƙalilan.
data.corrected_reference: Amfani da rikodin bidiyo ya haifar da bincike mai mahimmanci a cikin fassara bayanan fuska, motsin fuska waɗanda ba sa wuce lokaci ƙalilan.

data.translation: Musamman, an ce za a iya gano ko mutum yana ƙarya ta wajen fassara ƙananan maganganu daidai.
data.original_reference: Musamman ma kamar, ikirarin da ya yi cewa zai gano ko mutum yana karyar fassarar/fahimtar kananan maganganu yadda suke.
data.corrected_reference: Musamman ma kamar, ikirarin da ya yi cewa zai gano ko mutum yana karyar fassarar/fahimtar kananan maganganu yadda suke.

data.translation: Oliver Sacks, a cikin takardarsa The President's Speech, ya nuna yadda mutanen da ba su iya fahimtar magana saboda lalacewar kwakwalwa ba duk da haka suna iya kimanta gaskiya daidai.
data.original_reference: A cikin takardar shi mai take Jawabin Shugaba Oliver Sacks ya bayyana yadda mutane dake fuskantar masala wajen fahimtar jawabi bisa ga masalar tabin kwakwalwa, yace duk da haka suna iya fahimtar gaskiya daidai.
data.corrected_reference: A cikin takardar shi mai take Jawabin Shugaba Oliver Sacks ya bayyana yadda mutane dake fuskantar masala wajen fahimtar jawabi bisa ga masalar tabin kwakwalwa, yace duk da haka suna iya fahimtar gaskiya daidai.

data.translation: Ya ce dabbobi kamar karnuka suna da irin wannan iyawar fahimtar halayen mutane.
data.original_reference: Har ma yana ba da shawarar cewa irin waɗannan damar a fassara halayen mutane za su iya rabawa ta dabbobi kamar su karnukan gida.
data.corrected_reference: Har ma yana ba da shawarar cewa irin waɗannan damar a fassara halayen mutane za su iya rabawa ta dabbobi kamar su karnukan gida.

data.translation: Bincike na karni na 20 ya nuna cewa akwai nau'i biyu na bambancin kwayoyin halitta: ɓoye da kuma bayyana.
data.original_reference: Binciken ƙarni na ashirin ya nuna cewa akwai rabe-raben halittar gado guda biyu: ɓoyayye da na bayyananne.
data.corrected_reference: Binciken ƙarni na ashirin ya nuna cewa akwai rabe-raben halittar gado guda biyu: ɓoyayye da na bayyananne.

data.translation: Cutar ta kara sabon bambancin kwayoyin halitta, kuma zaɓa ta cire shi daga tarin bambancin da aka bayyana.
data.original_reference: Maye gurbi yana ƙara sabon bambancin kwayoyin, kuma zaɓi ya cire shi daga tafkin bambancin da aka bayyana.
data.corrected_reference: Maye gurbi yana ƙara sabon bambancin kwayoyin, kuma zaɓi ya cire shi daga tafkin bambancin da aka bayyana.

data.translation: Rarraba da sake haɗuwa suna daidaita bambancin gaba da baya tsakanin wuraren waha biyu tare da kowane ƙarni.
data.original_reference: Rabuwa da sake haduwa iri dabam-dabam baya da gaba tsakanin gidan ruwan guda biyu a kowace karni.
data.corrected_reference: Rabuwa da sake haduwa iri dabam-dabam baya da gaba tsakanin gidan ruwan guda biyu a kowace karni.

data.translation: A cikin daji, yana da wuya ga dabba mai rai mai gina jiki kamar na mutum ya biya bukatun amino acid daga albarkatun shuke-shuke.

data.translation: Ƙari ga haka, rashin yin hakan yana da sakamako mai tsanani: ciwon ciki, rashin abinci mai gina jiki, kuma ƙarshe mutuwa.

data.translation: A akasin haka, abincin dabbobi (tsuntsaye, tsutsa, qwai) ba wai kawai ana narke shi da sauƙi ba ne, amma suna samar da furotin mai yawa wanda ya ƙunshi dukkanin amino acid masu mahimmanci.
