data.translation: Dukkanin abubuwan da aka gani, bai kamata mu yi mamakin idan kakanninmu suka warware matsalar su ta hanyar da suke yi a yau kamar yadda chimps ke yi a savannah ba.
data.original_reference: In an yi la’akari da dukkan abubuwa, bai kamata mu yi mamaki ba idan magabatanmu suka magance “matsalar kayan gina jiki” ta irin hanyar da goggon biri a yankin savanna suke yi a yau.
data.corrected_reference: In an yi la’akari da dukkan abubuwa, bai kamata mu yi mamaki ba idan magabatanmu suka magance “matsalar kayan gina jiki” ta irin hanyar da goggon biri a yankin savanna suke yi a yau.

data.translation: Rashin barci shine tsarin farkawa da gangan a lokacin lokacin barci na yau da kullum da kuma fada barci kadan bayan minti 10 (minti 60).
data.original_reference: Katse bacci yanayi ne na farkawa da gangan cikin lokacin yin bacci na al’ada da kuma komawa bacci cikin dan kaknkanin lokaci daga baya (minti 10-60).
data.corrected_reference: Katse bacci yanayi ne na farkawa da gangan cikin lokacin yin bacci na al’ada da kuma komawa bacci cikin dan kaknkanin lokaci daga baya (minti 10-60).

data.translation: Za ka iya yin hakan da sauƙi ta wajen yin amfani da agogon farkawa da ke da kwanciyar hankali don ya dawo da kai cikin hankalinka ba tare da ya farka ka ba.
data.original_reference: Ana iya yin hakan a sauƙaƙe ta amfani da agogon ƙararrawa wanda ba shi da nutsuwa don kawo ku cikin sani ba tare da an tashe ku ba.
data.corrected_reference: Za'a iya yin wannan a saukake ta hanyar amfani da kararrawa mara kara sosai da zai tashe ka ba tare da ya wartsakar da kai ba.

data.translation: Idan ka sake saita agogon a lokacin da kake barci, za ka iya sanya shi a gefen ɗakin, ka tilasta ka tashi daga gado ka kashe shi.
data.original_reference: Idan ka sami kanka ka sake saita agogo a cikin barcinka, ana iya sanya shi a ɗaya gefen ɗakin, yana tilasta ka tashi daga kan gado don kashe shi.
data.corrected_reference: Idan ka sami kanka ka sake saita agogo a cikin barcinka, ana iya sanya shi a ɗaya gefen ɗakin, yana tilasta ka tashi daga kan gado don kashe shi.

data.translation: Wasu zaɓuɓɓukan da suka danganci tsarin rayuwa sun ƙunshi shan ruwa mai yawa (musamman ruwa ko shayi, sanannen maganin diuretic) kafin barci, wanda ya tilasta mutum ya tashi ya yi fitsari.
data.original_reference: Sauran zabukan da suka danganta da lissafin ɗabi’ar rayuwa sun kunshi shan kayan ruwa da yawa (musamman ruwa ko shayi, sanannen sinadari mai jawo fitsari) kafin barci, da ke tilastawa mutum ya tashi ya yi ftisari.
data.corrected_reference: Sauran zabukan da suka danganta da lissafin ɗabi’ar rayuwa sun kunshi shan kayan ruwa da yawa (musamman ruwa ko shayi, sanannen sinadari mai jawo fitsari) kafin barci, da ke tilastawa mutum ya tashi ya yi ftisari.

data.translation: Jimrewar da mutum yake da ita ta shafi yanayin jiki da kuma ruhunsa.
data.original_reference: Yawan kwanciyar hankali da mutum yake da shi ya danganta da kishiyantar yawan tashin hankali a cikin jikin mutum da ruhunsa.
data.corrected_reference: Yawan kwanciyar hankali da mutum yake da shi ya danganta da kishiyantar yawan tashin hankali a cikin jikin mutum da ruhunsa.

data.translation: Idan muna da irin wannan yanayi, za mu iya samun kwanciyar hankali da gamsuwa.
data.original_reference: Rage tashin hankali, haka kuma yawan fata na gari da karfin rayuwa zai gabatar. Ko wani mutum na da damar samun kwanciyar hankali da gamsuwa.
data.corrected_reference: Rage tashin hankali, haka kuma yawan fata na gari da ƙarfin rayuwa zai gabatar. Ko wani mutum na da damar samun kwanciyar hankali da gamsuwa.

data.translation: Kowa zai iya samun haske, amma abin da zai hana mu cimma wannan burin shi ne mu kasance da damuwa da kuma rashin son kai.
data.original_reference: Kowa zai iya cimma wayewa. Abinda kawai ke tsaye kan hanyar wannan burin shine tashin hankali da fargaba.
data.corrected_reference: Kowa zai iya cimma wayewa. Abinda kawai ke tsaye kan hanyar wannan burin shine tashin hankali da fargaba.

data.translation: Addinin Buddha na Tibet ya dogara ne akan koyarwar Buddha, amma an kara su ta hanyar hanyar mahayana na soyayya da kuma dabaru da yawa daga Yoga na Indiya.
data.original_reference: Buddhist na Tibet ya dogara ne da koyarwar Buddha, amma hanyar mahayana da ta hanyar fasahar India da yawa sun ninka ta.
data.corrected_reference: Buddhist na Tibet ya dogara ne da koyarwar Buddha, amma hanyar mahayana da ta hanyar fasahar India da yawa sun ninka ta.

data.translation: Ka'idodin addinin Buddha na Tibet suna da sauki, sun hada da Kundalini Yoga, tunani da kuma hanyar ƙauna mai zurfi.
data.original_reference: A bisa ƙa’ida Budancin Tibet yana da sauƙi. Ya kunshi tsarin motsa jiki na Yoga, kadaicewa domin tunani da kuma bin tafarkin son kowa da komai.
data.corrected_reference: A bisa ƙa’ida Budancin Tibet yana da sauƙi. Ya kunshi tsarin motsa jiki na Yoga, kadaicewa domin tunani da kuma bin tafarkin son kowa da komai.

data.translation: Tare da Kundalini Yoga, ana farka da makamashi na Kundalini (makamashi na haskakawa) ta hanyar yoga postures, numfashi motsa jiki, mantras da visualizations.
data.original_reference: Da Kundalini Yoga an samar da kuzarin Kundalini (kuzarin wayarwa da kai) an farka ta hanyar motsawar jiki, motsawar nufanci, mantras da ganin wa.
data.corrected_reference: Da Kundalini Yoga an samar da kuzarin Kundalini (kuzarin wayarwa da kai) an farka ta hanyar motsawar jiki, motsawar nufanci, mantras da ganin wa.

data.translation: Cibiyar tunani na Tibet shine Yoga na Allah. Ta hanyar ganin allahntaka daban-daban ana tsabtace tashoshin makamashi, ana kunna chakras kuma ana haifar da hankali na haske.
data.original_reference: Ginshiƙen tunanun Tibetan shi ne Abin Bauta Yoga. Duk da yake kafafen gani na abubuwan bauta daban-daban hanyoyin makamashi an tsaftace su, akan buɗe chakras inda ake ƙirƙirar tunanin wayewa.
data.corrected_reference: Ginshiƙen tunanun Tibetan shi ne Abin Bauta Yoga. Duk da yake kafafen gani na abubuwan bauta daban-daban hanyoyin makamashi an tsaftace su, akan buɗe chakras inda ake ƙirƙirar tunanin wayewa.

data.translation: Jamus ta kasance abokin gaba na duniya a yakin duniya na biyu, wanda ya haifar da hadin gwiwa tsakanin USSR da Amurka.
data.original_reference: Jamus abokiyar gabar kowa ce a Yakin Duniya ta 2, wanda hakan ta haifar da haɗin kai tsakanin Tarayyar Sobiyet da Amurka. Da ƙarewar yakin sai sabanin tsarin rayuwa, al’amura da al'adu ya jawo rabuwar kan ƙasashen.
data.corrected_reference: Jamus abokiyar gabar kowa ce a Yakin Duniya ta 2, wanda hakan ta haifar da haɗin kai tsakanin Tarayyar Sobiyet da Amurka. Da ƙarewar yakin sai sabanin tsarin rayuwa, al’amura da al'adu ya jawo rabuwar kan ƙasashen.

data.translation: Bayan shekara biyu daga ƙarshen yaƙin, tsoffin abokan tarayyar sun zama abokan gaba kuma yaƙin sanyi ya fara.
data.original_reference: Tare da shekaru biyu na ƙarshen yaƙin, tsoffin maƙasudin yanzu abokan gaba ne kuma aka fara Yakin Sanyi.
data.corrected_reference: Tare da shekaru biyu na ƙarshen yaƙin, tsoffin maƙasudin yanzu abokan gaba ne kuma aka fara Yakin Sanyi.

data.translation: Ya kamata ya ci gaba har tsawon shekaru 40 masu zuwa kuma za a yi yaƙi da shi a zahiri, ta hannun sojojin wakilai, a fagen yaƙi daga Afirka zuwa Asiya, a Afghanistan, Cuba da sauran wurare da yawa.
data.original_reference: An tsara zai kai shekaru 40 masu zuwa kuma za ayi yaƙe shi a hakika,ta sojojin haya, a filayen yaƙi daga Africa zuwa Asia, a Afghanistan, Cuba da sauran wurare da dama.
data.corrected_reference: An tsara zai kai shekaru 40 masu zuwa kuma za ayi yaƙe shi a hakika,ta sojojin haya, a filayen yaƙi daga Africa zuwa Asia, a Afghanistan, Cuba da sauran wurare da dama.

data.translation: A ranar 17 ga Satumba, 1939, an riga an karya tsaron Poland, kuma begenmu na musamman shi ne mu janye kuma mu sake tsarawa a kan gadar Romania.
data.original_reference: Ya zuwa 17 ga Satumba, 1939, tsaron Poland ya riga ya karye, kuma fatan kawai da ake da shi shine na janyewa sannan a sake shiri a kan tozon gadar Romania.
data.corrected_reference: Ya zuwa 17 ga Satumba, 1939, tsaron Poland ya riga ya karye, kuma fatan kawai da ake da shi shine na janyewa sannan a sake shiri a kan tozon gadar Romania.

data.translation: Duk da haka, wadannan tsare-tsaren sun zama marasa amfani kusan cikin dare, lokacin da fiye da sojojin 800,000 na Sojojin Soviet na Tarayyar Soviet suka shiga kuma suka kirkiro bangarorin Belarus da Ukraine bayan sun mamaye yankunan gabashin Poland, suna keta Yarjejeniyar Zaman Lafiya ta Riga, Yarjejeniyar Tsare-tsare ta Soviet da Poland, da sauran yarjejeniyoyin duniya, na biyu da na duniya.
data.original_reference: Koda yake wannan shiri ya tashi daga aiki dare ɗaya, yayin da sama da sojoji 800,000 na tarayyar Soviet su ka shiga Belarus da Ukraine inda su ka shata fagen daga bayan mamayar kasar Poland wanda ya karya yarjejeniyar sulhu da aka yi a Riga, sulhu zaman lafiya na kasashen Soviet da Poland da ma wasu yarjeniyoyin na kasashen duniya tsakanin kasarshe biyu ko fiye da haka.
data.corrected_reference: Koda yake wannan shiri ya tashi daga aiki dare ɗaya, yayin da sama da sojoji 800,000 na tarayyar Soviet su ka shiga Belarus da Ukraine inda su ka shata fagen daga bayan mamayar kasar Poland wanda ya karya yarjejeniyar sulhu da aka yi a Riga, sulhu zaman lafiya na kasashen Soviet da Poland da ma wasu yarjeniyoyin na kasashen duniya tsakanin kasarshe biyu ko fiye da haka.

data.translation: Yin amfani da jiragen ruwa don jigilar kaya shine hanya mafi inganci don motsa mutane da kaya a fadin tekuna.
data.original_reference: Amfani da jirgin ruwa domin kwasan kayayyaki shine mafi inganci wajen kwasan mutane da yawa da kayayyaki ta teku.
data.corrected_reference: Amfani da jirgin ruwa domin kwasan kayayyaki shine mafi inganci wajen kwasan mutane da yawa da kayayyaki ta teku.

data.translation: Aikin sojojin ruwa ya kasance na al'ada ne don tabbatar da cewa kasarku tana da ikon motsa mutane da kayanta, yayin da a lokaci guda, ta tsoma baki da ikon abokan gaba na motsa mutane da kayanta.
data.original_reference: Ainihin aikin sojojin ruwa shine domin tabbatar cewa kasarka ta kula da iyawa domin motsa mutanenka da kayayyaki, yayinda kuma a lokaci daya, tsoma baki da kokarin da abokan gaba ke yi domin tafiyar da mutane da kayayyaki.
data.corrected_reference: Ainihin aikin sojojin ruwa shine domin tabbatar cewa kasarka ta kula da iyawa domin motsa mutanenka da kayayyaki, yayinda kuma a lokaci daya, tsoma baki da kokarin da abokan gaba ke yi domin tafiyar da mutane da kayayyaki.

data.translation: Wani misali mai ban mamaki na wannan shi ne yakin Atlantika na Arewa a yakin duniya na biyu inda Amirkawa suka yi kokarin tura mutane da kayan aiki zuwa fadin tekun Atlantika domin su taimaka wa Birtaniya.
data.original_reference: Daya daga cikin fitattun misalai na kwana nan game da wannan shine gumurzun yankin Atlantika ta Arewa lokacin Yakin Duniya na biyu. Amurkawa suna ƙoƙarin jigilar da sojoji da kayan yaki zuwa ƙetarenTekun Atlantika don taimakawa Biritaniya.
data.corrected_reference: Daya daga cikin fitattun misalai na kwana nan game da wannan shine gumurzun yankin Atlantika ta Arewa lokacin Yakin Duniya na biyu. Amurkawa suna ƙoƙarin jigilar da sojoji da kayan yaki zuwa ƙetarenTekun Atlantika don taimakawa Biritaniya.

data.translation: A lokaci guda, rundunar sojin ruwan Jamus, da ke amfani da jiragen ruwa masu saukar ungulu, suna ƙoƙarin hana wannan zirga-zirga.
data.original_reference: A lokaci daya, dakarun ruwa na Jamus, ta hanyar amfani da jirgin U-boats, na kokarin tsayar da wannan cinkoson.
data.corrected_reference: A lokaci daya, dakarun ruwa na Jamus, ta hanyar amfani da jirgin U-boats, na kokarin tsayar da wannan cinkoson.

data.translation: Da a ce'yan Al'umma sun kasa, da Jamus ta yi nasara a kan Birtaniya kamar sauran Turai.
data.original_reference: Da Sojan taron dangi ba su yi nasara ba, watakila da Jamus ta iya yi mamaye Biritaniya kamar ta sauran Turai.
data.corrected_reference: Da Sojan taron dangi ba su yi nasara ba, watakila da Jamus ta iya yi mamaye Biritaniya kamar ta sauran Turai.

data.translation: An fara yin amfani da awaki wajen shekaru 10,000 da suka shige a tsaunukan Zagros na Iran.
data.original_reference: Ana ganin akuya ta kasance gida ta farko kusan shekaru 10,000 da suka gabata a tsaunukan Zagros na Iran.
data.corrected_reference: Ana ganin akuya ta kasance gida ta farko kusan shekaru 10,000 da suka gabata a tsaunukan Zagros na Iran.

data.translation: Al'adu da kabilu na dā sun soma ajiye su domin su samu madara, gashi, nama, da fata.
data.original_reference: Al’adu da ƙabilun zamanin da ne su ka fara adana su domin sauƙin samun madara, gashi, nama, da kuma fatu.
data.corrected_reference: Al’adu da ƙabilun zamanin da ne su ka fara adana su domin sauƙin samun madara, gashi, nama, da kuma fatu.

data.translation: Ana yawan kula da awaki a garken da ke yawo a kan tuddai ko wasu wuraren kiwo, kuma a yawancin lokaci makiyaya ne da suke kula da su, wato yara ko matasa, kamar makiyayin da aka fi sani da su.
data.original_reference: A koyaushe ana ajiye awakin gida a cikin garken shanun da ke yawo a kan tsaunuka ko wasu wuraren kiwo, galibi masu kiwon awaki waɗanda yara da samari ne ke kula da su, kwatankwacin sanannen makiyayi. Wadannan hanyoyin kiwo har yanzu ana amfani dasu.
data.corrected_reference: A koyaushe ana ajiye awakin gida a cikin garken shanun da ke yawo a kan tsaunuka ko wasu wuraren kiwo, galibi masu kiwon awaki waɗanda yara da samari ne ke kula da su, kwatankwacin sanannen makiyayi. Wadannan hanyoyin kiwo har yanzu ana amfani dasu.

data.translation: An gina motocin hawa a Ingila tun a ƙarni na 16.
data.original_reference: An samar da layukan tarago a Ingila tun a wajejen Ƙarni na 16.
data.corrected_reference: An samar da layukan tarago a Ingila tun a wajejen Ƙarni na 16.

data.translation: Ko da yake hanyoyi na karusa sun ƙunshi katako ne kawai, sun ba da damar dawakai su ja su don su sami ƙarin gudu da kuma jan kaya fiye da kan hanyoyi masu wuya na zamanin dā.
data.original_reference: Duk da cewa keken dokin sun kunshi katako a jere, amma su kan ba da dama ga dawakan da ke jan su yin sauri tare da jan manyan kaya fiye da a kan hanyoyi masu gargada na zamanin.
data.corrected_reference: Duk da cewa keken dokin sun kunshi katako a jere, amma su kan ba da dama ga dawakan da ke jan su yin sauri tare da jan manyan kaya fiye da a kan hanyoyi masu gargada na zamanin.

data.translation: An gabatar da crossties da wuri don kiyaye hanyoyi a wuri. amma a hankali, an fahimci cewa hanyoyi za su fi dacewa idan suna da ƙarfe a saman.
data.original_reference: An sanya Crossties tun da wuri don su tsayar layukan. Sai dai, hankali, an gano cewa layukan za su fi dacewa idan suna da ɗori na ƙarfe a saman su.
data.corrected_reference: An sanya Crossties tun da wuri don su tsayar layukan. Sai dai, hankali, an gano cewa layukan za su fi dacewa idan suna da ɗori na ƙarfe a saman su.

data.translation: Wannan ya zama al'ada, amma baƙin ƙarfe ya sa ƙafafun katako na karusai suka ƙara lalacewa.
data.original_reference: Wannan ya zama aikin gama gari, sai ƙarfe ya haifar da ƙarin lalacewa a ƙafafun katako na kekunan.
data.corrected_reference: Wannan ya zama aikin gama gari, sai ƙarfe ya haifar da ƙarin lalacewa a ƙafafun katako na kekunan.

data.translation: Daga baya, an maye gurbin ƙafafun katako da na ƙarfe.
data.original_reference: Daga karshe, an sauya tayoyin katako da na karfe. A cikin 1767 an kaddamar da farkon hanyar jirgin kasa kerar karfe.
data.corrected_reference: Daga karshe, an sauya tayoyin katako da na karfe. A cikin 1767 an kaddamar da farkon hanyar jirgin kasa kerar karfe.

data.translation: Tafiya ta farko da aka sani ita ce tafiya, mutane sun fara tafiya a tsaye shekaru miliyan biyu da suka gabata tare da fitowar Homo Erectus (ma'ana nufin mutum tsaye).
data.original_reference: Hanyar sufuri ta farko da aka sani ita ce tafiya da ƙafa, mutane sun fara tafiya a miƙe shekaru miliyan biyu da suka gabata lokacin bayyanawar Homo Erectus (ma'ana miƙaƙƙen mutum).
data.corrected_reference: Hanyar sufuri ta farko da aka sani ita ce tafiya da ƙafa, mutane sun fara tafiya a miƙe shekaru miliyan biyu da suka gabata lokacin bayyanawar Homo Erectus (ma'ana miƙaƙƙen mutum).

data.translation: Tsohon 'yan gidansu, Australopithecus, ba su yi tafiya a tsaye kamar yadda suke yi a dā ba.
data.original_reference: Magabatan su, Australopithecus ba su yi tafiya miƙe ba kamar yadda ya ke a ɗabi’ance.
data.corrected_reference: Magabatan su, Australopithecus ba su yi tafiya miƙe ba kamar yadda ya ke a ɗabi’ance.

data.translation: An gano takaddun ƙira biyu a cikin burbushin Australopithecus daga shekaru miliyan 4.2-3.9 da suka gabata, kodayake Sahelanthropus na iya tafiya a kafafu biyu tun shekaru miliyan bakwai da suka gabata.
data.original_reference: An sami kwarewar dabbobi masu tafiya da kafafu biyu a ƙasusuwan tarihi na Australopithecus daga shekaru miliyan 4.2-3.9 da suka shude, duk da cewa watakila Sahelanthropus sun yi tafiya da kafafu biyu tun wajen shekaru miliyan bakwai da suka gabata.
data.corrected_reference: An sami kwarewar dabbobi masu tafiya da kafafu biyu a ƙasusuwan tarihi na Australopithecus daga shekaru miliyan 4.2-3.9 da suka shude, duk da cewa watakila Sahelanthropus sun yi tafiya da kafafu biyu tun wajen shekaru miliyan bakwai da suka gabata.

data.translation: Za mu iya rayuwa da ta fi dacewa da muhalli, za mu iya shiga cikin motsi na muhalli, har ma za mu iya zama masu fafutukar muhalli domin rage wahalar da za ta faru a nan gaba.
data.original_reference: Za mu iya fara zaman nuna sabo ga muhalli, za mu iya shiga cikin yunƙurin inganta muhalli, kuma mu kan iya zama ‘yan gwagwarmaya don rage wahala nan gaba a wani mataki.
data.corrected_reference: Za mu iya fara zaman nuna sabo ga muhalli, za mu iya shiga cikin yunƙurin inganta muhalli, kuma mu kan iya zama ‘yan gwagwarmaya don rage wahala nan gaba a wani mataki.

data.translation: Wannan yana kama da maganin bayyanar cututtuka a lokuta da yawa, amma idan ba kawai muna son warware matsalar ba, to, ya kamata mu gano tushen matsalar, kuma mu kashe ta.
data.original_reference: Wannan kamar magani ne na alamun cuta a lokuta da yawa. Koyaya, idan ba kawai muna son magancewa ta ɗan lokaci ba ne, to ya kamata mu samo tushen matsalolin, kuma mu kashe su.
data.corrected_reference: Wannan kamar magani ne na alamun cuta a lokuta da yawa. Koyaya, idan ba kawai muna son magancewa ta ɗan lokaci ba ne, to ya kamata mu samo tushen matsalolin, kuma mu kashe su.

data.translation: A bayyane yake cewa duniyar ta canza sosai saboda ci gaban kimiyya da fasaha na 'yan adam, kuma matsalolin sun kara girma saboda yawan mutane da kuma rayuwar'yan adam.
data.original_reference: A bayyane ya ke cewa duniya ta canza sosai saboda ci gaban Dan Adam a fannonin kimiyya da fasaha, kuma matsaloli sun karu sosai sakamakon yawan jama’a da halayyar mutane ta almubazzaranci.
data.corrected_reference: A bayyane ya ke cewa duniya ta canza sosai saboda ci gaban Dan Adam a fannonin kimiyya da fasaha, kuma matsaloli sun karu sosai sakamakon yawan jama’a da halayyar mutane ta almubazzaranci.

data.translation: Bayan da Majalisar ta amince da shi a ranar 4 ga watan Yuli, an aika da rubutun hannu wanda shugaban majalisar ya sanya hannu a hannun John Hancock da Sakatare Charles Thomson zuwa gidan buga littattafai na John Dunlap.
data.original_reference: Bayan Majalisar wakilai ta amince da shi a ranar 4 ta Yuli, sa'an nan aka aika wani daftarin da aka rubuta da hannu wanda Shugaban Majalisar John Hancock ya sa hannu da ɗan nesa zuwa ga shagon buga rubutu na John Dunlap.
data.corrected_reference: Bayan Majalisar wakilai ta amince da shi a ranar 4 ta Yuli, sa'an nan aka aika wani daftarin da aka rubuta da hannu wanda Shugaban Majalisar John Hancock ya sa hannu da ɗan nesa zuwa ga shagon buga rubutu na John Dunlap.

data.translation: A cikin dare an yi kwafin tsakanin 150 zuwa 200, wanda yanzu ake kira "Dunlap broadsides".
data.original_reference: Cikin daren an buga tsakanin 150 da 200 wanda aka fi sani da “Dunlap Broadsides”.
data.corrected_reference: Cikin daren an buga tsakanin 150 da 200 wanda aka fi sani da “Dunlap Broadsides”.

data.translation: John Nixon ne ya fara karanta wannan takardar a fili a gidan Independence Hall a ranar 8 ga Yuli.
data.original_reference: John Nixon ne ya yi karatun farko na daftarin a bainar jama’a cikin filin Independence Hall a ranar 8 ga watan Yuli.
data.corrected_reference: John Nixon ne ya yi karatun farko na daftarin a bainar jama’a cikin filin Independence Hall a ranar 8 ga watan Yuli.

data.translation: An aika da ɗaya ga George Washington a ranar 6 ga Yuli, wanda ya ba da shi ga sojojinsa a New York a ranar 9 ga Yuli.
data.original_reference: An aika ma George Washington ɗaya a ranar 6 ga Yuli, wanda ya karanta ma sojojinsa a New York ranar 9 ga Yuli. Wani kwafi ya isa Landan a ranar 10 ga watan Agusta.
data.corrected_reference: An aika ma George Washington ɗaya a ranar 6 ga Yuli, wanda ya karanta ma sojojinsa a New York ranar 9 ga Yuli. Wani kwafi ya isa Landan a ranar 10 ga watan Agusta.

data.translation: Duk da haka, akwai wasu littattafai da aka rubuta da hannu da suka fi tsufa a dā.
data.original_reference: Manyan bangarori 25 na Dunlap da har yanzu aka san sun wanzu sune mafi thufan kwafin rubutattun takardun. Kwafin rubutun hannun na asali ya salwanta.
data.corrected_reference: Manyan bangarori 25 na Dunlap da har yanzu aka san sun wanzu sune mafi thufan kwafin rubutattun takardun. Kwafin rubutun hannun na asali ya salwanta.

data.translation: Masana ilimin halittu da yawa a yau sun gaskata cewa akwai rukunin dinosaur da suka tsira kuma suna da rai a yau.
data.original_reference: Yawancin masana burbushin halittu a yau sunyi imanin cewa ƙungiyar dinosaur daya ta rayu kuma tana raye a yau. Muna kiran su tsuntsaye.
data.corrected_reference: Yawancin masana burbushin halittu a yau sunyi imanin cewa ƙungiyar dinosaur daya ta rayu kuma tana raye a yau. Muna kiran su tsuntsaye.

data.translation: Mutane da yawa ba sa tunanin su a matsayin dinosaur saboda suna da gashin gashi kuma suna iya tashi.
data.original_reference: Mutane da yawa basa tunanin cewa suna daga cikin halitun dinosaurs saboda suna da fiffike kuma suna iya tashi sama.
data.corrected_reference: Mutane da yawa basa tunanin cewa suna daga cikin halitun dinosaurs saboda suna da fiffike kuma suna iya tashi sama.

data.translation: Amma akwai abubuwa da yawa game da tsuntsaye da har yanzu suke kama da dinosaur.
data.original_reference: Amma akwai wasu abubuwa game da tsuntsuye dake kama da na dinosaur.
data.corrected_reference: Amma akwai wasu abubuwa game da tsuntsuye dake kama da na dinosaur.

data.translation: Suna da ƙafafu da ƙuƙwalwa da ƙusa, suna zubar da qwai, kuma suna tafiya a kafafunsu kamar T-Rex.
data.original_reference: Suna da ƙafafu masu gurji-gurji da fartuna, suna yin ƙwai, kuma suna tafiya kan ƙafafunsu biyu na baya kamar wani T-Rex.

data.translation: Kusan dukkanin kwamfutocin da ake amfani da su a yau sun dogara ne akan sarrafa bayanai wanda aka yi amfani da shi a cikin nau'i na lambobi biyu.
data.original_reference: Kusan duk kwamfutoci da ake amfani da su a yau sun dogara ne akan iya sarrafa bayanai wanda ake rufewa a sigar tagwayen lambobi.
data.corrected_reference: Kusan duk kwamfutoci da ake amfani da su a yau sun dogara ne akan iya sarrafa bayanai wanda ake rufewa a sigar tagwayen lambobi.

data.translation: Lambar binary na iya samun ɗaya daga cikin dabi'u biyu, wato 0 ko 1, kuma ana kiran waɗannan lambobi lambobi biyu - ko bits, don amfani da jargon kwamfuta.
data.original_reference: Lambar binary na iya samun ɗaya daga darajoji biyu, misali 0 ko 1, kuma waɗannan lambobin ana kiransu da lambobin binary - ko guntaye, in za a yi amfani da yaren kwamfuta.
data.corrected_reference: Lambar binary na iya samun ɗaya daga darajoji biyu, misali 0 ko 1, kuma waɗannan lambobin ana kiransu da lambobin binary - ko guntaye, in za a yi amfani da yaren kwamfuta.

data.translation: Wataƙila ba a lura da guba a ciki ba, amma ana iya gano alamunsu da yawa don kada a yi bincike nan da nan.
data.original_reference: Harbuwa da guba a cikin jiki ba abu ne da ake iya ganewa da wuri ba. Alamu irinsu amai gama gari ne don haka ba a iya tantancewa da wurwuri.
data.corrected_reference: Harbuwa da guba a cikin jiki ba abu ne da ake iya ganewa da wuri ba. Alamu irinsu amai gama gari ne don haka ba a iya tantancewa da wurwuri.

data.translation: Mafi kyawun alamar guba ta ciki na iya kasancewa a cikin wani akwati na budewa na magani ko sinadarai masu guba na gida.
data.original_reference: Hanya mafi saukin gane ko ana sami guba a ciki, shine watakila idan an sami budadden kwano na magani ko wasu sinadarai masu guba da ake amfanin yau da gobe da su a gida.

data.translation: Ka duba alamar don ka ga takamaiman umarnin taimakon farko don wannan guba.

data.translation: A Amirka, an san cewa akwai mutane 400,000 da ke fama da cutar ta Multiple Sclerosis (MS), kuma hakan ya sa ta zama babbar cuta ta jijiyoyi a cikin matasa da kuma tsofaffi.
data.original_reference: A duk faɗin Amurka, akwai kusan rahoto 400,000 na cutar Multiple Sclerosis (MS), abinda ya sa ta zama ja-gaba cikin ciwukan sadarwa a jiki ga matasa da masu shekaru tsaka-tsaki.

data.translation: MS cuta ce da ke shafar tsarin jijiyoyin jiki na tsakiya, wanda ya ƙunshi kwakwalwa, ƙashin baya da jijiyar gani.
data.original_reference: Cutar MS cuta ce da ke shafar lakkar jikin dan adam, da ya hadar da kwakwalwa da jijiyar lakkar da kuma na kai sakonni.
data.corrected_reference: Cutar MS cuta ce da ke shafar lakkar jikin dan adam, da ya hadar da kwakwalwa da jijiyar lakkar da kuma na kai sakonni.

data.translation: Bincike ya nuna cewa mata suna da damar kamuwa da MS sau biyu fiye da maza.

data.corrected_reference: Bincike ya gano cewa mata sun fi alamar samun MS da ninka biyu a kan maza.

data.translation: Ma'aurata za su iya yanke shawara cewa ba zai dace su yi renon yaro ba.

data.translation: Waɗannan ma'aurata za su iya shirya yadda za su yi amfani da jaririnsu.

data.translation: Babban burin kimiyya shine gano yadda duniya ke aiki ta hanyar hanyar kimiyya. Wannan hanyar a zahiri tana jagorantar yawancin binciken kimiyya.

data.translation: Ba wai kawai ba ne, gwaji, kuma gwaji gwaji ne da ake amfani da shi don kawar da ɗaya ko fiye da yiwuwar zato, yin tambayoyi, da kuma yin lura kuma jagorantar binciken kimiyya.
data.original_reference: Ba shi kaɗai bane dai, yin gwaji, kuma gwaji wata hanya ce ta jarrabawa da ake amfani da ita domin kawar da ɗaya ko fiye daga cikin harsashe da za a samu. yin tambayoyi, da fadin ra’ayi su ma suna yin jagora ga binciken kimiyya.

data.translation: Yawancin sautin da aka lura a ilimin lissafi da kuma hali sau da yawa suna dogara ne akan kasancewar sake zagayowar endogenous da kuma samar da su ta hanyar agogon halitta.
data.original_reference: An lura cewa yawancin tsarukan yadda jiki ke aiki da kuma halayya sun dogara ne da samuwar zangogi yadda abubuwa ke juyawa wadanda agogunan jiki ke samarwa.
data.corrected_reference: An lura cewa yawancin tsarukan yadda jiki ke aiki da kuma halayya sun dogara ne da samuwar zangogi yadda abubuwa ke juyawa wadanda agogunan jiki ke samarwa.

data.translation: An rubuta tsarin lokaci-lokaci, wanda ba kawai amsa ga siginar lokaci-lokaci na waje ba, ga yawancin halittu masu rai, ciki har da kwayoyin cuta, naman kaza, tsire-tsire, da dabbobi.
data.original_reference: sauti na lokaci-lokaci, wanda ba su martani ga alamu na yanayi, an kayyade su don hallitu masu rai har da kwayoyin cuta, da fungi da tsirai, da dabbobi.
data.corrected_reference: Periodic rithyms, wayenda ba kawai martani bane zuwa ga periodic cues din waje ba, anyi rubutasu akan yawanci halittu masu rai, irin su bakteriya, fungi, bishiyu da dabbobi.

data.translation: Sa'o'i na halitta sune masu karkatarwa masu kai tsaye wadanda zasu ci gaba da yin tafiya a kan keke ko da ba tare da alamun waje ba.
data.original_reference: Halittun jikin mutum sune suke ci gaba da wanzuwa a yayin da mutum ke gudu ko da ba tare da wasu abubuwa daga waje/gefe.
data.corrected_reference: Halittun jikin mutum sune suke ci gaba da wanzuwa a yayin da mutum ke gudu ko da ba tare da wasu abubuwa daga waje/gefe.

data.translation: Gwajin Hershey da Chase na daya daga cikin manyan shawarwari cewa DNA abu ne na halitta.
data.original_reference: Gwajin Hershey da Chase na ɗaya daga cikin ra’ayoyin da ke kan gaba da ke nuni da cewa DNA wani abu ne na rayuwa.
data.corrected_reference: Gwajin Hershey and Chase na daya daga cikin shawarwari na gaba-gaba akan DNA ta kasance genetic material.

data.translation: Hershey da Chase sun yi amfani da kwayoyin cuta don su saka DNA a cikin kwayoyin.
data.original_reference: Hershey da Chase sun yi amfani da phages, ko ƙwayoyin cututtuka, wajen shigar da sinadarin DNA nasu a cikin wata ƙwayar cuta.
data.corrected_reference: Hershey da Chase sun yi amfani da phages, ko ƙwayoyin cututtuka, wajen shigar da sinadarin DNA nasu a cikin wata ƙwayar cuta.

data.translation: Sun yi gwaje-gwaje biyu da suka yi da suka nuna DNA a cikin phage da phosphorus mai radiation ko kuma furotin phage da sulfur mai radiation.
data.original_reference: Sunyi gwaje-gwaje guda biyu wanda ke nuna alamar ko DNA a cikin fage tare da phosphorus na rediyoaktif ko furotin na phage tare da sulfur na rediyo.
data.corrected_reference: Sunyi gwaje-gwaje guda biyu wanda ke nuna alamar ko DNA a cikin fage tare da phosphorus na rediyoaktif ko furotin na phage tare da sulfur na rediyo.

data.translation: Abubuwan da suka faru na iya haifar da sakamako daban-daban dangane da irin wannan juyin halitta, muhimmancin ɓangaren kwayoyin da aka shafa da kuma ko kwayoyin da aka shafa su ne kwayoyin halitta.
data.original_reference: Maye gurbi zai iya samun bambancin nau'ikan sakamako iri daban-daban dangane da nau'in maye gurbi, mahimmancin yanki na kayan gado ya shafa kuma ko kwayoyin halita da abin ya shafa sune kwayoyin halita.
data.corrected_reference: Maye gurbi zai iya samun bambancin nau'ikan sakamako iri daban-daban dangane da nau'in maye gurbi, mahimmancin yanki na kayan gado ya shafa kuma ko kwayoyin halita da abin ya shafa sune kwayoyin halita.

data.translation: Abubuwan da suka faru a wasu wurare na rayuwa suna iya haifar da mutuwar ƙwayoyin ko kuma ciwon daji.
data.original_reference: Rikiɗa a ƙwayoyin halitta na layin ƙwayar cuta ne kaɗai za a iya gadar wa yara, yayin da rikiɗa a wani wuri kan iya haddasa mutuwar ƙwayar halitta ko cutar sankara.
data.corrected_reference: Rikiɗa a ƙwayoyin halitta na layin ƙwayar cuta ne kaɗai za a iya gadar wa yara, yayin da rikiɗa a wani wuri kan iya haddasa mutuwar ƙwayar halitta ko cutar sankara.

data.translation: Yawon shakatawa na yanayi yana jan hankalin mutane masu sha'awar ziyartar wuraren halitta don jin daɗin shimfidar wuri, gami da namun daji da dabbobi.

data.corrected_reference: Yawon shakatawa na yanayi yana jan hankalin mutane masu sha'awar ziyartar yankuna na asali don jin daɗin shimfidar wuri, gami da tsirrai da dabbobin daji.

data.corrected_reference: A kasashen da suka ci gaba ba kasafai ake jin irin wannan korafin ba game da ingancin ruwa ko gadoji da ke faduwa.

data.translation: Me ya sa tsarin sufuri ke haifar da irin wannan korafi, me ya sa suke kasawa a kullum? Shin injiniyoyin sufuri ba su da kwarewa? Ko kuwa wani abu mafi mahimmanci yana faruwa?

data.translation: Gudun zirga-zirga shine nazarin motsi na direbobi da motoci tsakanin maki biyu da hulɗar da suke yi da juna.
data.original_reference: Gudanar Zirga-zirga shine nazari kan zirga-zirgar ɗaiɗaikun direbobi da ababen hawa tsakanin wurare biyu tare da ma’amala da suke yi da juna.

data.translation: Abin takaici, nazarin zirga-zirgar zirga-zirga yana da wuya domin ba za a iya hango ko hasashen halin direba da tabbaci na kashi ɗari ba.
data.original_reference: Abin takaici, bincikawar zirga-zirga ababen hawa abu ne mai wahala saboda ba’a iya yin hasashen hakikanci halin direba dari bisa dari.
data.corrected_reference: Abin takaici, bincikawar zirga-zirga ababen hawa abu ne mai wahala saboda ba’a iya yin hasashen hakikanci halin direba dari bisa dari.

data.translation: Abin farin ciki, direbobi suna nuna hali a cikin wani sashi mai kyau; saboda haka, zirga-zirgar zirga-zirga na da wani sashi mai kyau kuma ana iya nuna su ta hanyar lissafi.
data.original_reference: An yi sa'a, direbobi su na tuki a cikin nutsuwa yadda kwararar ababen hawa a titi ke tafiya a natse don haka ana iya nazarin yanayin ta hanyar lissafi.
data.corrected_reference: An yi sa'a, direbobi su na tuki a cikin nutsuwa yadda kwararar ababen hawa a titi ke tafiya a natse don haka ana iya nazarin yanayin ta hanyar lissafi.

data.translation: Don a nuna yadda zirga-zirga ke gudana, an kafa dangantaka tsakanin manyan abubuwa uku: (1) gudana, (2) kauri, da (3) saurin.
data.original_reference: Domin gabatar da yanayin hanya, an kulla alaƙa tsakanin muhimman al’amura uku: (1) gudana, (2) cinkoso da (3) watsuwa.
data.corrected_reference: Domin gabatar da yanayin hanya, an kulla alaƙa tsakanin muhimman al’amura uku: (1) gudana, (2) cinkoso da (3) watsuwa.

data.translation: Kogin Amazon shi ne kogin biyu mafi tsawo da kuma mafi girma a duniya. Yana dauke da ruwa fiye da sau 8 fiye da kogin biyu mafi girma.

data.translation: Kogin Amazon shi ne kogin da ya fi fadi a duniya, wani lokacin kuma ya yi nisa mil shida.

data.translation: Babban kogin Amazon yana da tsawon kilomita 6,387. Yana tattara ruwa daga dubban ƙananan koguna.

data.corrected_reference: Babbar Ƙoramar Amazon ta na da nisan 6,387 km (3,980 mil). Tana karbar ruwa daga dubban kananan ƙoramu.

data.translation: Ko da yake gina manyan birane a dutse ya ci gaba har zuwa ƙarshen Tsohon Mulkin, ba a taɓa wucewa manyan biranen Giza ba ta girman su da kuma ƙwarewar fasaha na gina su.
data.original_reference: Ko da yake ginin dala a cikin dutse ya ci gaba har zuwa ƙarshen tsohuwar Masarautar, dala ta Giza ba a taɓa wuce ta da girmansu da ƙwarewar fasaha na ginin su ba.

data.translation: Masarawa na dā sun yi mamakin wuraren tunawa da suka riga su kafa, waɗanda a lokacin sun fi shekara dubu.
data.original_reference: Sabuwar Daula ta daulolin baya na Misra su na yaba yadda kakanninsu su ka giggina abubuwa na tarihi, wadanda ko a wancan lokacin sun haura shekaru dubu.
data.corrected_reference: Sabuwar Daula ta daulolin baya na Misra su na yaba yadda kakanninsu su ka giggina abubuwa na tarihi, wadanda ko a wancan lokacin sun haura shekaru dubu.

data.translation: Vatican City tana da mazauna kusan 800. Ita ce kasa mafi ƙanƙanta a duniya kuma kasa mafi ƙarancin yawan jama'a.
data.original_reference: Yawan al’ummar Birnin Vatican ya kai kimanin mutane 800. Ita ce kasa mafi kankanta cikin kasashe masu yancin kansu kuma mafi karancin yawan jama’a.
data.corrected_reference: Yawan al’ummar Birnin Vatican ya kai kimanin mutane 800. Ita ce kasa mafi kankanta cikin kasashe masu yancin kansu kuma mafi karancin yawan jama’a.

data.translation: Birnin Vatican yana amfani da harshen Italiyanci a cikin dokokinsa da kuma sadarwa ta hukuma.
data.original_reference: Fadar Vatican tana amfani da harshen Italiya a dokoki da kuma sadarwar hukuma.
data.corrected_reference: Fadar Vatican tana amfani da harshen Italiya a dokoki da kuma sadarwar hukuma.

data.translation: Har ila yau, yawancin ma'aikatan jihar suna amfani da yaren Italiyanci a yau da kullum yayin da ake amfani da Latin a lokuta na addini.
data.original_reference: Yaren Italiyanci kuma yare ne na yau da kullun da yawancin waɗanda ke aiki a cikin jihar ke amfani dashi yayin da ake amfani da Latin a cikin bukukuwan addini.
data.corrected_reference: Yaren Italiyanci kuma yare ne na yau da kullun da yawancin waɗanda ke aiki a cikin jihar ke amfani dashi yayin da ake amfani da Latin a cikin bukukuwan addini.

data.translation: Duk 'yan ƙasar Vatican Katolika ne.
data.original_reference: Dukkan al’ummar Fadar Vatican ‘yan Dariƙar Katolika ne.
data.corrected_reference: Dukkan al’ummar Fadar Vatican ‘yan Dariƙar Katolika ne.

data.translation: Mutane sun san abubuwa na asali na sinadarai kamar zinariya, azurfa, da tagulla tun zamanin dā, domin ana iya gano su a yanayi a cikin nau'i na asali kuma suna da sauƙin hakar su da kayan aiki na asali.
data.original_reference: Mutane sun san abubuwan da keɓaɓɓun sinadarai kamar su zinariya, azir, da jan ƙarfe daga tsufa, yadda waɗannan za su iya gano su duka a yanayin halitta kuma sun fi sauƙi ga nawa tare da kayan aikin farko.
data.corrected_reference: Mutane sun san abubuwan da keɓaɓɓun sinadarai kamar su zinariya, azir, da jan ƙarfe daga tsufa, yadda waɗannan za su iya gano su duka a yanayin halitta kuma sun fi sauƙi ga nawa tare da kayan aikin farko.

data.translation: Aristotle, wani ɗan falsafa, ya ce dukan abubuwa sun ƙunshi abubuwa huɗu ko fiye: ƙasa, ruwa, iska, da wuta.
data.original_reference: Aristotle, masanin falsafa ne, yayi tunanin cewa komai ya kunshi cakuda daya ko fiye daga abubuwa hudu. Sun kasance ƙasa, ruwa, iska, da wuta.
data.corrected_reference: Aristotle, masanin falsafa ne, yayi tunanin cewa komai ya kunshi cakuda daya ko fiye daga abubuwa hudu. Sun kasance ƙasa, ruwa, iska, da wuta.

data.translation: Wannan ya fi kama da yanayi huɗu na abu (a cikin tsari ɗaya): mai ƙarfi, ruwa, gas, da kuma plasma, ko da yake ya kuma yi ka'idar cewa suna canzawa zuwa sababbin abubuwa don ƙirƙirar abin da muke gani.
data.original_reference: Wannan ya fi kama da yanayi hudu na abu (a tsari iri daya): daskara, ruwa, iska, da damshi, ko da yake ya kuma yi hasashe da cewa su kan canza zuwa sabbin abubuwa domin zama abin da muke gani.
data.corrected_reference: Wannan ya fi kama da yanayi hudu na abu (a tsari iri daya): daskara, ruwa, iska, da damshi, ko da yake ya kuma yi hasashe da cewa su kan canza zuwa sabbin abubuwa domin zama abin da muke gani.

data.translation: Alloy ne a zahiri wani cakuda biyu ko fiye da karfe. Kada ka manta cewa akwai abubuwa da yawa a kan tebur na lokaci.
data.original_reference: Karafan gami ne na ƙarafa biyu ko fiye da haka. Kar a manta cewa akwai abubuwa da yawa a kan jadawali na lokaci-lokaci.
data.corrected_reference: Karafan gami ne na ƙarafa biyu ko fiye da haka. Kar a manta cewa akwai abubuwa da yawa a kan jadawali na lokaci-lokaci.

data.translation: Abubuwan da ake kira abubuwa kamar calcium da potassium ana kiransu karfe.
data.original_reference: Ana alaƙanta sinadarai kamar calcium da kanwa a zaman ƙarafa. Tabbas, akwai kuma ƙarafa kamar azurfa da zinare.
data.corrected_reference: Ana alaƙanta sinadarai kamar calcium da kanwa a zaman ƙarafa. Tabbas, akwai kuma ƙarafa kamar azurfa da zinare.

data.translation: Hakanan zaka iya samun gami wanda ya hada da kananan adadi na abubuwa wadanda ba na karfe ba kamar carbon.
data.original_reference: Haka nan za ka iya gamin da ya haɗa da yanki kaɗan na abubuwan da ba ƙarfe ba kamar gawayi.
data.corrected_reference: Haka nan za ka iya gamin da ya haɗa da yanki kaɗan na abubuwan da ba ƙarfe ba kamar gawayi.

data.translation: Dukan abubuwa a sararin samaniya sun ƙunshi ƙananan ƙwayoyin da ake kira atoms.
data.original_reference: Duk wani abu cikin sammai da kassai an yi shi da dunkulen kwayar halittar mara rai. Dukunlen kwayar halitta mara rai ya kunshi kanana kwayoyin zarra.
data.corrected_reference: Duk wani abu cikin sammai da kassai an yi shi da dunkulen kwayar halittar mara rai. Dukunlen kwayar halitta mara rai ya kunshi kanana kwayoyin zarra.

data.translation: Atoms suna da ƙanƙanta sosai da za su iya shiga cikin lokaci a ƙarshen wannan jumla.
data.original_reference: Ƙwayoyin zarra ƙanana ne matuƙa inda tiriliyoyinsu kan iya shigewa cikin ɗigon ayar da ke karshen wannan jimla.
data.corrected_reference: Ƙwayoyin zarra ƙanana ne matuƙa inda tiriliyoyinsu kan iya shigewa cikin ɗigon ayar da ke karshen wannan jimla.

data.translation: Saboda haka, mutane da yawa sun san alkalami sosai sa'ad da aka wallafa shi.
data.original_reference: Hakika, alkalamin babban amini ne ga mutane da dama lokacin da ya fito.
data.corrected_reference: Hakika, alkalamin babban amini ne ga mutane da dama lokacin da ya fito.

data.translation: Abin baƙin ciki, da sababbin hanyoyin rubutu suka taso, an rage amfani da fensir.
data.original_reference: Abin bakin ciki, yayin da sababbin hanyoyin rubutu suka fito, sai aka mayar da fensir zuwa matsayi da amfani na ƙasa.
data.corrected_reference: Abin bakin ciki, yayin da sababbin hanyoyin rubutu suka fito, sai aka mayar da fensir zuwa matsayi da amfani na ƙasa.

data.translation: Mutane suna rubuta saƙonni a allon kwamfuta, ba su taɓa kusantar mai kaifin ba.
data.original_reference: Yanzu mutane suna rubuta saƙonni a kan fuskokin kwamfuta, ba tare da sun taɓa kusantar shafana ba.
data.corrected_reference: Yanzu mutane suna rubuta saƙonni a kan fuskokin kwamfuta, ba tare da sun taɓa kusantar shafana ba.

data.translation: Mutum zai iya yin mamakin abin da keyboard zai zama idan wani sabon abu ya zo.

data.translation: Bomb din fission yana aiki ne bisa ka'idar cewa yana bukatar makamashi domin hada wani nukiliya mai dauke da protons da neutrons da yawa.
data.original_reference: Bam mai tarwatsewa yana aiki ne akan ƙa’idar cewa yana zukar kuzari domin ya dunkule yayan kwayar zarra na protons da neutrons a tsakiyar kwayar zarrar.

data.translation: Kamar yin gungurawa a kan tudu, sai a sake raba nukiliya sai a sake sakin wasu makamashi.
data.original_reference: Kamar gangara babban keke zuwa tudu. Tsage tsakiya kuma sannan ya saki wasu daga cikin wannan kuzari.
data.corrected_reference: Kamar gangara babban keke zuwa tudu. Tsage tsakiya kuma sannan ya saki wasu daga cikin wannan kuzari.

data.translation: Wasu kwayoyin suna da ƙwayoyin halitta marasa ƙarfi wanda ke nufin cewa suna da saurin karyewa tare da ƙarancin ko babu turawa.

data.corrected_reference: Wasu kwayar zarra suna da nuclei mai canzawa wanda ya nuna cewa suna iya rabewa da ‘yar ƙarfafawa ko babu .

data.translation: Fuskar wata ta ƙunshi duwatsu da ƙura.

data.corrected_reference: Farfajiyan wata yana da duwatsu da kura. Ana kiran shimfidar wajen wata crust.

data.translation: Kayan ya kai kimanin kilomita 70 a gefen kusa da kuma kilomita 100 a gefen baya.

data.translation: Yana da siriri a ƙarƙashin maria kuma ya fi kauri a ƙarƙashin tsaunuka.

data.original_reference: Za a iya samun ƙarin maria a gefen kusa saboda bangon siriri ne. Abu ne mai sauƙi narkakken dutse ya tashi zuwa saman.
data.corrected_reference: Za a iya samun ƙarin maria a gefen kusa saboda bangon siriri ne. Abu ne mai sauƙi narkakken dutse ya tashi zuwa saman.

data.translation: Ka'idodin abubuwan da ke ciki sun fi mayar da hankali ne ga gano abin da ke sa mutane su yi kama da su ko kuma su yi kira gare su.
data.original_reference: Tsarin tallan ya dogara wajen gano abinda ya fi ba mutane sha’awa ko su ka fi so.
data.corrected_reference: Tsarin tallan ya dogara wajen gano abinda ya fi ba mutane sha’awa ko su ka fi so.

data.translation: Waɗannan ka'idodin sun nuna cewa mutane suna da wasu bukatu da / ko sha'awa waɗanda aka halicce su yayin da suke girma zuwa balaga.
data.original_reference: Waɗannan hasashe suna nuna cewa mutane suna da wasu buƙatu da/ko sha'awa waɗanda akai maida su ciki yayin da suke manyanta zuwa balaga.
data.corrected_reference: Waɗannan hasashe suna nuna cewa mutane suna da wasu buƙatu da/ko sha'awa waɗanda akai maida su ciki yayin da suke manyanta zuwa balaga.

data.translation: Wadannan ka'idoji suna duba abin da ke cikin wasu mutane wanda ke sa su so abubuwan da suke yi da kuma abin da abubuwan da ke kewaye da su zasu sa su yi ko kada su yi wasu abubuwa.
data.original_reference: Wadannan ra'ayoyin suna kallon menene game da wasu mutane da ke sa su abubuwan da suke yi da kuma wanne abubuwan ne a muhallin su zai sanya su yi ko kuma kin yin nau’in wasu abu.
data.corrected_reference: Wadannan ra'ayoyin suna kallon menene game da wasu mutane da ke sa su abubuwan da suke yi da kuma wanne abubuwan ne a muhallin su zai sanya su yi ko kuma kin yin nau’in wasu abu.

data.translation: Shahararrun ka'idojin abun ciki guda biyu sune ka'idar Maslow ta Hierarchy of Needs da ka'idar Hertzberg ta Two Factor.
data.original_reference: A matakan bayanan tsarin abubuwa, guda biyu mafi shahara su ne Hierachy of Needs na Maslow Two factor theory na Hertzberg.
data.corrected_reference: A matakan bayanan tsarin abubuwa, guda biyu mafi shahara su ne Hierachy of Needs na Maslow Two factor theory na Hertzberg.

data.translation: Gabaɗaya magana, halaye biyu na iya bayyana yayin da manajoji suka fara jagorantar tsoffin takwarorinsu.
data.original_reference: A takaice, halaye guda biyu na iya bayyana yayin da manajoji zasu fara jagorantar tsoffin abokan aikinsu. daga cikin ƙarshen bakan yana ƙoƙarin kasancewa “ɗayan mutane” (ko gals).

data.translation: Irin wannan manajan yana da wahalar yanke shawara da ba ta shahara ba, yin horo, kimantawa, ba da alhakin, da kuma lissafin mutane.
data.original_reference: Irin wannan manajan yana da wahalar yanke shawara mara kyau, aiwatar da ladabtarwa, kimanta aikin aiki, sanya nauyi, da ɗaukar mutane da alhaki.

data.translation: A wani bangare na wannan yanayin, mutum ya zama mutum wanda ba a san shi ba wanda ya ji cewa dole ne ya canza duk abin da ƙungiyar ta yi kuma ya zama nasu.
data.original_reference: A daya ƙarshen ɓarin, mutum zai zama koma wanda ba za'a iya gane shi ba wanda yake ko ta ke jin dole ne ya ko ta canza duk abinda kungiyar ta ke yi kuma su maida shi nasu.
data.corrected_reference: A daya ƙarshen ɓarin, mutum zai zama koma wanda ba za'a iya gane shi ba wanda yake ko ta ke jin dole ne ya ko ta canza duk abinda kungiyar ta ke yi kuma su maida shi nasu.

data.translation: A ƙarshe, shugaban ne ke da alhakin nasarar da kuma gazawar ƙungiyar.
data.original_reference: Bayan haka, a ƙarshe jagoran shi yake da alhakin nasara da rashin nasarar kungiyar.
data.corrected_reference: Bayan haka, a ƙarshe jagoran shi yake da alhakin nasara da rashin nasarar kungiyar.

data.translation: Irin wannan hali yakan haifar da jayayya tsakanin shugabannin da sauran 'yan tawagar.
data.original_reference: Halayyar yawancin lokuta na janyo saɓani tsakanin shugabanni da sauran ‘yan kungiyar.
data.corrected_reference: Halayyar yawancin lokuta na janyo saɓani tsakanin shugabanni da sauran ‘yan kungiyar.

data.translation: Ana gudanar da kungiyoyin masu kama da juna a matsayin kungiyoyin da suka saba, amma akwai bambance-bambance masu ban mamaki.
data.original_reference: Tawagogin da bana ainihi ba ana ganinsu daidai da yadda tawagogi na gaske suke, amma dai akwai wasu ‘yan banbance-banbancen da ba za a rasa ba.
data.corrected_reference: Tawagogin da bana ainihi ba ana ganinsu daidai da yadda tawagogi na gaske suke, amma dai akwai wasu ‘yan banbance-banbancen da ba za a rasa ba.

data.translation: 'Yan tawagar na yau da kullum sukan zama wurin tuntuɓar' yan tawagarsu.
data.original_reference: Mambobin na kan intanet galibi suna aiki a matsayin hanyar tuntuɓa ta rukuninsu na zahiri.
data.corrected_reference: Mambobin na kan intanet galibi suna aiki a matsayin hanyar tuntuɓa ta rukuninsu na zahiri.

data.translation: Sau da yawa suna da 'yanci fiye da' yan tawagar gargajiya saboda ƙungiyoyin su na iya haɗuwa bisa ga yankunan lokaci daban-daban wanda ba za a iya fahimtar su ba ta hanyar gudanarwar su ta gida.
data.original_reference: Yawancin lokaci suna da 'yancin kai fiye da membobin ƙungiyar al'ada kamar yadda kungiyoyin su zasu iya haduwa bisa tsarin lokaci daban-daban wanda mai kula da su na iya fahimtar da su.
data.corrected_reference: Yawancin lokaci suna da ƴancin kai fiye da membobin ƙungiyar al'ada kamar yadda kungiyoyin su zasu iya haduwa bisa tsarin lokaci daban-daban wanda mai kula da su na iya fahimtar da su.

data.translation: Kasancewar ƙungiyar gaskiya marar ganuwa (Larson da LaFasto, 1989, p109) ma wani bangare ne na ƙungiyar mai kama da ido.
data.original_reference: Kasancewar ainihin “tawagar da ba a iya gani” (Larson da LaFasto, a sheakarar 1989, shafi na 109) shi ma wani nau’i ne na wata tawaga ba ta zahiri ba.
data.corrected_reference: Kasancewar ainihin “tawagar da ba a iya gani” (Larson da LaFasto, a sheakarar 1989, shafi na 109) shi ma wani nau’i ne na wata tawaga ba ta zahiri ba.

data.translation: Ƙungiyar da ba ta ganuwa ita ce ƙungiyar gudanarwa da kowane memba ya ba da rahoto ga. Ƙungiyar da ba ta ganuwa ta kafa ƙa'idodi ga kowane memba.
data.original_reference: “Tawagar da ba a gani” ita ce tawagar gudanarwa wadda kowanne memba ya ke biyayya. Tawagar da ba a gani tana sanya ƙa'idodi ga kowanne memba.
data.corrected_reference: “Tawagar da ba a gani” ita ce tawagar gudanarwa wadda kowanne memba ya ke biyayya. Tawagar da ba a gani tana sanya ƙa'idodi ga kowanne memba.

data.translation: Me ya sa wata kungiya za ta so ta bi hanyar da ke cin lokaci na kafa ƙungiyar ilmantarwa?
data.original_reference: Me yasa kungiya zata so ta dauki nauyin daukar lokaci don kafa kungiyar ilmantarwa? Buri daya na sanya tunanin ilmantarwa na tsari a aikace shine bidi'a.
data.corrected_reference: Me yasa kungiya zata so ta dauki nauyin daukar lokaci don kafa kungiyar ilmantarwa? Buri daya na sanya tunanin ilmantarwa na tsari a aikace shine bidi'a.

data.translation: Idan aka yi amfani da duk albarkatun da ke akwai a cikin sassan aiki na wata kungiya, za a iya samun kerawa da basira.
data.original_reference: Lokacin da aka yi amfani da duk albarkatun da ke akwai ta yadda yakamata a tsakanin sassan ayyukan ƙungiya, kerawa da ƙwarewa na iya wucewa.
data.corrected_reference: Lokacin da aka yi amfani da duk albarkatun da ke akwai ta yadda yakamata a tsakanin sassan ayyukan ƙungiya, kerawa da ƙwarewa na iya wucewa.

data.translation: A sakamakon haka, tsarin da kungiyar ke aiki tare don shawo kan wani cikas na iya haifar da sabon tsari na kirkire-kirkire don biyan bukatun abokin ciniki.
data.original_reference: A sakamakon haka, matakin na kungiya da ke aiki tare domin magance wata matsala zai iya kai wa ga ƙirƙirar sabon mataki da zai biya bukatun abokan ciniki.
data.corrected_reference: A sakamakon haka, matakin na kungiya da ke aiki tare domin magance wata matsala zai iya kai wa ga ƙirƙirar sabon mataki da zai biya bukatun abokan ciniki.

data.translation: Kafin wata kungiya ta kasance mai kirkire-kirkire, dole ne shugabanci ya kirkiro al'adun kirkire-kirkire da kuma raba ilimi da ilmantarwa ta hanyar kungiya.
data.original_reference: Kafin wata ma’aikata ta zama mai kirkira, dole jagoranci ya samar da wata al’ada ta kirki da kuma musayar ilimi da tsarin koyo na ma’aikata.
data.corrected_reference: Kafin wata ma’aikata ta zama mai kirkira, dole jagoranci ya samar da wata al’ada ta kirki da kuma musayar ilimi da tsarin koyo na ma’aikata.

data.translation: Angel (2006), ya bayyana tsarin Continuum a matsayin wata hanya da ake amfani da ita wajen taimakawa kungiyoyi su kai ga matakin da ya fi dacewa.
data.original_reference: Angel (2006), ya yi bayanin yanayin Continuum matsayin hanar da ka iya taimakawa maaikatu su daukaka tare da kara karfi.
data.corrected_reference: Angel (2006), ya yi bayanin yanayin Continuum matsayin hanar da ka iya taimakawa maaikatu su daukaka tare da kara ƙarfi.

data.translation: Bayanai na neurobiological sun samar da hujjoji na zahiri na hanyar nazari don binciken ilimin, saboda haka yana rage yankin bincike kuma ya sa ya zama mafi daidaito.
data.original_reference: Bayanan sadarwar lantarki a jikin halitta ya bada hujjoji na zahiri ta yadda za a fuskanci bincike na kwakwalwa. Don haka wanna ya rage fadin filin bincike tare da bada tabbaci.
data.corrected_reference: Bayanan sadarwar lantarki a jikin halitta ya bada hujjoji na zahiri ta yadda za a fuskanci bincike na kwakwalwa. Don haka wanna ya rage fadin filin bincike tare da bada tabbaci.

data.translation: Hadin kan dake tsakanin ilimin kwakwalwa da hali ya goyi bayan masana kimiyya a binciken su.
data.original_reference: Halin da ke tsakanin cututtukan kwakwalwa da halayyar yana tallafawa masana kimiyya a cikin binciken su.
data.corrected_reference: Halin da ke tsakanin cututtukan kwakwalwa da halayyar yana tallafawa masana kimiyya a cikin binciken su.

data.translation: An san tun da daɗewa cewa nau'i daban-daban na lalacewar kwakwalwa, raɗaɗi, raunuka, da ciwo suna shafar hali kuma suna haifar da canje-canje a wasu ayyukan tunani.
data.original_reference: An daɗe kwarai da sanin cewa matsalar ƙwaƙwalwa, firgicewa, gyambo da kumburi daban-daban suna shafar halayya tare janyo sauyi a aiyukan ƙwaƙwalwa.
data.corrected_reference: An daɗe kwarai da sanin cewa matsalar ƙwaƙwalwa, firgicewa, gyambo da kumburi daban-daban suna shafar halayya tare janyo sauyi a aiyukan ƙwaƙwalwa.

data.translation: Fitowar sabbin fasahohi na ba mu damar ganin da kuma bincika tsarin kwakwalwa da kuma hanyoyin da ba a taɓa gani ba.
data.original_reference: Tashin sabbin fasaha ya bamu daman gani da bincika tsarin kwakwalwa da tafiyar matakai wadda ba a taba gani ba a da.
data.corrected_reference: Tashin sabbin fasaha ya bamu daman gani da bincika tsarin kwakwalwa da tafiyar matakai wadda ba a taba gani ba a da.

data.translation: Wannan yana ba mu bayanai da kayan aiki da yawa don gina samfurin kwaikwayo wanda ke taimaka mana fahimtar ayyukan da ke cikin tunaninmu.
data.original_reference: Wannan yana ba mu bayanai masu yawa da kayan aiki don gina samfuran kwaikwayo waɗanda ke taimaka mana fahimtar matakai da ke zukatun mu.

data.translation: Ko da yake AI tana da ma'ana mai ƙarfi na almara na kimiyya, AI tana da mahimmancin reshe na kimiyyar kwamfuta, wanda ke magance halayya, koyo da daidaitawa mai hankali a cikin na'ura.
data.original_reference: Kodayake AI yana da ƙarfin ƙarin ma'anar almara ta kimiyya, AI ya kasance wani reshe na kimiyyar kwamfuta mai matuƙar muhimmanci, da ke mu'amala da halayya, koyo da kuma shigar da fasahar ƙwaƙwalwa a cikin inji.
data.corrected_reference: Kodayake AI yana da ƙarfin ƙarin ma'anar almara ta kimiyya, AI ya kasance wani reshe na kimiyyar kwamfuta mai matuƙar muhimmanci, da ke mu'amala da halayya, koyo da kuma shigar da fasahar ƙwaƙwalwa a cikin inji.

data.translation: Bincike a AI ya shafi yin inji don sarrafa ayyukan da ke bukatar hali mai hankali.
data.original_reference: Bincike a kan na’urorin mutum mutumi ya jibanci saka na’urori aiki wanda ke bukatar basira kafin aikata su.
data.corrected_reference: Bincike a kan na’urorin mutum mutumi ya jibanci saka na’urori aiki wanda ke bukatar basira kafin aikata su.

data.translation: Misalai sun hada da sarrafawa, tsarawa da tsarawa, iya amsawa ga binciken da abokan ciniki ke yi da kuma tambayoyi, da kuma ganewa da rubutu, murya da fuska.
data.original_reference: Misalai sun hada da sarrafawa, shiryawa da tanadi, iya amsa tambayoyi da ganewar asali na abokan ciniki, tare da gane rubutun hannu, murya da fuska.

data.translation: Irin waɗannan abubuwa sun zama horo dabam dabam, wanda ya mai da hankali ga samar da mafita ga matsalolin rayuwa na ainihi.

data.translation: A yanzu ana amfani da tsarin AI a fannonin tattalin arziki, magani, injiniya da soja, kamar yadda aka gina shi a cikin aikace-aikacen kwamfuta da bidiyo da yawa.
data.original_reference: Yawacin lokuta ana amfani da tsarin AI a bangarorin tattalin arziki, likitanci, injiniya da sojoji, kamar yadda aka gina cikin ɗimbin komfuta na gida da bidiyon softwaya na mahanjar wasa.

data.translation: Sau da yawa malamin makaranta yana son ya kai ɗalibai wuraren da ba za a iya zuwa ta bas ba.
data.original_reference: Tafiyar koyo a filaye babban bangare ne na kowane aji. Sau da yawa malamin na son ɗaukar ɗaliban sa zuwa wuraren da tafiya da bas ba abin zaɓi ba ne.
data.corrected_reference: Tafiyar koyo a filaye babban bangare ne na kowane aji. Sau da yawa malamin na son ɗaukar ɗaliban sa zuwa wuraren da tafiya da bas ba abin zaɓi ba ne.

data.translation: Aikin fasaha yana ba da mafita ta wajen yin tafiye - tafiye na zahiri.
data.original_reference: Fasaha tana ba da mafita tare da tafiye-tafiye na fili. Dalibai na iya kallon kayan tarihin, ziyartar akwatin kifaye, ko kuma sha'awar kyawawan fasaha yayin zama tare da ajinsu.
data.corrected_reference: Fasaha tana ba da mafita tare da tafiye-tafiye na fili. Dalibai na iya kallon kayan tarihin, ziyartar akwatin kifaye, ko kuma sha'awar kyawawan fasaha yayin zama tare da ajinsu.

data.translation: Raba wani tafiya ta filin a zahiri kuma hanya ce mai kyau don yin tunani game da tafiya da kuma raba abubuwan da suka faru da ɗalibai na gaba.
data.original_reference: Musayar bayanan tafiyar gani da ido shi ma wata babbar hanya ce ta yin tunani kan tafiya da kuma sanar da abubuwan da aka sani ga azuzuwa masu zuwa nan gaba.
data.corrected_reference: Musayar bayanan tafiyar gani da ido shi ma wata babbar hanya ce ta yin tunani kan tafiya da kuma sanar da abubuwan da aka sani ga azuzuwa masu zuwa nan gaba.

data.translation: Alal misali, a kowace shekara, ɗaliban Makarantar Bennet a Arewacin Carolina suna tsara wani shafin yanar gizon game da tafiyarsu zuwa Babban Birnin Jihar, a kowace shekara shafin yanar gizon yana sake gyarawa, amma ana ajiye tsofaffin juzu'i a kan layi don zama littafin rubutu.
data.original_reference: Misali, kowace shekara ɗalibai daga Makarantar Bennet a Arewacin Carolina suna tsara gidan yanar gizo game da tafiyarsu zuwa Babban Birnin Jiha, kowace shekara gidan yanar gizon yana sake fasalin su, amma ana ajiye tsofaffin sigar akan layi don zama littafin shara.
data.corrected_reference: Misali, kowace shekara ɗalibai daga Makarantar Bennet a Arewacin Carolina suna tsara gidan yanar gizo game da tafiyarsu zuwa Babban Birnin Jiha, kowace shekara gidan yanar gizon yana sake fasalin su, amma ana ajiye tsofaffin sigar akan layi don zama littafin shara.

data.translation: Har ila yau, shafukan yanar gizo na iya taimakawa wajen inganta rubutun ɗalibai. Yayin da ɗalibai ke farawa da ƙwarewar rubutun da ba a daidaita ba, yawanci kasancewar masu sauraro yana canza hakan.
data.original_reference: Shafukan yanar gizo na gulmace-gulmace na iya taimakawa inganta rubuce-rubucen ɗalibai. Yayinda ɗalibai kan fara kwarewar su ta yanar gizo tare da lafuzza mara kyau da rubutu, kasancewar masu sauraro gabaɗaya suna canza hakan.
data.corrected_reference: Shafukan yanar gizo na gulmace-gulmace na iya taimakawa inganta rubuce-rubucen ɗalibai. Yayinda ɗalibai kan fara kwarewar su ta yanar gizo tare da lafuzza mara kyau da rubutu, kasancewar masu sauraro gabaɗaya suna canza hakan.

data.translation: Tun da ɗalibai ne yawanci masu sauraro masu sukar, marubucin blog ya fara ƙoƙari ya inganta rubutu don kauce wa zargi.
data.original_reference: Tun da dalibai sune galibin wadanda suka ziyartar shafi, mawallafin shafin intanet lallai ne ya yi kokarin inganta salon rubutunsa saboda gujewa suka.
data.corrected_reference: Tun da dalibai sune galibin wadanda suka ziyartar shafi, mawallafin shafin intanet lallai ne ya yi kokarin inganta salon rubutunsa saboda gujewa suka.

data.translation: Har ila yau, rubutun ra'ayin kanka a yanar gizo "yana sa ɗalibai su zama masu ilimi game da duniya da ke kewaye da su." Bukatar ciyar da sha'awar masu sauraro yana motsa ɗalibai su zama masu basira da ban sha'awa (Toto, 2004).
data.original_reference: Har yanzu a wallafar ta shafin intanet “ya saka dalibin kara farga da lamuran duniyar da suke rayuwa ciki.” Bukatar biyan bukatun masu sauraronsu yana saka daliban kaimin zama masu wayo da kuma sha’awarsu (Toto, 2004).
data.corrected_reference: Har yanzu a wallafar ta shafin intanet “ya saka dalibin kara farga da lamuran duniyar da suke rayuwa ciki.” Bukatar biyan bukatun masu sauraronsu yana saka daliban kaimin zama masu wayo da kuma sha’awarsu (Toto, 2004).

data.translation: Blogging kayan aiki ne da ke sa a yi aiki tare, kuma yana ƙarfafa ɗalibai su ci gaba da koyo fiye da yadda ake yi a makaranta.
data.original_reference: Rubutun ra'ayin kanka a yanar gizo kayan aiki ne wanda ke karfafa hadin gwiwa, da ƙarfafa dalibai don faɗaɗa koyin karatu sosai fiye da ranar makaranta ta al'ada.
data.corrected_reference: Rubutun ra'ayin kanka a yanar gizo kayan aiki ne wanda ke karfafa hadin gwiwa, da ƙarfafa dalibai don faɗaɗa koyin karatu sosai fiye da ranar makaranta ta al'ada.

data.translation: Yin amfani da shafukan yanar gizo yadda ya kamata zai iya ba dalibai damar zama masu bincike da kuma masu sukar; ta hanyar amsawa da kyau ga kayan yanar gizo, ɗalibai za su iya bayyana matsayinsu a cikin mahallin rubuce-rubucen wasu da kuma tsara ra'ayinsu game da wasu batutuwa (Oravec, 2002).
data.original_reference: Amfani da ingantacciyar hanyar amfani da yanar gizo “na iya ba da ƙarfi ga ɗalibai su zama masu zurfin bincike da mahimmanci; ta hanyar ba da amsa da sauri game da kayan yanar gizo, ɗalibai na iya ayyana matsayinsu a cikin mahallin sauran rubuce-rubucen tare kuma da fitar da nasu hangen nesa kan wasu batutuwan musamman (Oravec, 2002).
data.corrected_reference: Amfani da ingantacciyar hanyar amfani da yanar gizo “na iya ba da ƙarfi ga ɗalibai su zama masu zurfin bincike da mahimmanci; ta hanyar ba da amsa da sauri game da kayan yanar gizo, ɗalibai na iya ayyana matsayinsu a cikin mahallin sauran rubuce-rubucen tare kuma da fitar da nasu hangen nesa kan wasu batutuwan musamman (Oravec, 2002).

data.translation: Ottawa ita ce babban birnin Kanada mai ban sha'awa, mai harsuna biyu kuma tana da tarin gidajen tarihi da gidajen tarihi da ke nuna tarihin Kanada da na yanzu.

data.translation: An kafa birnin Casablanca na zamani ne da 'yan kasuwa Berber a karni na 10 K.Z., kuma Foinikyawa, Romawa, da Merenids sun yi amfani da shi a matsayin tashar jiragen ruwa mai suna Anfa.
data.original_reference: Masuntan ƙabilar Berner su ne suka kafa sabon birnin Casablanca a karni na 10 BCE, kuma Phoenicians, Rumawa, da Merenids sun yi amfani da shi a matsayin tashar jirgin ruwa mai amfani da ake kira Anfa.
data.corrected_reference: Masuntan ƙabilar Berner su ne suka kafa sabon birnin Casablanca a karni na 10 BCE, kuma Phoenicians, Rumawa, da Merenids sun yi amfani da shi a matsayin tashar jirgin ruwa mai amfani da ake kira Anfa.

data.corrected_reference: Yayinda Goma na da lafiya mai kan gado, a bincika duk wani ziyara a wajen Goma domin gane yanayin yaki da ta ci gaba a yankin North Kivu.

data.translation: Birnin kuma shi ne tushen hawa dutsen mai titin Nyiragongo tare da wasu daga cikin mafi arha Mountain Gorilla tracking a Afirka.

data.translation: Za ka iya amfani da boda-boda (taxi na babur) don ka yi tafiya a kusa da Goma. Farashin da ake biya a gida shi ne kusan 500 na kudin Congolese.

data.translation: Da yake da rashin isa, an yi amfani da "Timbuktu" a matsayin kwatancin ƙasashe masu nisa.

data.translation: A yau, Timbuktu gari ne mai talauci, ko da yake suna ta sa ta zama abin jan hankali ga masu yawon bude ido, kuma tana da filin jirgin sama.

data.translation: Gidan shakatawa na kasa na Kruger (KNP) yana arewa maso gabashin Afirka ta Kudu kuma yana kan iyakar Mozambique a gabas, Zimbabwe a arewa, kuma iyakar kudu ita ce Kogin Crocodile.

data.translation: Wannan wuri ne da 'yan mulkin mallaka na Birtaniya suka dauka a matsayin nasu, don haka idan kuna neman shaidar tarihin mulkin mallaka na yankin, wannan wuri ne mai kyau don farawa.

data.translation: Sundarbans sune mafi girma a cikin magudanun mangrove na bakin teku a duniya, wanda ya kai kilomita 80 zuwa bangladeshi da Indiya daga gabar teku.
data.original_reference: Sundarbans su ne dazukan gefen tekuna mafi girma a duniya, inda suka mika tswon kilomita 80 (mil 50) cikin busassun yankunan kasashen Bangladesh da India daga gabar teku.
data.corrected_reference: Sundarbans su ne dazukan gefen tekuna mafi girma a duniya, inda suka mika tswon kilomita 80 (mil 50) cikin busassun yankunan kasashen Bangladesh da India daga gabar teku.

data.translation: An bayyana Sundarbans a matsayin Gidan Tarihi na Duniya na UNESCO.

data.translation: Dajin ba kawai marmaro ba ne ko da yake sun hada da wasu daga cikin ragowar da suka rage na gandun daji mai girma wanda ya taɓa rufe filayen Gangetic.
data.original_reference: Dazuzzukan ba kawai daji ne mai surkukiyar bishiyoyi da laka ba kawai - sun kunshi daya daga cikin daji mai duhu da su ka rage wanda ya mamayi yankin Gangetic.

data.translation: Sundarbans sun mamaye yanki na kilomita 3,850 na 2, wanda kusan kashi ɗaya bisa uku na su ruwa ne / wuraren lambu.

data.translation: Tun daga shekara ta 1966 Sundarbans sun kasance wurin da ake ajiye namun daji, kuma an kiyasta cewa yanzu akwai tigers 400 na Bengal da kuma kimanin dubu 30 na 'yan daji a yankin.
data.original_reference: Tun daga 1966 Sundarbans ya kasance mafakar dabbobin daji, kuma an ƙiyasta cewa yanzu haka akwai damisar Royal Bengal guda 400 da kuma wasu barewa 30,000 da aka gani a yankin.
data.corrected_reference: Tun daga 1966 Sundarbans ya kasance mafakar dabbobin daji, kuma an ƙiyasta cewa yanzu haka akwai damisar Royal Bengal guda 400 da kuma wasu barewa 30,000 da aka gani a yankin.

data.translation: Buses tashi daga interdistrict tashar bas (a fadin kogin) a ko'ina cikin yini, ko da yake mafi, musamman wadanda ke zuwa gabas da kuma Jakar / Bumthang tashi tsakanin 06: 30 da 07: 30.
data.original_reference: Manyan motocin sun bar tashar zirga-zirga tsakanin yankuna (sun ratsa ta kan kogin) a tsawon rana, duk da dai yawancinsu, musamman wadanda za su tafi gabashi da na Jakar / Bumthang su na tashi tsakanin karfe 06:30 zuwa 07:30.
data.corrected_reference: Manyan motocin sun bar tashar zirga-zirga tsakanin yankuna (sun ratsa ta kan kogin) a tsawon rana, duk da dai yawancinsu, musamman wadanda za su tafi gabashi da na Jakar / Bumthang su na tashi tsakanin karfe 06:30 zuwa 07:30.

data.translation: Tun da yawanci ana yawan zirga-zirgar bas din da ke tsakanin yankuna, yana da kyau a sayi tikiti kwanaki kadan kafin lokaci.

data.corrected_reference: Motocin bus masu zirga-zirga tsakanin unguwanni kan kasance a cike, shawara ita ce ka sayi tikiti tun kafin kwana biyu.

data.translation: Taxis na raba hanya ce mai sauri da ta dace don tafiya zuwa wurare masu kusa, kamar Paro (Nu 150) da Punakha (Nu 200).

data.translation: Kogin Oyapock Bridge wani gada ne mai igiya wanda ke ratsa Kogin Oyapock don haɗa biranen Oiapoque a Brazil da Saint-Georges de l 'Oyapock a Guiana ta Faransa.

data.translation: Guaraní sune mafi yawan mutanen da ke zaune a gabashin Paraguay, suna rayuwa ne a matsayin masu farauta masu zaman kansu wadanda kuma suna yin noma.

data.translation: Tun da Montevideo ta kasance a kudancin tekun, lokacin rani ne a can lokacin hunturu a arewacin hemisphere da kuma akasin haka.
data.original_reference: Kasancewar birnin Montevideo na kudancin Tsakiyar Duniya, lokacin zafi a can shine na sanyi a arewacin duniya, kuma lokacin sanyi a can shine na zafi a arewacin duniya.
data.corrected_reference: Kasancewar birnin Montevideo na kudancin Tsakiyar Duniya, lokacin zafi a can shine na sanyi a arewacin duniya, kuma lokacin sanyi a can shine na zafi a arewacin duniya.

data.translation: Montevideo tana yankin subtropics; a cikin watanni na bazara, yawanci zafin jiki ya wuce + 30 ° C.
data.original_reference: Montevideo na cikin yankuna masu yanayin sauƙin zafi; a lokacin rani, zafi kan kai sama da +30°C.
data.corrected_reference: Montevideo na cikin yankuna masu yanayin sauƙin zafi; a lokacin rani, zafi kan kai sama da +30°C.

data.translation: A lokacin sanyi, zafin jiki ba ya yawan zama ƙasa da sanyi, amma iska da zafi suna haɗa su don su sa ya yi sanyi fiye da yadda thermometer ya ce.
data.original_reference: Lokacin hunturu na iya zama mai sanyida wasa-wasa: yanayin zafi ba safai ake yin sanyi ba, amma iska da zafi suna haduwa don sanya shi jin sanyi fiye da abin da ma'aunin zafi da sanyio ya fada.
data.corrected_reference: Lokacin hunturu na iya zama mai sanyida wasa-wasa: yanayin zafi ba safai ake yin sanyi ba, amma iska da zafi suna haduwa don sanya shi jin sanyi fiye da abin da ma'aunin zafi da sanyio ya fada.

data.translation: Babu wani yanayi na musamman na "ruwan sama" da "bushewa ": yawan ruwan sama ya kasance iri ɗaya a ko 'ina a shekara.
data.original_reference: Babu “damina” da “rani” na musamman: adadin ruwan sama na kasance iri daya duka shekara.
data.corrected_reference: Babu “damina” da “rani” na musamman: adadin ruwan sama na kasance iri daya duka shekara.

data.translation: Ko da yake yawancin dabbobi a wurin suna ganin mutane, amma dabbobi suna da daji kuma bai kamata a ciyar da su ko kuma ya dame su ba.
data.original_reference: Kodayake yawancin dabbobi da ke wurin killace dabbobin sun saba da ganin mutane, duk da haka namomin daji na da hadari don haka kada a basu abinci ko a tsokane su.
data.corrected_reference: Kodayake yawancin dabbobi da ke wurin killace dabbobin sun saba da ganin mutane, duk da haka namomin daji na da hadari don haka kada a basu abinci ko a tsokane su.

data.translation: A cewar hukumomin shakatawa, ka nisanta kanka da 'yawon bude ido da' yawon bude ido da 'yawon bude ido da kuma dabbobi da ke cikin daji da kuma aƙalla mita 25 da' yawon bude ido da kuma dabbobi!
data.original_reference: Kamar yadda hukumomin gandun daji suka fada, tsaya aƙalla nisan yadi/mita 100 daga dabbobin bear da kerkeci da yadi/mita 25 daga sauran dabbobin daji!
data.corrected_reference: Kamar yadda hukumomin gandun daji suka fada, tsaya aƙalla nisan yadi/mita 100 daga dabbobin bear da kerkeci da yadi/mita 25 daga sauran dabbobin daji!

data.translation: Ko da yaya suka yi biyayya, bison, elk, moose, bears, da kusan dukan manyan dabbobi suna iya kai hari.
data.original_reference: Ko da yaya dolancin su yake, bison, elk, moose, bears, da kusan dukkanin manyan dabbobi za su iya kai hari.
data.corrected_reference: Ko da yaya dolancin su yake, bison, elk, moose, bears, da kusan dukkanin manyan dabbobi za su iya kai hari.

data.translation: Kowace shekara, dubban baƙi suna ji rauni saboda ba su kiyaye nesa da ya dace ba. Wadannan dabbobi suna da girma, daji, kuma suna da haɗari, don haka ku ba su sarari.
data.original_reference: A duk shekara, gwamman maziyarta na samun raunuka sakamakon gaza bada tazara da ta dace. Kuma dabbobin manya ne, masu fada kuma su na da hadarin gaske, don haka sai an basu tazara.
data.corrected_reference: A duk shekara, gwamman maziyarta na samun raunuka sakamakon gaza bada tazara da ta dace. Kuma dabbobin manya ne, masu fada kuma su na da hadarin gaske, don haka sai an basu tazara.

data.translation: Ƙari ga haka, ka san cewa ƙamshi yana janyo hankalin bears da sauran dabbobin daji, don haka ka guji ɗaukar abinci mai ƙamshi ko dafa shi kuma ka tsabtace sansanin.
data.original_reference: Bugu da ƙari, ka sani cewa ƙamshi na janyo bear da waɗansu namun daji, don haka guji ɗauka ko dafa abinci mai ƙamshi da kuma tsaftace sansani.
data.corrected_reference: Bugu da ƙari, ka sani cewa ƙamshi na janyo bear da waɗansu namun daji, don haka guji ɗauka ko dafa abinci mai ƙamshi da kuma tsaftace sansani.

data.translation: A Apia ne babban birnin Samoa, kuma garin yana tsibirin Upolu, kuma yawan mutanensa bai kai dubu 40 ba.
data.original_reference: Apia ce babban birnin Samoa. Garin yana kan tsibirin Upolu kuma yana da yawan al’umma da kadan ya gaza da 40,000.
data.corrected_reference: Apia ce babban birnin Samoa. Garin yana kan tsibirin Upolu kuma yana da yawan al’umma da kadan ya gaza da 40,000.

data.translation: An kafa Apia a cikin 1850s kuma ita ce babban birnin Samoa tun 1959.
data.original_reference: An kafa Apia a shekarun 1850s kuma ta kasance ita ce babban birnin Samoa a hukumance tun 1959.
data.corrected_reference: An kafa Apia a shekarun 1850s kuma ta kasance ita ce babban birnin Samoa a hukumance tun 1959.

data.translation: Tashar jiragen ruwa ta kasance wurin da aka yi wani mummunan rikici a cikin 1889 lokacin da jiragen ruwa bakwai daga Jamus, Amurka, da Birtaniya suka ki barin tashar jiragen ruwa.
data.original_reference: Tashar jiragen ruwan ta kasance wurin da aka yi kaurin suna a tashe-tashen hankula a cikin 1889 lokacin da jiragen ruwa bakwai daga Jamus, Amurka, da Biritaniya suka ƙi barin tashar.
data.corrected_reference: Tashar jiragen ruwan ta kasance wurin da aka yi kaurin suna a tashe-tashen hankula a cikin 1889 lokacin da jiragen ruwa bakwai daga Jamus, Amurka, da Biritaniya suka ƙi barin tashar.

data.translation: An yi asarar dukkan jiragen ruwa sai dai na jirgin ruwa na Birtaniya, kuma kusan 200 na Amirkawa da 'yan Jamus sun rasa rayukansu.
data.original_reference: Duk an nutsar da jiragen ruwan, in ban da wani ƙaramin jirgin ruwan Birtaniya. Kusan rayuka 200 na Amurkawa da Jamusawa aka rasa.
data.corrected_reference: Duk an nutsar da jiragen ruwan, in ban da wani ƙaramin jirgin ruwan Birtaniya. Kusan rayuka 200 na Amurkawa da Jamusawa aka rasa.

data.translation: A lokacin gwagwarmayar neman 'yanci da kungiyar Mau ta shirya, taron lumana a garin ya haifar da kisan babban shugaban Tupua Tamasese Lealofi III.
data.original_reference: A yayin gwagwarmayar neman 'yanci da kungiyar Mau ta shirya, taron lumana da aka yi a garin ya haifar da kisan babban sarki Tupua Tamasese Lealofi III.
data.corrected_reference: A yayin gwagwarmayar neman ƴanci da kungiyar Mau ta shirya, taron lumana da aka yi a garin ya haifar da kisan babban sarki Tupua Tamasese Lealofi III.

data.translation: Akwai rairayin bakin teku da yawa, saboda tashar jiragen ruwa biyu da Auckland ke da ita. Mafi yawan rairayin bakin teku suna cikin yankuna uku.
data.original_reference: Akwai gaɓar teku mai rairayi da dama, sakamakon zagaye tasoshin jiragen ruwa biyu da Auckland ta yi. Fitattun cikinsu suna cikin yankuna uku.
data.corrected_reference: Akwai gaɓar teku mai rairayi da dama, sakamakon zagaye tasoshin jiragen ruwa biyu da Auckland ta yi. Fitattun cikinsu suna cikin yankuna uku.

data.translation: Yankunan Arewa na Arewa (a yankin North Harbour) suna kan Tekun Pacific kuma sun fara daga Long Bay a arewa zuwa Devonport a kudu.

data.corrected_reference: Rairayin bakin tekun North Shores (a gundumar North Harbour) suna kan Tekun Pacific sannan suka miƙa daga Long Bay a arewa zuwa Devonport a kudu.

data.translation: Kusan dukkanin rairayin bakin teku ne masu yashi da kuma wurin yin iyo mai kyau, kuma yawancin suna da inuwa da itatuwan pohutukawa ke tanadarwa.
data.original_reference: Kusan duk wuraren bakin teku ne masu yashi da iyo cikin aminci, kuma yawancin suna da inuwa da bishiyoyin pohutukawa ke samarwa.
data.corrected_reference: Kusan dukan su beach ne masu kasa da kuma wurin iyo a kwanciyar hankali, kuma yawancin su suna da inuwa da bishiyun pohutukawa ke bayarwa.

data.translation: Tamaki Drive rairayin bakin teku suna a tashar jiragen ruwa ta Waitemata, a cikin unguwar Mission Bay da St Heliers a tsakiyar Auckland.
data.original_reference: Kogin Tamaki Drive suna kan Waitemata Harbor, a cikin manyan unguwannin bayan gari na Mission Bay da St Heliers a Central Auckland.
data.corrected_reference: Kogin Tamaki Drive suna kan Waitemata Harbor, a cikin manyan unguwannin bayan gari na Mission Bay da St Heliers a Central Auckland.

data.translation: A wasu lokatai, rairayin bakin teku na iyali ne da ke cike da mutane da kuma shaguna.

data.translation: Babban giya na gida shine "Number One", ba giya mai rikitarwa ba ce, amma mai daɗi da wartsakewa.
data.original_reference: Giya ta gida da aka sani ita ce ‘Ta Ɗaya’, ba giya ce mai haɗe-haɗe ba, amma tana da daɗi da wartsakarwa. Ana kiran daya giyar ta gida “Manta”.
data.corrected_reference: Giya ta gida da aka sani ita ce ‘Ta Ɗaya’, ba giya ce mai haɗe-haɗe ba, amma tana da daɗi da wartsakarwa. Ana kiran daya giyar ta gida “Manta”.

data.translation: Akwai ruwan inabi da yawa na Faransa da za a sha, amma ruwan inabi na New Zealand da na Australia na iya tafiya mafi kyau.

data.translation: Ruwa na ruwan famfo na gida yana da kyau a sha, amma ruwa mai kwalban yana da sauƙin samu idan kana jin tsoro.

data.translation: Ga'yan Ostiraliya, ra'ayin kofi mai fari mai fari baƙon abu ne. Wani ɗan gajeren baki shine espresso, cappuccino yana zuwa da kirim mai tsami (ba kumfa ba), kuma ana ba da shayi ba tare da madara ba.
data.original_reference: Ga 'yan Australiya, manufar kofi na 'flat white' bakon abu ne. Wani bakar gajeren kofi na 'espresso', yana cike da maiko (ba kumfa ba), ana shan shayi ba tare da madara ba.
data.corrected_reference: Ga ƴan Australiya, manufar kofi na 'flat white' bakon abu ne. Wani bakar gajeren kofi na 'espresso', yana cike da maiko (ba kumfa ba), ana shan shayi ba tare da madara ba.

data.original_reference: Gungun jellyfish na taruwa a kusa da rairayin bakin teku da kuma kusa da bakin kogi inda ya hadu da teku tsakanin watannin Oktoba zuwa Afrilu a arewacin 1770. Amma ana iya samunsu jefi jefi a wasu lokutan ma.
