data.translation: Yawancin sharks suna tsoron mutane kuma suna so su yi iyo.
data.original_reference: Sharks suna wanzu, duk da haka ba safai suke kai wa mutane hari ba. Yawancin sharks suna jin tsoron mutane kuma zasu iya iyo.
data.corrected_reference: Akwai shark a zahiri amma basu fiya kawowa mutane hari ba. Yawancin sharks suna tsoron mutane kuma guduwa zasuyi.

data.translation: Crocodiles na ruwa ba sa rayuwa a cikin teku, mazauninsu na farko shine a cikin kogin kogin arewacin Rockhampton.
data.original_reference: Ruwan gishiri na Kaduna ba ya rayuwa a cikin teku, asalin wurin zaman su shine a cikin kogin estuaries a arewa daga Rockhampton.
data.corrected_reference: Kada din ruwa me gishiri basa yawan zama a teku, wurn zaman su shine kududufi estuaries arewa ga Rockhampton.

data.translation: Yin ajiyar wuri a gaba yana ba matafiya kwanciyar hankali cewa za su sami wurin kwana da zarar sun isa inda suke.
data.original_reference: Biya da wuri tana ba da mafita tare da tafiye-tafiye na fili. Studentsalibai na iya kallon kayan tarihin, ziyartar akwatin kifaye, ko kuma sha'awar kyawawan fasaha yayin zama tare da ajinsu.
data.corrected_reference: Biya da wuri tana ba da mafita tare da tafiye-tafiye na fili. Studentsalibai na iya kallon kayan tarihin, ziyartar akwatin kifaye, ko kuma sha'awar kyawawan fasaha yayin zama tare da ajinsu.

data.translation: Ofishin kula da tafiye -tafiye sau da yawa yana da yarjejeniyoyi da otal - otal na musamman, ko da yake za ka iya samun damar yin rajistar wasu nau 'i na masauki, kamar wuraren zango, ta hanyar kamfanin kula da tafiye - tafiye.
data.original_reference: Ma'aikatan tafiye-tafiye galibi suna da ma'amala tare da takamaiman otal, kodayake kuna iya samun damar tsara wasu nau'o'in masauki, kamar filayen zangon, ta hanyar wakilin balaguro.
data.corrected_reference: Ma'aikatan tafiye-tafiye galibi suna da ma'amala tare da takamaiman otal, kodayake kuna iya samun damar tsara wasu nau'o'in masauki, kamar filayen zangon, ta hanyar wakilin balaguro.

data.translation: Hukumomin tafiye-tafiye sukan ba da fakiti da suka hada da karin kumallo, shirya sufuri zuwa / daga filin jirgin sama ko ma haɗin jirgin sama da fakitin otal.
data.original_reference: Dillalan zirga-zirga galibi suna bayar da hasafin karya kumallo da tsara tafiye-tafiye - na zuwa da dawowa - daga filin jiragen sama ko kuma su kan hada har da na tafiyar jiragen da kuma na otel.
data.corrected_reference: Dillalan zirga-zirga galibi suna bayar da hasafin karya kumallo da tsara tafiye-tafiye - na zuwa da dawowa - daga filin jiragen sama ko kuma su kan hada har da na tafiyar jiragen da kuma na otel.

data.translation: Suna iya ajiye maka takardar idan kana bukatar lokaci domin tunani a kan tayin ko kuma ka samu wasu takardu don makomarka (misali biza).
data.original_reference: Hakanan zasu iya riƙe ajiyar a gare ku idan kuna buƙatar lokaci don tunani game da tayin ko samo wasu takardu don zuwa (misali visa).
data.corrected_reference: Hakanan zasu iya riƙe ajiyar a gare ku idan kuna buƙatar lokaci don tunani game da tayin ko samo wasu takardu don zuwa (misali visa).

data.translation: Duk wani gyara ko buƙata duk da haka ya kamata a yi ta hanyar kamfanin tafiye-tafiye da farko kuma ba kai tsaye zuwa otal ba.
data.original_reference: Duk wani gyara ko buƙata za a tura ta wurin jami’in tafiye-tafiye da farko ba kai tsaye zuwa otal ba.
data.corrected_reference: Duk wani gyara ko buƙata za a tura ta wurin jami’in tafiye-tafiye da farko ba kai tsaye zuwa otal ba.

data.translation: A wasu bukukuwa, yawancin waɗanda suka halarci bukukuwa na kiɗa suna yin zango a wurin, kuma yawancin masu halarta suna ɗaukan hakan a matsayin muhimmin ɓangare na taron.
data.original_reference: Don wasu bukukuwa, yawancin masu halarta zuwa bukukuwa na kiɗa sun yanke shawara su yi zango a wurin, kuma yawancin masu halarta suna ɗaukar shi muhimmin ɓangare na ƙwarewar.
data.corrected_reference: Don wasu bukukuwa, yawancin masu halarta zuwa bukukuwa na kiɗa sun yanke shawara su yi zango a wurin, kuma yawancin masu halarta suna ɗaukar shi muhimmin ɓangare na ƙwarewar.

data.translation: Idan kana son ka kasance kusa da wasan dole ne ka shiga da wuri don samun wani sansanin kusa da kiɗa.

data.translation: Ka tuna cewa ko da yake za a iya daina yin waƙa a kan manyan matakai, za a iya yin waƙa har zuwa dare a wasu sassan bikin.
data.original_reference: Ka tuna cewa, duk da kasancewar an datse kade-kade a farfajiyar, akwai kuma wasu sassan bukukuwan da za su ci gaba da kade-kaden har can talatainin dare.

data.translation: Wasu bukukuwa suna da wuraren zango na musamman don iyalai da ke da ƙananan yara.

data.translation: Idan ka haye Tekun Baltic a lokacin sanyi, ka duba wurin da za ka zauna, domin yin tafiya ta cikin kankara yana haifar da mummunan amo ga wadanda aka fi shafa.
data.original_reference: Idan za ka tsallaka Arewacin Baltic a lokacin sanyi, duba wurin taragon, saboda ratsa ƙanƙara na jawo wani mummunan ƙara ga waɗanda abin ya fi shafa.

data.translation: Jirgin ruwa na Saint Petersburg ya hada da lokacin da ake cikin gari.

data.translation: A yawancin lokaci, gidajen caca suna ƙoƙari sosai don su ba da lokaci da kuɗi da baƙi suke kashewa sosai.
data.original_reference: Gidajen caca yawanci suna yin ƙoƙari da yawa don haɓaka lokaci da kuɗin da baƙi suka kashe. Tagogi da agogo galibi basa nan, kuma hanyar fita na da wahalar samu.

data.translation: Suna da abinci na musamman, abin sha da kuma nishaɗi don baƙi su kasance cikin yanayi mai kyau, kuma su ci gaba da kasancewa a wurin.

data.translation: Wasu wuraren caca suna ba da giya a gidan, amma shan giya yana sa mutum ya kasa yin hukunci kuma duk masu caca sun san muhimmancin kasancewa da hankali.
data.original_reference: Wasu wuraren suna ba da kayan sha na barasa a gidan. Sai dai kuma, maye toshe tunani, kuma duk ƙwararrun ‘yan caca sun san mahimmancin kasancewa ba cikin maye ba.
data.corrected_reference: Wasu wuraren suna ba da kayan sha na barasa a gidan. Sai dai kuma, maye toshe tunani, kuma duk ƙwararrun ‘yan caca sun san mahimmancin kasancewa ba cikin maye ba.

data.translation: Duk wanda zai tuka mota a manyan latitudes ko kuma a kan tuddai ya kamata yayi la'akari da yiwuwar dusar ƙanƙara, kankara, ko kuma zafin jiki.

data.translation: A yankunan arewacin Indiya da Pakistan, ana amfani da yogurt a cikin curries; a kudancin Indiya da wasu yankunan bakin teku na yankin, ana amfani da madarar kwakwa.

data.corrected_reference: A cikin yankuna masu nisa na Arewacin Indiya da Pakistan, ana amfani da madala a cikin curry; a Kudancin Indiya da wasu yankuna na gabar teku na yankin, ana amfani da madarar kwakwa sosai.

data.translation: Tare da tsibirai 17,000 da za a zaɓa daga cikinsu, abincin Indonesiya wani lokaci ne na rufe yawancin abinci na yanki da ake samu a fadin kasar.
data.original_reference: Tare da tsibirai 17,000 da za a zaɓa daga ciki, abincin Indonesiya laima ce da ke rufe yawancin nau'ikan abinci na yanki da aka samo a duk faɗin ƙasar.

data.translation: Amma, idan aka yi amfani da shi ba tare da ƙarin takamaiman takamaiman ba, kalmar tana nufin abinci wanda ya fito ne daga tsakiyar da gabashin tsibirin Java.
data.original_reference: Amma, idan aka yi amfani da shi ba tare da ƙarin ƙwarewar ba, kalmar tana nufin ma'anar abinci asali daga ɓangarorin tsakiya da gabashin babban tsibirin Java.

data.translation: Yanzu ana samun abinci na Javanese a ko'ina cikin tsibirin, ana samun abinci mai yawa da aka dafa da sauƙi, kayan yaji da Javanese ke so su ne goro, chili, sukari (musamman sukari na kwakwa na Javanese) da kayan yaji masu ƙanshi daban -daban.
data.original_reference: Yanzu ana samu a faɗin rukunin tsibiran, jerin nau’ikan abincin yan Java, yawancin kayan kamshin da su ka fi sakawa shine na gyada, yaji da sukari (musamman sukarin kwakwa) da kuma wasu kayan kanshin.
data.corrected_reference: Yanzu ana samu a faɗin rukunin tsibiran, jerin nau’ikan abincin yan Java, yawancin kayan kamshin da su ka fi sakawa shine na gyada, yaji da sukari (musamman sukarin kwakwa) da kuma wasu kayan kanshin.

data.translation: Suna ba da kwanciyar hankali ga mai hawa amma suna iya haifar da damuwa game da aminci saboda yiwuwar ƙafafun mai hawa su makale a cikinsu.

data.translation: Idan aka jefa wani doki daga doki amma ƙafafunsa sun kama a cikin ƙugiya, za a iya janye shi idan doki ya gudu.

data.translation: Cochamó Valley - babban wurin hawa na Chile, wanda aka sani da Yosemite na Kudancin Amurka, tare da manyan ganuwar granite da duwatsu masu duwatsu.
data.original_reference: Kwarin Cochamó - shine wajen hawan dutse mafi fice da ake zuwa wanda aka sani da Yosemite na Kudancin Amurka, wanda ke da manyan katangu na dutse daban-daban da matakaloli na dutse masu tsawo.

data.translation: Masu hawa daga ko 'ina a duniya suna ci gaba da kafa sababbin hanyoyi a cikin ganuwar da ke da iyaka.

data.translation: Wasanni na yin snowboard da kuma yin gudun kankara suna da kyau sosai.

data.translation: Yin tseren kankara babban aiki ne na tafiya tare da masu sha'awar tseren kankara da yawa, wanda ake kira "ski bums", wanda ke tsara cikakken hutu a kusa da yin tseren kankara a wani wuri.
data.original_reference: Wasa kan dusar kankara wasa ne na masu tafiye-tafiye da masun goyon baya da yawa, a wasu lokatai an san shi da “ski bums,” suna tsara dukkan hutu ga wasa kan dusan kankara a wani wuri na musamman.
data.corrected_reference: Wasa kan dusar kankara wasa ne na masu tafiye-tafiye da masun goyon baya da yawa, a wasu lokatai an san shi da “ski bums,” suna tsara dukkan hutu ga wasa kan dusan kankara a wani wuri na musamman.

data.translation: A yanayi mai kyau za ka iya yin tafiya da nisa fiye da tafiya amma da wuya za ka samu saurin yin gudun kankara ba tare da jakar baya mai nauyi a kan hanyoyi masu kyau ba.

data.translation: Turai ƙaramar nahiya ce amma tana da ƙasashe masu zaman kansu da yawa. a yanayi na yau da kullum, yin tafiya ta ƙasashe da yawa zai sa a yi amfani da takardar izini da kuma takardar shaidar wucewa sau da yawa.
data.original_reference: Turai nahiya ce karama amma cike da kasashe masu yancin kansu. A tsari ana iya cewa yin tafiye-tafiye tsakanin kasashen na nufin sai ka nemi takardun izinin shiga da ratsa wuraren binciken takardun tafiya.

data.translation: Idan ka zauna a wannan yankin, za ka iya ƙetare iyaka ba tare da ka sake shiga wuraren kula da fasfo ba.

data.translation: Hakazalika, ta wajen samun biza ta Schengen, ba ka bukatar ka nemi biza zuwa kowace daga cikin ƙasashen Schengen dabam-dabam, don haka ka ajiye lokaci, kudi da takardu.
data.original_reference: Hakanan, samun izinin shiga kasashen Schengen, ya sa baka bukatar samun izinin daidaikun kasashe da ke cikin jerin kasashen, hakan na rage asarar lokaci, kudi da cike ciken takardu.
data.corrected_reference: Hakanan, samun izinin shiga kasashen Schengen, ya sa baka bukatar samun izinin daidaikun kasashe da ke cikin jerin kasashen, hakan na rage asarar lokaci, kudi da cike ciken takardu.

data.translation: Babu wani ma'anar duniya game da abin da ake kira kayayyakin tarihi. Wasu hukumomin haraji suna la'akari da kayayyakin da suka fi shekaru 100 da haihuwa a matsayin kayayyakin tarihi.
data.original_reference: Babu wani ma'anar duniya wanda kayan masana'antu sune kayan tarihi. Wasu hukumomin haraji sun ayyana kayan da suka girmi shekaru 100 a matsayin kayan tarihi.

data.translation: Ma'anar tana da bambancin yanayin ƙasa, inda iyakar shekaru na iya zama mafi gajere a wurare kamar Arewacin Amirka fiye da Turai.
data.original_reference: Ma’anar na da banbancin yanki, inda iyakar shekaru ke iya kasancewa kaɗan a wurare kamar Amurika ta Arewa fiye da ƙsashen Turai.
data.corrected_reference: Ma’anar na da banbancin yanki, inda iyakar shekaru ke iya kasancewa kaɗan a wurare kamar Amurika ta Arewa fiye da ƙsashen Turai.

data.translation: Ana iya bayyana kayayyakin sana'a a matsayin kayan tarihi, ko da yake sun fi ƙarami fiye da irin waɗannan kayayyakin da aka samar a taro.
data.original_reference: Za'a iya ma'anar kayayyakin aikin hannu azaman tsoffin kayayyakin tarihi, dukda cewa sunfi saurayi irin kayan da aka girka.
data.corrected_reference: Za'a iya ma'anar kayayyakin aikin hannu azaman tsoffin kayayyakin tarihi, dukda cewa sunfi saurayi irin kayan da aka girka.

data.translation: Gudanar da reindeer yana da muhimmanci a rayuwar mutanen Sami kuma al'adun da ke kewaye da wannan sana'a suna da muhimmanci ga mutane da yawa da suke da wasu sana'o'i.
data.original_reference: Kiwon dabbar Reindeer wani gata mai muhimmanci ne tsakanin 'yan Sámi kuma al'adar a kewayar sana'ar tana da muhimmanci kuma wajen yawanci da suke da wasu sana'o'i.
data.corrected_reference: Kiwon dabbar Reindeer wani gata mai muhimmanci ne tsakanin ƴan Sámi kuma al'adar a kewayar sana'ar tana da muhimmanci kuma wajen yawanci da suke da wasu sana'o'i.

data.translation: Ko da a al'ada, duk da haka, ba dukan 'yan Sami ne suka yi kiwon manyan reindeer ba, amma sun rayu daga kamun kifi, farauta da makamantansu, suna da reindeer mafi yawa a matsayin dabbobi masu motsawa.
data.original_reference: Ko a al'adance, duk da cewa, ba duk dan Sami bane suka tsunduma cikin harkar kiwo mai yawa, amma sun rayu ne daga kamun kifi, farauta da makamantansu, wadanda suke da dabbobin doki akasarinsu dabbobi.
data.corrected_reference: Ko a al'adance, duk da cewa, ba duk dan Sami bane suka tsunduma cikin harkar kiwo mai yawa, amma sun rayu ne daga kamun kifi, farauta da makamantansu, wadanda suke da dabbobin doki akasarinsu dabbobi.

data.translation: A yau, yawancin'yan ƙasar Sámi suna aiki a cikin sana'o'i na zamani.
data.original_reference: A yau yawancin Sámi suna yin sana'o'in zamani. Yawon buda ido muhimmin kudin shiga ne a cikin Sámi, yankin na Sámi.
data.corrected_reference: A yau yawancin Sámi suna yin sana'o'in zamani. Yawon buda ido muhimmin kudin shiga ne a cikin Sámi, yankin na Sámi.

data.translation: Ko da yake ana amfani da shi sosai, musamman a tsakanin wadanda ba Romawa ba, ana ganin kalmar "Gypsy" tana da laifi saboda alaƙa da mummunan ra'ayoyi da kuma rashin fahimtar Romawa.
data.original_reference: Kodayake ana amfani da shi ko'ina, musamman tsakanin waɗanda ba Romani ba, kalmar “Gypsy” galibi ana ɗaukarta abin ƙyama ne saboda ƙungiyoyinta da ra'ayoyi marasa kyau da ra'ayoyi marasa kyau game da mutanen Romani.
data.corrected_reference: Kodayake ana amfani da shi ko'ina, musamman tsakanin waɗanda ba Romani ba, kalmar “Gypsy” galibi ana ɗaukarta abin ƙyama ne saboda ƙungiyoyinta da ra'ayoyi marasa kyau da ra'ayoyi marasa kyau game da mutanen Romani.

data.translation: Idan ƙasar da za ka ziyarta ta zama abin da ake ba da shawara game da tafiya, inshorar lafiyarka ko kuma inshorar soke tafiyarka za ta iya shafarka.
data.original_reference: Idan ƙasar da za ka ziyarta ta zama cikin wadanda sai an nemi shawarar masana, inshorar lafiyarka da ta ikon soke tafiya na iya shafuwa.

data.translation: Za ka iya neman shawara daga wasu gwamnatoci, amma sun tsara shawararsu don 'yan ƙasarsu.
data.original_reference: Akwai bukatar neman shawarwari daga wasu gwamnatocin ba gwamnatin ka kawai ba, amma dai shawarwarinsu an tsara su ne domin yan kasar su.

data.translation: Shawarar da aka ba da ta ƙunshi taƙaitaccen bayani game da yanayin siyasa a wata ƙasa.

data.translation: Ra'ayoyin da aka gabatar sau da yawa ba su da ma'ana, suna da yawa kuma sun fi sauƙi idan aka kwatanta da ƙarin bayani da ke samuwa a wasu wurare.
data.original_reference: Ra’ayoyin da aka gabatar galibi na gaggawa ne, na gaba daya kuma marar zurfin tunani idan aka kwatanta su da cikakken bayanin da ake samu a wani wuri.
data.corrected_reference: Ra’ayoyin da aka gabatar galibi na gaggawa ne, na gaba daya kuma marar zurfin tunani idan aka kwatanta su da cikakken bayanin da ake samu a wani wuri.

data.translation: Yanayi mai tsanani shi ne kalmar da ake kira duk wani yanayi mai hatsari da zai iya haifar da lalacewa, rikice-rikice na zamantakewa, ko kuma asarar rayukan mutane.
data.original_reference: Mummunan yanayi kalma ce ga duk wani yanayi mai hatsari tare da yiwuwar haifar da lalacewa, rikicewar zamantakewar jama'a, ko asarar rayuwar ɗan adam.
data.corrected_reference: Mummunan yanayi kalma ce ga duk wani yanayi mai hatsari tare da yiwuwar haifar da lalacewa, rikicewar zamantakewar jama'a, ko asarar rayuwar ɗan adam.

data.translation: Yanayi mai tsanani zai iya faruwa a ko'ina a duniya, kuma akwai nau'o'i daban -daban na shi, wanda zai iya dogara da yanayin ƙasa, yanayin ƙasa, da yanayin yanayi.
data.original_reference: Yanayi mai tsanani na iya aukuwa a ko wani bangare na duniya kuma sun bambanta, kuma sun dogara ne ga yanayin kasa da taswirar kasa da kuma ka’idojin iskar shaka.

data.translation: Iska mai ƙarfi, ƙanƙara, ruwan sama mai yawa, da kuma gobara suna haifar da yanayi mai tsanani, kamar guguwa, guguwa, ruwa, da guguwa.
data.original_reference: Babban iska, ƙanƙara, hazo mai yawa, da gobarar daji siffofi ne da tasirin mummunan yanayi, haka ma hadari, guguwa, kogin ruwa, da mahaukaciyar guguwa.
data.corrected_reference: Babban iska, ƙanƙara, hazo mai yawa, da gobarar daji siffofi ne da tasirin mummunan yanayi, haka ma hadari, guguwa, kogin ruwa, da mahaukaciyar guguwa.

data.translation: Abubuwan da ke faruwa a yankuna da kuma yanayi sun haɗa da guguwar dusar ƙanƙara, guguwar dusar ƙanƙara, guguwar kankara, da kuma guguwar turɓaya.

data.translation: Ana ba da shawara sosai ga matafiya su kasance a faɗake game da duk wani hadarin yanayi mai tsanani da ke shafar yankinsu domin hakan na iya shafar duk wani shirin tafiya.

data.translation: Ruwa mai kama da ruwa yana juyawa ne daga raƙuman ruwa da suke tashi daga bakin teku, sau da yawa a kan wani ganuwar ko kuma wani abu makamancin haka.

data.corrected_reference: Igiyar ruwa mai yagawa su ne ruwa ne mai dawowa daga raƙuman ruwa da ke fasa rairayin bakin teku.

data.translation: Saboda yanayin karkashin ruwa, ana samun kwararar komawa a wasu sassan ruwa mai zurfi, kuma ana iya samun saurin ruwa zuwa zurfin ruwa a wurin.
data.original_reference: Saboda yanayin karkashin ruwa da ke sa gudana da mai da hankali a wurare masu zurfi, sannan igiyar ruwa mafi zurfi na iya haduwa a wurin.
data.corrected_reference: Saboda yanayin karkashin ruwa da ke sa gudana da mai da hankali a wurare masu zurfi, sannan igiyar ruwa mafi zurfi na iya haduwa a wurin.

data.translation: Yawancin mutuwar mutane suna faruwa ne sakamakon gajiyawar da ake yi wajen yin iyo da ruwan, wanda ba zai yiwu ba.

data.translation: Da zarar ka fita daga halin yanzu, yin iyo baya da wuya fiye da yadda aka saba.

data.translation: Ka yi ƙoƙari ka yi niyya a wani wuri da ba za a sake kama ka ba ko kuma, dangane da basirarka da kuma ko an lura da kai, za ka so ka jira a cece ka.

data.translation: Sakamakon dawowa ya zo da wuri fiye da yadda al'adu ke shiga (akwai lokacin da ba a yi wata ba), yana da tsawo, kuma yana iya zama mai tsanani.

data.translation: Masu tafiya da suka saba da al'adarsu sau da yawa suna da wuya su saba da al'adarsu.

data.translation: Finland babbar tashar jiragen ruwa ce. "Ƙasar tafkuna dubu" tana da tsibirai dubbai, a cikin tabkuna da kuma a tsibiran bakin teku.

data.translation: A tsibiran da tafkuna ba lallai ba ne ka bukaci jirgin ruwa.

data.translation: Ko da yake tsibirin tsibirin da manyan tabkuna suna da girma sosai don kowane jirgin ruwa, ƙananan jiragen ruwa ko ma kayak suna ba da kwarewa daban.

data.translation: Yin tafiya a jirgin ruwa wani irin nishaɗi ne a ƙasar Finland, inda ake samun jirgin ruwa a kowane mutane bakwai ko takwas.
data.original_reference: Jirgin ruwa jirgi ne na kasar Finland, tare da kwale-kwale ga kowane mutum bakwai ko takwas.
data.corrected_reference: Jirgin ruwa jirgi ne na kasar Finland, tare da kwale-kwale ga kowane mutum bakwai ko takwas.

data.translation: Wannan ya yi daidai da Norway, Sweden da kuma New Zealand, amma a wasu lokuta quite musamman (misali a Netherlands da adadi ne daya zuwa arba'in).
data.original_reference: Wannan ya dace da Norway, Sweden da New Zealand, amma in ba haka ba ya zama na musamman (misali a cikin Netherlands adadi ɗaya ne zuwa arba'in).
data.corrected_reference: Wannan ya dace da Norway, Sweden da New Zealand, amma in ba haka ba ya zama na musamman (misali a cikin Netherlands adadi ɗaya ne zuwa arba'in).

data.translation: Yawancin jiragen ruwa na Baltic suna da tsawon lokaci a St. Petersburg, Rasha.
data.original_reference: Yawancin sanannun Baltic Cruises sun ƙunshi karin tsawan zama a St. Petersburg, Russia.
data.corrected_reference: Yawancin sanannun Baltic Cruises sun ƙunshi karin tsawan zama a St. Petersburg, Russia.

data.translation: Wannan yana nufin za ka iya ziyartar garin tarihi na kwanaki biyu yayin da ka dawo ka kwana a jirgin da daddare.
data.original_reference: Wannan na nuna cewa kana iya ziyartar birni mai tarihi na kwanaki da dama yayin da ake dawowa ko yin bacci a cikin jirgin ruwan da dare.
data.corrected_reference: Wannan na nuna cewa kana iya ziyartar birni mai tarihi na kwanaki da dama yayin da ake dawowa ko yin bacci a cikin jirgin ruwan da dare.

data.translation: Idan ka je gabar teku ne kawai ta hanyar tafiya a jirgin ruwa ba za ka bukaci takardar izini dabam ba (daga 2009).
data.original_reference: Idan ka hau ruwa ta amfani da yawon bude ido a jirgin ruwa ba za ka buƙaci biza ta daban ba (kamar daga 2009).
data.corrected_reference: Idan ka hau ruwa ta amfani da yawon bude ido a jirgin ruwa ba za ka buƙaci biza ta daban ba (kamar daga 2009).

data.translation: Kamar yadda ka gani a taswirar da ke sama da Berlin babu inda ke kusa da teku kuma ba a haɗa ziyartar birnin a cikin farashin jirgin ba.
data.original_reference: Wasu jiragen ruwa su kan sanya Berlin, Jamus a cikin littafin bayanin. Kamar yadda ka ke gani daga taswirar da ke sama babu inda Berlin ta yi kusa da teku kuma ba a haɗa ziyarar birnin ba a farashin jirgi.
data.corrected_reference: Wasu jiragen ruwa su kan sanya Berlin, Jamus a cikin littafin bayanin. Kamar yadda ka ke gani daga taswirar da ke sama babu inda Berlin ta yi kusa da teku kuma ba a haɗa ziyarar birnin ba a farashin jirgi.

data.translation: Tafiya ta jirgin sama na iya zama abin tsoro ga mutane na kowane zamani da kuma al'adu, musamman idan ba su taɓa yin jirgin sama ba ko kuma sun sami wani abin da ya faru da mummunan rauni.
data.original_reference: Tafiya ta hanyar jirgin sama kan iya zama abu mai firgitarwa ga mutane a duk rukunin shekaru da asali, musamman idan ba su taɓa hawa jirgi ba ko kuma sun taɓa shiga al’amari mai firgitarwa.
data.corrected_reference: Tafiya ta hanyar jirgin sama kan iya zama abu mai firgitarwa ga mutane a duk rukunin shekaru da asali, musamman idan ba su taɓa hawa jirgi ba ko kuma sun taɓa shiga al’amari mai firgitarwa.

data.translation: Ba abin kunya ba ne: ba ya bambanta da tsoron da kuma ƙin wasu abubuwa da mutane da yawa suke da shi.
data.original_reference: Ba abun jin kunya bane: bata sha bambam da tsoro da kuma rashin kaunar abubuwan da yawancin mutane ke dashi.
data.corrected_reference: Ba abun jin kunya bane: bata sha bambam da tsoro da kuma rashin kaunar abubuwan da yawancin mutane ke dashi.

data.translation: Wasu suna jin cewa sanin yadda jirgin sama yake aiki da kuma abin da ke faruwa a lokacin jirgin zai taimaka musu su shawo kan tsoron rashin sanin abin da zai faru ko kuma rashin iko.
data.original_reference: Ga wasu, fahimtar yadda jirgi yake aiki da kuma ko mene ne ke faruwa yayin da jirgin yake tafiya watakila ya taimaka wajen shawo kan fargabar da tushenta ba a ma san shi ba ko kuma ma ba a iya shawo kansa.
data.corrected_reference: Ga wasu, fahimtar yadda jirgi yake aiki da kuma ko mene ne ke faruwa yayin da jirgin yake tafiya watakila ya taimaka wajen shawo kan fargabar da tushenta ba a ma san shi ba ko kuma ma ba a iya shawo kansa.

data.translation: Ana biyan kamfanonin aika-aikace da kyau don aikawa da kaya da sauri.
data.original_reference: A na biyan kamfanonin aika saƙonni sosai don isar da abubuwa da sauri. Akai-akai, lokaci yana da matukar mahimmanci game da takardun kasuwanci, abin sayarwa ko kayan gyara don gyara na gaggawa.
data.corrected_reference: A na biyan kamfanonin aika saƙonni sosai don isar da abubuwa da sauri. Akai-akai, lokaci yana da matukar mahimmanci game da takardun kasuwanci, abin sayarwa ko kayan gyara don gyara na gaggawa.

data.translation: A wasu hanyoyi, manyan kamfanoni suna da nasu jiragen sama, amma ga wasu hanyoyi da ƙananan kamfanoni akwai matsala.
data.original_reference: A wasu hanyoyin, manyan kanfanonin na da jiragen samansu, amma a wasu hanyoyi daban da ƙananan kanfanoni akwai matsala.
data.corrected_reference: A wasu hanyoyin, manyan kanfanonin na da jiragen samansu, amma a wasu hanyoyi daban da ƙananan kanfanoni akwai matsala.

data.translation: Idan sun aika da kaya ta jirgin sama, a wasu hanyoyi yana iya ɗaukar kwanaki kafin a kwashe kaya da kuma kwastan.
data.original_reference: Idan sun aika da kaya ta hanyar jigilar jirgin sama, akan wasu hanyoyi ya zama ya dauki kwanaki kafin a ya tsallake saukewa na ‘yan kwastam.
data.corrected_reference: Idan sun aika da kaya ta hanyar jigilar jirgin sama, akan wasu hanyoyi ya zama ya dauki kwanaki kafin a ya tsallake saukewa na ‘yan kwastam.

data.translation: Hanya guda daya da za a samu ta ta wuce ta da sauri ita ce ta aika ta a matsayin kaya mai rijista.
data.original_reference: Hanya kaɗai mafi saurin wucewarsu shine ta hanyar tura su a matsayin jakunkunan da aka duba. Tsarin dokokin kamfunan zirga-zirgar jiragen sama ba ya bada damar tura jaka ba tare da mai ita zai yi tafiya ba, to anan ne inda za ka shigo.
data.corrected_reference: Hanya kaɗai mafi saurin wucewarsu shine ta hanyar tura su a matsayin jakunkunan da aka duba. Tsarin dokokin kamfunan zirga-zirgar jiragen sama ba ya bada damar tura jaka ba tare da mai ita zai yi tafiya ba, to anan ne inda za ka shigo.

data.translation: Hanyar da za a yi amfani da ita wajen yin jirgin sama a aji na farko ko na kasuwanci ita ce ta wajen ba da kuɗi mai yawa don samun wannan gata (ko kuma mafi kyau, ka sa kamfaninka ya yi maka hakan)
data.original_reference: Sananniyar hanya ta tashi a ajin farko ko ajin kasuwanci na jirgin sama shine ka fito da damin kudi domin gata (ko, mafi kyau tukuna, ka sanya kamfaninka su yi maka).
data.corrected_reference: Sananniyar hanya ta tashi a ajin farko ko ajin kasuwanci na jirgin sama shine ka fito da damin kudi domin gata (ko, mafi kyau tukuna, ka sanya kamfaninka su yi maka).

data.translation: Duk da haka, wannan ba shi da arha: a matsayin ƙa'idar doka, za ka iya sa ran biyan har zuwa sau hudu na kudin tattalin arziki na yau da kullum don kasuwanci, da sau goma sha ɗaya don aji na farko!
data.original_reference: Sai dai hakan ba ya samuwa cikin sauƙi: a matsayin ƙa’idar ana tsammanin ka biya ribi hudu na ajin marasa karfi kuma ribi goma sha daya na ajin masu wadataa
data.corrected_reference: Sai dai hakan ba ya samuwa cikin sauƙi: a matsayin ƙa’idar ana tsammanin ka biya ribi hudu na ajin marasa ƙarfi kuma ribi goma sha daya na ajin masu wadataa

data.translation: A matsayinka na mai magana, ba shi da amfani a nemi rangwamen kujerun kasuwanci ko na aji na farko a jiragen kai tsaye daga A zuwa B.
data.original_reference: A gabaɗaya, babu ma'ana a cikin koda neman ragi don kasuwanci ko kujerun ajin farko a kan jiragen sama kai tsaye daga A zuwa B.
data.corrected_reference: A gabaɗaya, babu ma'ana a cikin koda neman ragi don kasuwanci ko kujerun ajin farko a kan jiragen sama kai tsaye daga A zuwa B.

data.translation: Kamfanonin jiragen sama sun san cewa akwai wasu masu tafiya da suke son biyan kudi mai yawa domin samun wuri mai sauri da kwanciyar hankali, kuma su caji daidai.
data.original_reference: Kamfanonin jiragen sama sun sani sarai cewa akwai wasu rukuni na rukuni na wasiƙa waɗanda suke shirye su biya dala mafi girma don alfarmar zuwa wani wuri cikin sauri da jin daɗi, kuma su biya hakan.
data.corrected_reference: Kamfanonin jiragen sama sun sani sarai cewa akwai wasu rukuni na rukuni na wasiƙa waɗanda suke shirye su biya dala mafi girma don alfarmar zuwa wani wuri cikin sauri da jin daɗi, kuma su biya hakan.

data.translation: Babban birnin Moldova shi ne Chisinau.
data.original_reference: Babban birnin Moldova shi ne Chişinău. yaren cikin gida shi ne Romaniyanci, amma ana amfani da harshen Rasha sosai.
data.corrected_reference: Babban birnin Moldova shi ne Chişinău. yaren cikin gida shi ne Romaniyanci, amma ana amfani da harshen Rasha sosai.

data.translation: Moldova ƙasa ce mai ƙabilu da yawa da ta sha wahala daga rikice-rikice na kabilanci.
data.original_reference: Maldova jamhuriya ce mai kabilu da dama da ta yi fama da rikicin kabilanci.
data.corrected_reference: Maldova jamhuriya ce mai kabilu da dama da ta yi fama da rikicin kabilanci.

data.translation: A shekara ta 1994, wannan rikici ya haifar da kafawar Jamhuriyar Transnistria a gabashin Moldova, wadda take da gwamnatin da kuma kudin kanta amma babu wata kasa da ke cikin Majalisar Dinkin Duniya da ta amince da ita.
data.original_reference: A shekarar 1994, wannan rikici ya haifar da kirkirar da kanta mai ikirarin Jamhuriyyar Transnistria a gabashin Moldova, wacce ke da gwamnatinta da kudin ta amma ba wata kungiyar mambobin Majalisar Dinkin Duniya ta amince da shi ba.
data.corrected_reference: A shekarar 1994, wannan rikici ya haifar da kirkirar da kanta mai ikirarin Jamhuriyyar Transnistria a gabashin Moldova, wacce ke da gwamnatinta da kudin ta amma ba wata kungiyar mambobin Majalisar Dinkin Duniya ta amince da shi ba.

data.translation: An sake kafa alaƙar tattalin arziki tsakanin waɗannan sassan biyu na Moldova duk da rashin nasarar tattaunawar siyasa.
data.original_reference: An maido da harkar cinikayya tsakanin bangarori biyu na Maldova duk da rushewar tattaunawar siyasa.
data.corrected_reference: An maido da harkar cinikayya tsakanin bangarori biyu na Maldova duk da rushewar tattaunawar siyasa.

data.translation: Babban addini a Moldova shi ne addinin Kirista na Orthodox.
data.original_reference: Babban addini a Moldova shine Kiristocin aqidah.
data.corrected_reference: Babban addini a Moldova shine Kiristocin aqidah.

data.translation: İzmir ita ce birni na uku mafi girma a Turkiyya da yawan mutane kusan miliyan 3.7, tashar jiragen ruwa ta biyu mafi girma bayan Istanbul, da kuma kyakkyawar hanyar sufuri.
data.original_reference: Izmir shi ne birni na uku mafi girma a Turkiyya da yawan jama’a kimanin miliyan 3.7, kuma tashar jiragen ruwa ta biyu mafi girma bayan ta Istanbul, kuma babbar cibiyar sufuri.
data.corrected_reference: Izmir shi ne birni na uku mafi girma a Turkiyya da yawan jama’a kimanin miliyan 3.7, kuma tashar jiragen ruwa ta biyu mafi girma bayan ta Istanbul, kuma babbar cibiyar sufuri.

data.translation: Birnin Smurna na dā yana da ci gaba sosai a yau kuma yana da kasuwanci sosai.
data.original_reference: A da yana a matsayin tsohon birnin Smyrna, yanzu cibiyar hada-hadar kasuwanci ce ta zamani, da ta bnƙasa, da ta ke zagayen wani ƙaton mashigin ruwa sannan kuma yana zagaye da duwatsu.
data.corrected_reference: A da yana a matsayin tsohon birnin Smyrna, yanzu cibiyar hada-hadar kasuwanci ce ta zamani, da ta bnƙasa, da ta ke zagayen wani ƙaton mashigin ruwa sannan kuma yana zagaye da duwatsu.

data.translation: An yi amfani da manyan tituna, gine-gine masu gilashi da kuma cibiyoyin kasuwanci na zamani da rufin gargajiya na ja, kasuwar karni na 18 da tsoffin masallatai da majami'u, ko da yake birnin yana da yanayi na Turai ta Rum fiye da na gargajiya na Turkiyya.
data.original_reference: Manya-manyan tituna, gidajen gilashi da manyan kantunan siyayya an kawata su da jajayen rufi na gargajiya, kasuwa ta karni na 18, da wani tsohon masallaci da coci, koda yake dai garin ya fi kama da irin na turai da ke gabar bahar rum fiye da ace garin gargajiya ne a kasar Turkiya.
data.corrected_reference: Manya-manyan tituna, gidajen gilashi da manyan kantunan siyayya an kawata su da jajayen rufi na gargajiya, kasuwa ta karni na 18, da wani tsohon masallaci da coci, koda yake dai garin ya fi kama da irin na turai da ke gabar bahar rum fiye da ace garin gargajiya ne a kasar Turkiya.

data.translation: Ƙauyen Haldarsvík yana da ra'ayi na tsibirin Eysturoy da ke kusa da shi kuma yana da coci mai siffa takwas.

data.translation: A cikin ɗakin sujada, akwai wasu abubuwa masu ban sha'awa na marmara na kurciyoyi a kan wasu kaburbura.

data.translation: Yana da daraja rabin sa'a don yawo a cikin ƙauyen mai ban sha'awa.

data.translation: A arewacin kuma a cikin sauki ne garin Sintra mai ban sha'awa da ban sha'awa wanda aka yi wa baƙi shahara bayan wani labari mai ban sha'awa game da ɗaukakarsa wanda Lord Byron ya rubuta.
data.original_reference: Ta gefen arewa mai saukin shiga nan ne Birnin Sintra ya ke wanda ya shahara ga yan kasashen waje bayan da Lord Byron ya bada kayatattun labaran kyawonta.
data.corrected_reference: Ta gefen arewa mai saukin shiga nan ne Birnin Sintra ya ke wanda ya shahara ga yan kasashen waje bayan da Lord Byron ya bada kayatattun labaran kyawonta.

data.translation: Bus 403 na Scotturb yana zuwa Sintra a kai a kai, yana tsayawa a Cabo da Roca.

data.translation: Ka tuna cewa kana ziyartar wani wuri na kabari mai yawa, da kuma wani wuri wanda ke da ma'ana mai yawa ga yawancin mutanen duniya.
data.original_reference: Da fatan za a tuna cewa da gaske ana ziyartar babban kabari ne, kazalika da shafin da ke da kusan ma'ana ga yawancin ɓangarorin duniya.

data.translation: Har yanzu akwai maza da mata da yawa da suka tsira daga wannan lokaci, da kuma wasu da yawa da suka yi wa ƙaunatattunsu kisan kai ko kuma a kashe su a wurin, Yahudawa da ba Yahudawa ba.
data.original_reference: Har yanzu akwai maza da mata da yawa da ke raye waɗanda suka rayu lokacinsu a nan, kuma da yawa da yawa waɗanda suke da ƙaunatattunsu waɗanda aka kashe ko suka yi aiki zuwa can, yahudawa da waɗanda ba Yahudawa ba.
data.corrected_reference: Har yanzu akwai maza da mata da yawa da ke raye waɗanda suka rayu lokacinsu a nan, kuma da yawa da yawa waɗanda suke da ƙaunatattunsu waɗanda aka kashe ko suka yi aiki zuwa can, yahudawa da waɗanda ba Yahudawa ba.

data.translation: Don Allah ka bi da wannan shafin da mutunci, da girmamawa da kuma girmamawa da ya cancanci.
data.original_reference: Da fatan za a kula da rukunin yanar gizon tare da dukkan mutunci, girmamawa da girmama shi. Kada ku yi ba'a game da fitinar Holocaust ko Nazis.
data.corrected_reference: Da fatan za a kula da rukunin yanar gizon tare da dukkan mutunci, girmamawa da girmama shi. Kada ku yi ba'a game da fitinar Holocaust ko Nazis.

data.translation: Kada ka ɓata wurin ta wajen yin alama ko kuma ka yi wa zane-zane zane-zane.

data.corrected_reference: Kada ku lalata wurin ginin ta hanyar sa alamar ko kuma nuna alamar rubutu a cikin ginin.

data.translation: Harshen hukuma na Barcelona shine Catalan da Mutanen Espanya. Kimanin rabin sun fi son yin magana da Catalan, mafi yawan mutane sun fahimta, kuma kusan kowa ya san Mutanen Espanya.
data.original_reference: Harsunan Barcelona na yau da kullun sune Catalan da Spanish. Kimanin rabin sun fi son yin magana da Catalan, yawancinsu sun fahimce shi, kuma kusan kowa ya san Sifen.
data.corrected_reference: Harsunan Barcelona na yau da kullun sune Catalan da Spanish. Kimanin rabin sun fi son yin magana da Catalan, yawancinsu sun fahimce shi, kuma kusan kowa ya san Sifen.

data.translation: Duk da haka, ana nuna yawancin alamun ne kawai a cikin harshen Catalan domin an kafa shi ta hanyar doka a matsayin harshen hukuma na farko.
data.original_reference: Ko da yake, ana nuna galibin alamomin ana nuna su Katalanci sakamakon bisa doka shi ne yaren hukumana farko.
data.corrected_reference: Ko da yake, ana nuna galibin alamomin ana nuna su Katalanci sakamakon bisa doka shi ne yaren hukumana farko.

data.translation: Amma ana amfani da yaren Sifen a manyan motocin da kuma wasu wurare.
data.original_reference: Duk da haka, ana kuma amfani da harshen Spanish sosai a harkar sufuri na jama’a da wasu wurare.
data.corrected_reference: Duk da haka, ana kuma amfani da harshen Spanish sosai a harkar sufuri na jama’a da wasu wurare.

data.translation: Ana yin sanarwar yau da kullum a Metro a cikin harshen Catalan ne kawai, amma ana sanar da katsewa da ba a tsara ba ta hanyar tsarin sarrafa kansa a cikin harsuna da dama ciki har da Mutanen Espanya, Ingilishi, Faransanci, Larabci da Jafananci.
data.original_reference: Ana yin sanarwar yau da gobe a jirgin ƙarƙashin ƙasa a Catalan kaɗai, amma na’urar da ke aiki da kanta ce ke sanar da hargitsin da babu shiri a harsuna iri-iri da suka haɗa da Sifaniyanci, Turanci, Faransanci, Larabci da harshen Japan.
data.corrected_reference: Ana yin sanarwar yau da gobe a jirgin ƙarƙashin ƙasa a Catalan kaɗai, amma na’urar da ke aiki da kanta ce ke sanar da hargitsin da babu shiri a harsuna iri-iri da suka haɗa da Sifaniyanci, Turanci, Faransanci, Larabci da harshen Japan.

data.translation: 'Yan birnin Paris suna da suna na son kai, rashin ladabi da girman kai.
data.original_reference: Mutanen Paris sun yi suna kan son kai, rashin kunya da girman kai.
data.corrected_reference: Mutanen Paris sun yi suna kan son kai, rashin kunya da girman kai.

data.translation: Ko da yake wannan abu ne da ba daidai ba, hanya mafi kyau ta samun dangantaka a Paris ita ce ta kasance da hali mafi kyau, kamar wani da yake da "bien élevé" (da kyau girma).
data.original_reference: Yayin da yake wannan yawanci ra’ayi ne wanda ba daidai ba, hanya mafi kyau don yin sabo a cikin Paris har yanzu shine kasancewa kan halayyarka mafi kyau, yin aiki kamar wanda yake “bien élevé” (wanda ya sami tarbiyya mai kyau). Zai sanya yin sabo ya kasance mai sauki.
data.corrected_reference: Yayin da yake wannan yawanci ra’ayi ne wanda ba daidai ba, hanya mafi kyau don yin sabo a cikin Paris har yanzu shine kasancewa kan halayyarka mafi kyau, yin aiki kamar wanda yake “bien élevé” (wanda ya sami tarbiyya mai kyau). Zai sanya yin sabo ya kasance mai sauki.

data.translation: Fuskokin waje na 'yan Paris za su yi ta ɓarna da sauri idan ka nuna wasu kyawawan halaye.
data.original_reference: Fuskar mutanen Paris ta bazata za ta yi saurin ɓacewa idan ka nuna wasu halayen girmamawa.
data.corrected_reference: Fuskar mutanen Paris ta bazata za ta yi saurin ɓacewa idan ka nuna wasu halayen girmamawa.

data.translation: Gidan shakatawa na Plitvice Lakes yana da gandun daji sosai, galibi tare da beech, spruce, da fir trees, kuma yana da cakuda tsire-tsire na Alpine da Rum.
data.original_reference: Tafkunan Plitvice na wajen shakatawa yana da wani surkukin daji, galibi da kamannin bishiyoyin fir da na kudan zuma da kuma hadin wanda ya shafi manyan tsaunuka da duwatsu tare da ciyaye na Rum.
data.corrected_reference: Tafkunan Plitvice na wajen shakatawa yana da wani surkukin daji, galibi da kamannin bishiyoyin fir da na kudan zuma da kuma hadin wanda ya shafi manyan tsaunuka da duwatsu tare da ciyaye na Rum.

data.translation: Tana da tarin tsire-tsire masu yawa, musamman saboda yanayin yanayin ta, ƙasa daban-daban da kuma tsayin daka daban-daban.
data.original_reference: Tana da sanannun dangogin itatuwa iri daban-daban, sabo da jerin yankunan yanayi da ta ke da su, da bayyana nau’ukan ƙasa daban-daban da kuma tuddai masu mataki daban-daban.
data.corrected_reference: Tana da sanannun dangogin itatuwa iri daban-daban, sabo da jerin yankunan yanayi da ta ke da su, da bayyana nau’ukan ƙasa daban-daban da kuma tuddai masu mataki daban-daban.

data.translation: Ƙari ga haka, akwai dabbobi da tsuntsaye da yawa a wannan yankin.
data.original_reference: Rukunin muhalli na ga dabbobin daji mabambanta da kuma launukan tsuntsaye.
data.corrected_reference: Rukunin muhalli na ga dabbobin daji mabambanta da kuma launukan tsuntsaye.

data.translation: Za a iya samun fauna mai ban mamaki kamar Turai Brown bear, Wolf, Eagle, Owl, lynx, daji cat da capercaillie, tare da sauran jinsuna da yawa
data.original_reference: Dabbobin daji da ba su da yawa irin su Malu mai launin ruwan kasa da ke turai, kerkeci, mikiya, mujiya, kyanwar daji da kuma capercaillie a na iya samun su a can, tare da nau’ukan gama garin dabbobi masu yawa.
data.corrected_reference: Dabbobin daji da ba su da yawa irin su Malu mai launin ruwan kasa da ke turai, kerkeci, mikiya, mujiya, kyanwar daji da kuma capercaillie a na iya samun su a can, tare da nau’ukan gama garin dabbobi masu yawa.

data.translation: A lokacin da mata ke ziyarci gidajen ibada, ana bukatar su sa sutura da ke rufe gwiwa da kuma rufe kafadu.
data.original_reference: Yayin ziyartar gidajen sufaye, an buƙaci mata su sa riguna masu rufe gwiwowinsu kuma su rufe ƙafadunsu, kuma.
data.corrected_reference: Yayin ziyartar gidajen sufaye, an buƙaci mata su sa riguna masu rufe gwiwowinsu kuma su rufe ƙafadunsu, kuma.

data.translation: Yawancin gidajen ibada suna ba da sutura ga mata da ba su shirya ba, amma idan ka kawo naka, musamman wanda ke da launuka masu haske, za ka samu murmushi daga firist ko 'uwargida a ƙofar.
data.original_reference: Mafi yawancin gidajen ibada suna samar da mayafai ga matan da ba su zo da shiri ba, amma idan ki ka zo da naki, musamman wanda yake da launuka masu haske, za ki sami murmushi daga mai bauta namiji ko mace a ƙofar shiga.
data.corrected_reference: Mafi yawancin gidajen ibada suna samar da mayafai ga matan da ba su zo da shiri ba, amma idan ki ka zo da naki, musamman wanda yake da launuka masu haske, za ki sami murmushi daga mai bauta namiji ko mace a ƙofar shiga.

data.translation: Hakazalika, an bukaci maza su sa wando da ke rufe gwiwa.
data.original_reference: A bisa wannan madogara, ana buƙatar maza su sanya wanduna da ke rufe gwiwoyi.
data.corrected_reference: A bisa wannan madogara, ana buƙatar maza su sanya wanduna da ke rufe gwiwoyi.

data.translation: Wannan ma za a iya karba daga kantin sayar da kaya a ƙofar amma ba a wanke tufafin bayan kowane mai amfani ba don haka ba za ku ji daɗin saka waɗannan sutura ba. Girman daya ya dace da maza!
data.original_reference: Wannan ma za a iya aro shi daga tarin kayan a mashigar amma ba a wanke tufa bayan kowane mutum guda ya yi amfani da tufar don haka ba za ka/ki ji dadin saka wannan bujen ba. Kala guda zai iyamma dukkanin maza.
data.corrected_reference: Wannan ma za a iya aro shi daga tarin kayan a mashigar amma ba a wanke tufa bayan kowane mutum guda ya yi amfani da tufar don haka ba za ka/ki ji dadin saka wannan bujen ba. Kala guda zai iyamma dukkanin maza.

data.translation: Abincin Mallorca, kamar na yankunan da ke cikin Bahar Rum, ya dogara ne da gurasa, kayan lambu da nama (musamman naman alade), kuma a ko 'ina ana amfani da man zaitun.
data.original_reference: Babban abincin, kamar na yankuna masu kama da wannan a cikin Bahar Rum, ya dogara ne akan burodi, kayan lambu da nama (musamman alade), kuma yana amfani da man zaitun ko'ina.
data.corrected_reference: Babban abincin, kamar na yankuna masu kama da wannan a cikin Bahar Rum, ya dogara ne akan burodi, kayan lambu da nama (musamman alade), kuma yana amfani da man zaitun ko'ina.

data.translation: Abincin dare mai sauƙi, musamman a lokacin rani, shine Pa amb Oli: Gurasa tare da man zaitun, tumatir, da duk kayan yaji da ake samu kamar cuku, kifi na tuna, da sauransu.
data.original_reference: Abincin dare mai sauki musamman ma lokacin bazara, shi ne na Pa amb Oli: Burodi ne da man zaitun da tumatir da kuma duk wani kayan hadin da ya samu kamar cukwui da abincin kifi da dai sauransu.
data.corrected_reference: Abincin dare mai sauki musamman ma lokacin bazara, shi ne na Pa amb Oli: Burodi ne da man zaitun da tumatir da kuma duk wani kayan hadin da ya samu kamar cukwui da abincin kifi da dai sauransu.

data.translation: Tun da yake gurɓataccen haske a lokacin da suke da girma ba shi da matsala kamar yadda yake a yau, yawanci suna cikin birane ko a harabar makaranta, wanda ya fi sauƙi a kai su fiye da waɗanda aka gina a zamaninmu.

data.translation: Amma da yake an sanya ku a cikin "high tropics" kawai 'yan digiri arewacin kasa za ku yi aiki da zafi (ko da yaushe) da kuma rana mai karfi (idan sama ta kasance mai tsabta, mafi wuya).

data.translation: Alal misali, ziyartar gidajen sarauta a kwarin Loire, kwarin Rhine ko tafiya ta jirgin ruwa zuwa birane masu ban sha'awa a kan Danube ko yin jirgin ruwa a kan Canal Erie.

data.translation: Ikklisiya na gargajiya sukan yi bikin Easter a ranar Asabar da dare a karshen mako na Easter, kuma sau da yawa ikilisiyoyi sukan fara bikin a tsakiyar dare don bikin tashin Kristi.

data.original_reference: Tunda yankunan ba su da cinkoson jama’a, kuma babu matsalar gurɓacewar haske, za kuma ka ji daɗin taurarin.
data.corrected_reference: Tunda yankunan ba su da cinkoson jama’a, kuma babu matsalar gurɓacewar haske, za kuma ka ji daɗin taurarin.

data.translation: Al'adar aikin Japan ta fi na gargajiya da na yau da kullum fiye da yadda 'yan Yamma suka saba da ita.
data.original_reference: Al’adun aiki na Japanese na da matsayi fiye da abin da kasashen yamma suka saba.
data.corrected_reference: Al’adun aiki na Japanese na da matsayi fiye da abin da kasashen yamma suka saba.

data.translation: Suits ne na kasuwanci tufafi, kuma abokan aiki kira juna da sunayen iyali ko da aiki titles.
data.original_reference: Kaya masu kala ɗaya su ne cikakkun tufafin mu’amala, kuma abokan aiki kan kira junansu da sunan iyalinsu ko da muƙaman aiki.
data.corrected_reference: Kwat sune kayan sawa na aiki da aka saba dasu kuma abokan aiki suna kiran juna ne da sunan gidan su ko kuma matsayin da mutum yake kai.

data.translation: Yin aiki cikin jituwa yana da muhimmanci, yana mai da hankali ga ƙoƙarce -ƙoƙarcen rukuni maimakon yabon nasarorin mutum.
data.original_reference: Yarjejeniyar wurin aiki yana da mahimmanci, yana jaddada ƙoƙarin kungiya ne maimakon yaba wa nasarorin da mutum ya samu.
data.corrected_reference: Zaman lafiya a wurin aiki abu ne me muhimmanci, ana bada mahimmanci wurin hadaka tare sama da jinjina yin aiki kai daya.

data.translation: Ma'aikata sukan nemi amincewar shugabanninsu ga duk wani matakin da suka dauka, kuma ana sa ran su bi umarnin shugabanninsu ba tare da yin tambaya ba.
data.original_reference: Dole ne ma’aikata su sami amincewar manyan su akan duk wata shawara da suka zartas, kuma ana tsammanin su yi biyayya ga umarnin manyan su ba tare da tambaya ba.
data.corrected_reference: Dole ne ma’aikata su sami amincewar manyan su akan duk wata shawara da suka zartas, kuma ana tsammanin su yi biyayya ga umarnin manyan su ba tare da tambaya ba.
